148 const uint8_t DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC = 0;
149 const uint8_t DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING = 1;
150 const uint8_t DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE = 2;
151 const uint8_t DAMAGE_TYPE_MISS = 3;
152 const uint8_t DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN = 5;
153 const uint8_t DAMAGE_EXPLICIT_SET = 6;
154 
155 const uint16_t FLAG1_LETHAL = 1;
156 const uint16_t FLAG1_CLENCH = 1 << 2;
157 const uint16_t FLAG1_GUARDED = 1 << 3;
158 const uint16_t FLAG1_COUNTERED = 1 << 4;
159 const uint16_t FLAG1_DODGED = 1 << 5;
160 const uint16_t FLAG1_CRITICAL = 1 << 6;
161 const uint16_t FLAG1_WEAKPOINT = 1 << 7;
162 const uint16_t FLAG1_KNOCKBACK = 1 << 8;
163 const uint16_t FLAG1_RUSH_MOVEMENT = 1 << 14;
164 const uint16_t FLAG1_PROTECT = 1 << 15;
165 
166 // Only displayed with DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING
167 const uint16_t FLAG1_REVIVAL = 1 << 9;
168 const uint16_t FLAG1_ABSORB = 1 << 10;
169 
170 // Only displayed with DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE
171 const uint16_t FLAG1_REFLECT_PHYS = 1 << 9;
172 const uint16_t FLAG1_BLOCK_PHYS = 1 << 10;
173 const uint16_t FLAG1_REFLECT_MAGIC = 1 << 11;
174 const uint16_t FLAG1_BLOCK_MAGIC = 1 << 12;
175 //const uint16_t FLAG1_REFLECT_UNUSED = 1 << 13;
176 
177 const uint16_t FLAG2_CLENCH = 1 << 4;
178 const uint16_t FLAG2_LIMIT_BREAK = 1 << 5;
179 const uint16_t FLAG2_IMPOSSIBLE = 1 << 6;
180 const uint16_t FLAG2_BARRIER = 1 << 7;
181 const uint16_t FLAG2_INTENSIVE_BREAK = 1 << 8;
182 const uint16_t FLAG2_INSTANT_DEATH = 1 << 9;
183 
184 const uint8_t TALK_RESPONSE_1 = 1;
185 //const uint8_t TALK_RESPONSE_2 = 2;
186 //const uint8_t TALK_RESPONSE_3 = 3;
187 const uint8_t TALK_RESPONSE_4 = 4;
188 const uint8_t TALK_JOIN = 5;
189 const uint8_t TALK_GIVE_ITEM = 6;
190 //const uint8_t TALK_STOP = 7;
191 const uint8_t TALK_LEAVE = 8;
192 const uint8_t TALK_JOIN_2 = 9;
193 const uint8_t TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2 = 10;
194 const uint8_t TALK_REJECT = 13;
195 //const uint8_t TALK_THREATENED = 14;
196 
197 const uint8_t RES_OFFSET = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_DEFAULT;
198 const uint8_t BOOST_OFFSET = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::BOOST_DEFAULT;
199 const uint8_t NRA_OFFSET = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::NRA_DEFAULT;
200 const uint8_t AIL_OFFSET = (uint8_t)((uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_FIRE -
201  (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_DEFAULT - 1);
202 
203 class channel::ProcessingSkill
204 {
205 public:
206  uint32_t SkillID = 0;
207  uint16_t FunctionID = 0;
208  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData> Definition;
209  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> Activated;
210  SkillExecutionContext* ExecutionContext = 0;
211  uint8_t BaseAffinity = 0;
212  uint8_t EffectiveAffinity = 0;
213  uint8_t WeaponAffinity = 0;
214  SkillDependencyType_t EffectiveDependencyType = (SkillDependencyType_t)0;
215  uint8_t ExpertiseType = 0;
216  uint8_t ExpertiseRankBoost = 0;
217  uint8_t KnowledgeRank = 0;
218  uint16_t OffenseValue = 0;
219  int32_t AbsoluteDamage = 0;
220  int16_t ChargeReduce = 0;
221  std::unordered_map<int32_t, uint16_t> OffenseValues;
222  bool IsItemSkill = false;
223  bool IsProjectile = false;
224  bool CanNRA = true;
225  uint8_t Nulled = 0;
226  uint8_t Reflected = 0;
227  bool Absorbed = false;
228  uint8_t NRAAffinity = 0;
229  bool HardStrike = false;
230  bool InPvP = false;
231 
232  // Only used for rushes
233  uint64_t RushStartTime = 0;
234  std::shared_ptr<Point> RushStartPoint;
235 
236  std::shared_ptr<Zone> CurrentZone;
237  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> EffectiveSource;
238  std::list<channel::SkillTargetResult> Targets;
239  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> PrimaryTarget;
240  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> SourceExecutionState;
241  std::unordered_map<int32_t,
242  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState>> SourceCalcStates;
243  std::unordered_map<int32_t,
244  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState>> TargetCalcStates;
245 };
246 
247 class channel::SkillTargetResult
248 {
249 public:
250  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> EntityState;
251  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> CalcState;
252  bool PrimaryTarget = false;
253  bool IndirectTarget = false;
254  int32_t Damage1 = 0;
255  uint8_t Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE;
256  int32_t Damage2 = 0;
257  uint8_t Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE;
258  uint16_t Flags1 = 0;
259  uint8_t TalkFlags = 0;
260  uint8_t AilmentDamageType = 0;
261  int32_t AilmentDamage = 0;
262  uint64_t AilmentDamageTime = 0;
263  uint16_t Flags2 = 0;
264  int32_t TechnicalDamage = 0;
265  int32_t PursuitDamage = 0;
266  uint8_t PursuitAffinity = 0;
267  StatusEffectChanges AddedStatuses;
268  std::set<uint32_t> CancelledStatuses;
269  bool HitAvoided = false;
270  uint8_t HitNull = 0; // 0: None, 1: Physical, 2: Magic, 3: Barrier
271  uint8_t HitReflect = 0; // 0: None, 1: Physical, 2: Magic
272  bool HitAbsorb = false;
273  uint8_t NRAAffinity = 0;
274  bool CanHitstun = false;
275  bool CanKnockback = false;
276  bool AutoProtect = false;
277  bool ClenchOverflow = false;
278  uint16_t GuardModifier = 0;
279 
280  uint8_t EffectCancellations = 0;
281  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> RecalcTriggers;
282  bool TalkDone = false;
283 };
284 
285 SkillManager::SkillManager(const std::weak_ptr<ChannelServer>& server)
286  : mServer(server)
287 {
288  // Map unique function skills
289  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_CAMEO] = &SkillManager::Cameo;
290  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_CLOAK] = &SkillManager::Cloak;
291  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_DCM] = &SkillManager::DCM;
292  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_DESPAWN] = &SkillManager::Despawn;
293  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_DESUMMON] = &SkillManager::Desummon;
294  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIGITALIZE] = &SkillManager::Digitalize;
295  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIGITALIZE_CANCEL] = &SkillManager::DigitalizeCancel;
296  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_EQUIP_ITEM] = &SkillManager::EquipItem;
297  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_EXPERT_FORGET_ALL] = &SkillManager::ForgetAllExpertiseSkills;
298  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_FAM_UP] = &SkillManager::FamiliarityUp;
299  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_ITEM_FAM_UP] = &SkillManager::FamiliarityUpItem;
300  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_MINION_DESPAWN] = &SkillManager::MinionDespawn;
301  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_MINION_SPAWN] = &SkillManager::MinionSpawn;
302  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_MOOCH] = &SkillManager::Mooch;
303  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_MOUNT] = &SkillManager::Mount;
304  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_RANDOM_ITEM] = &SkillManager::RandomItem;
305  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_RANDOMIZE] = &SkillManager::Randomize;
306  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_RESPEC] = &SkillManager::Respec;
307  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_REST] = &SkillManager::Rest;
308  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_SPAWN] = &SkillManager::Spawn;
309  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_SPAWN_ZONE] = &SkillManager::SpawnZone;
310  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUMMON_DEMON] = &SkillManager::SummonDemon;
311  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_STORE_DEMON] = &SkillManager::StoreDemon;
312  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO] = &SkillManager::Traesto;
313  mSkillFunctions[(uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[0]] = &SkillManager::Traesto;
314  mSkillFunctions[(uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_DSHINJUKU[0]] = &SkillManager::Traesto;
315  mSkillFunctions[(uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[0]] = &SkillManager::Traesto;
316  mSkillFunctions[(uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_NAKANO_BDOMAIN[0]] = &SkillManager::Traesto;
317  mSkillFunctions[(uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[0]] = &SkillManager::Traesto;
318  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_XP_PARTNER] = &SkillManager::XPUp;
319  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_XP_SELF] = &SkillManager::XPUp;
320 
321  // Map skills that will send a follow up packet after processing
322  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_CLAN_FORM] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
323  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_EQUIP_MOD_EDIT] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
324  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_EXPERT_CLASS_DOWN] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
325  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_EXPERT_FORGET] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
326  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_EXPERT_RANK_DOWN] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
327  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_MAX_DURABILITY_FIXED] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
328  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_MAX_DURABILITY_RANDOM] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
329  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_SPECIAL_REQUEST] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
330  mSkillFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_WARP] = &SkillManager::SpecialSkill;
331 
332  // Map of skills that have special effects after normal processing
333  mSkillEffectFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIGITALIZE_BREAK] = &SkillManager::DigitalizeBreak;
334  mSkillEffectFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_ESTOMA] = &SkillManager::Estoma;
335  mSkillEffectFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_LIBERAMA] = &SkillManager::Liberama;
336  mSkillEffectFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_DIRECT] = &SkillManager::DirectStatus;
337  mSkillEffectFunctions[SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_LIMITED] = &SkillManager::DirectStatus;
338 
339  // Make sure anything not set is not pulled in to the mapping
340  mSkillFunctions.erase(0);
341 }
342 
343 SkillManager::~SkillManager()
344 {
345 }
346 
347 bool SkillManager::ActivateSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
348  uint32_t skillID, int64_t activationObjectID, int64_t targetObjectID,
349  uint8_t targetType, std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
350 {
351  auto server = mServer.lock();
352  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
353  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
354  auto def = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
355  if(nullptr == def)
356  {
357  return false;
358  }
359 
360  auto now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
361  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
362  source->GetEntityID());
363  auto skillBasic = def->GetBasic();
364 
365  // Check for cooldown first
366  source->ExpireStatusTimes(now);
367  if(source->GetSkillCooldowns(skillBasic->GetCooldownID()))
368  {
369  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
370  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::COOLING_DOWN);
371  return false;
372  }
373  else if(source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_LOCKOUT) ||
374  source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_KNOCKBACK))
375  {
376  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
377  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SILENT_FAIL);
378  return false;
379  }
380 
381  // Check additional restrictions
382  if(SkillRestricted(source, def, activationObjectID, ctx))
383  {
384  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
385  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
386  return false;
387  }
388  else if(SkillZoneRestricted(skillID, source->GetZone()))
389  {
390  if(def->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID() == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SPAWN)
391  {
392  // Special error message
393  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
394  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::NOTHING_HAPPENED_HERE);
395  }
396  else
397  {
398  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
399  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::RESTRICED_USE);
400  }
401 
402  return false;
403  }
404  else if(tokuseiManager->AspectValueExists(source,
405  TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_LOCK, (double)skillID))
406  {
407  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
408  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::RESTRICED_USE);
409  return false;
410  }
411 
412  SkillActivationType_t activationType = skillBasic->GetActivationType();
413 
414  auto cast = def->GetCast();
415  auto castBasic = cast->GetBasic();
416  uint32_t defaultChargeTime = castBasic->GetChargeTime();
417 
418  // Auto-use activation skills ALWAYS ignore charge time for AI
419  // despite this making them look weird from player entities when
420  // a charge time is still on the data. Having a charge time on
421  // these is incredibly rare and probably not intentional.
422  bool autoUse = activationType == SkillActivationType_t::INSTANT;
423 
424  auto activated = source->GetActivatedAbility();
425  if(activated && !autoUse)
426  {
427  // Cancel existing first unless it's still pending execution
428  if(activated->GetErrorCode() == -1 &&
429  activated->GetExecutionRequestTime())
430  {
431  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
432  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SILENT_FAIL);
433  return false;
434  }
435 
436  CancelSkill(source, activated->GetActivationID());
437  }
438 
439  if(autoUse)
440  {
441  // Reset default target types as they are typically not provided
442  switch(def->GetTarget()->GetType())
443  {
444  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY:
445  if(targetObjectID <= 0)
446  {
447  targetObjectID = source->GetEntityID();
448  }
449  break;
450  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTNER:
451  {
452  targetObjectID = -1;
453  if(client)
454  {
455  auto dState = client->GetClientState()
456  ->GetDemonState();
457  if(dState->Ready())
458  {
459  targetObjectID = (int64_t)dState->GetEntityID();
460  }
461  }
462  }
463  break;
464  default:
465  break;
466  }
467  }
468 
469  activated = std::make_shared<objects::ActivatedAbility>();
470  activated->SetSkillData(def);
471  activated->SetSourceEntity(source);
472  activated->SetActivationObjectID(activationObjectID);
473  activated->SetTargetObjectID(targetObjectID);
474  activated->SetActivationTargetType(targetType);
475  activated->SetActivationTime(now);
476 
477  if(autoUse)
478  {
479  // Instant activations are technically not activated
480  activated->SetActivationID(-1);
481  }
482  else
483  {
484  activated->SetActivationID(source->GetNextActivatedAbilityID());
485  }
486 
487  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, nullptr);
488  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
489 
490  // Fusion skills have special adjustment restrictions
491  bool fusionSkill = pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DEMON_FUSION;
492 
493  // Stack adjust is affected by 2 sources if not an item skill or just
494  // explicit item including adjustments if it is an item skill
495  // (Ignore activation type special and toggle)
496  uint8_t maxStacks = castBasic->GetUseCount();
497  if((castBasic->GetAdjustRestrictions() & SKILL_FIXED_STACK) == 0 &&
498  !fusionSkill && activationType != SkillActivationType_t::SPECIAL &&
499  activationType != SkillActivationType_t::ON_TOGGLE)
500  {
501  maxStacks = (uint8_t)(maxStacks +
502  tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
503  TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_ITEM_STACK_ADJUST, calcState) +
504  (!pSkill->IsItemSkill ? tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
505  TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_STACK_ADJUST, calcState) : 0));
506  }
507 
508  activated->SetMaxUseCount(maxStacks);
509 
510  uint64_t chargedTime = 0;
511 
512  bool executeNow = autoUse || (defaultChargeTime == 0 &&
513  (activationType == SkillActivationType_t::SPECIAL ||
514  activationType == SkillActivationType_t::ON_TOGGLE));
515 
516  // If the skill is not an autoUse, activate it and calculate
517  // movement speed
518  if(!autoUse)
519  {
520  // If the skill needs to charge, see if any time adjustments exist
521  uint32_t chargeTime = defaultChargeTime;
522  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUMMON_DEMON)
523  {
524  // Summon charge time is unique from all other skills
525  chargeTime = GetSummonSpeed(pSkill, client);
526  if(!chargeTime)
527  {
528  SendFailure(source, skillID, client,
529  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
530  return false;
531  }
532 
533  executeNow = false;
534  }
535  else if(chargeTime > 0 && !fusionSkill &&
536  (castBasic->GetAdjustRestrictions() & SKILL_FIXED_CHARGE) == 0)
537  {
538  int16_t chargeAdjust = (int16_t)(source->GetCorrectValue(
539  CorrectTbl::CHANT_TIME, calcState) -
540  (pSkill->ChargeReduce / 10));
541  if(chargeAdjust < 0)
542  {
543  chargeAdjust = 0;
544  }
545 
546  if(chargeAdjust != 100)
547  {
548  chargeTime = (uint32_t)ceill(chargeTime *
549  (chargeAdjust * 0.01));
550  }
551  }
552 
553  // Charge time is in milliseconds, convert to microseconds
554  chargedTime = now + (chargeTime * 1000);
555 
556  activated->SetChargedTime(chargedTime);
557 
558  auto speeds = GetMovementSpeeds(source, def);
559  activated->SetChargeMoveSpeed(speeds.first);
560  activated->SetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed(speeds.second);
561 
562  source->SetActivatedAbility(activated);
563 
564  if(pSkill->FunctionID)
565  {
566  if(mSkillFunctions.find(pSkill->FunctionID) != mSkillFunctions.end())
567  {
568  // Set special activation and let the respective skill handle it
569  source->SetSpecialActivations(activated->GetActivationID(),
570  activated);
571  }
572  }
573 
574  SendActivateSkill(pSkill);
575 
576  if(!executeNow && def->GetCondition()->GetActiveMPDrain() > 0)
577  {
578  // Start pre-cast upkeep
579  activated->SetUpkeepCost(def->GetCondition()->GetActiveMPDrain());
580  source->ResetUpkeep();
581  }
582  }
583 
584  if(executeNow)
585  {
586  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, skillID]()
587  {
588  return libcomp::String("%1 instantly executes skill %2.\n")
589  .Arg(source->GetEntityLabel()).Arg(skillID);
590  });
591 
592  if(!ExecuteSkill(source, activated, client, ctx))
593  {
594  return false;
595  }
596  }
597  else
598  {
599  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, skillID, activated]()
600  {
601  return libcomp::String("%1 activates skill %2[%3].\n")
602  .Arg(source->GetEntityLabel()).Arg(skillID)
603  .Arg(activated->GetActivationID());
604  });
605 
606  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_CHARGING, chargedTime);
607 
608  if(activationType == SkillActivationType_t::SPECIAL ||
609  activationType == SkillActivationType_t::ON_TOGGLE)
610  {
611  // Special/toggle activation skills with a charge time execute
612  // automatically when the charge time completes
613  server->ScheduleWork(chargedTime, [](
614  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelServer> pServer,
615  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> pSource,
616  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> pActivated,
617  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> pClient)
618  {
619  auto pSkillManager = pServer->GetSkillManager();
620  if(pSkillManager)
621  {
622  pSkillManager->ExecuteSkill(pSource, pActivated,
623  pClient, nullptr, true);
624  }
625  }, server, source, activated, client);
626  }
627  else if(cast->GetCancel()->GetAutoCancelTime())
628  {
629  ScheduleAutoCancel(source, activated);
630  }
631  }
632 
633  return true;
634 }
635 
636 bool SkillManager::TargetSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
637  int64_t targetObjectID)
638 {
639  bool success = true;
640 
641  auto activated = source->GetActivatedAbility();
642  if(!activated)
643  {
644  success = false;
645  }
646  else if(activated->GetExecutionTime() && activated->GetErrorCode() == -1)
647  {
648  success = false;
649  }
650  else
651  {
652  activated->SetTargetObjectID(targetObjectID);
653  }
654 
655  // No packet response here
656 
657  return success;
658 }
659 
660 bool SkillManager::ExecuteSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
661  int8_t activationID, int64_t targetObjectID, std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
662 {
663  auto client = mServer.lock()->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
664  source->GetEntityID());
665 
666  bool success = true;
667 
668  auto activated = GetActivation(source, activationID);
669  if(!activated)
670  {
671  success = false;
672  }
673  else
674  {
675  // Check if its currently being used or not ready to execute again
676  bool notReady = activated->GetExecutionRequestTime() &&
677  !activated->GetHitTime() && activated->GetErrorCode() == -1;
678  if(!notReady)
679  {
680  source->ExpireStatusTimes(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
681  notReady = source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_LOCKOUT) ||
682  source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_KNOCKBACK);
683  }
684 
685  if(notReady)
686  {
687  SendFailure(source, activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()
688  ->GetID(), client, (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SILENT_FAIL);
689  return false;
690  }
691 
692  activated->SetTargetObjectID(targetObjectID);
693  }
694 
695  if(success && !ExecuteSkill(source, activated, client, ctx))
696  {
697  success = false;
698  }
699 
700  return success;
701 }
702 
703 bool SkillManager::ExecuteSkill(std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
704  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
705  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
706  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx, bool delayedAuto)
707 {
708  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
709  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
710  if(nullptr == zone)
711  {
712  LogSkillManagerErrorMsg(
713  "Skill activation attempted outside of a zone.\n");
714 
715  SendFailure(activated, client,
716  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
717  return false;
718  }
719  else if(activated->GetCancelled())
720  {
721  if(!delayedAuto)
722  {
723  SendFailure(activated, client,
724  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
725  }
726 
727  return false;
728  }
729 
730  bool invalidSource = !source;
731  if(!invalidSource)
732  {
733  // The source must be ready and in the active state
734  invalidSource = !source->Ready(true) ||
735  source->GetDisplayState() != ActiveDisplayState_t::ACTIVE;
736  }
737 
738  if(invalidSource)
739  {
740  auto state = client ? client->GetClientState() : nullptr;
741  if(state)
742  {
743  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
744  {
745  return libcomp::String("Invalid source player entity"
746  " attempted to use skill %1: %2\n")
747  .Arg(skillData->GetCommon()->GetID())
748  .Arg(state->GetAccountUID().ToString());
749  });
750  }
751 
752  SendFailure(activated, client,
753  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::CONDITION_RESTRICT);
754  return false;
755  }
756  else if(!source->IsAlive())
757  {
758  // Do not actually execute
759  SendFailure(activated, client,
760  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
761  return false;
762  }
763 
764  uint16_t functionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
765  uint8_t skillCategory = skillData->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory();
766 
767  if(skillCategory == SKILL_CATEGORY_PASSIVE || SkillRestricted(
768  source, skillData, activated->GetActivationObjectID(), ctx))
769  {
770  SendFailure(activated, client, (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
771  return false;
772  }
773  else if(mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager()->AspectValueExists(source,
774  TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_LOCK, (double)skillData->GetCommon()->GetID()))
775  {
776  // Skill may have been locked between activation and execution
777  SendFailure(activated, client,
778  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::RESTRICED_USE);
779  return false;
780  }
781 
782  if(functionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_MOUNT && source->IsMounted())
783  {
784  SendFailure(activated, client,
785  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_OTHER_SKILL_RESTRICT);
786  return false;
787  }
788 
789  // Check FID skill restrictions
790  if(functionID)
791  {
792  if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_RESTRICTED ||
793  functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_RESTRICTED_ITEM)
794  {
795  // Restricted to certain instances which are stored in the
796  // group format meaning the smallest two digits are irrelavent
797  bool valid = false;
798 
799  auto instance = zone->GetInstance();
800  uint32_t instGroup = (uint32_t)((instance
801  ? instance->GetDefinition()->GetID() : 0) / 100);
802 
803  for(int32_t param : skillData->GetSpecial()
804  ->GetSpecialParams())
805  {
806  if(param > 0 && (uint32_t)param == instGroup)
807  {
808  valid = true;
809  break;
810  }
811  }
812 
813  if(!valid)
814  {
815  SendFailure(activated, client,
816  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::LOCATION_RESTRICT);
817  return false;
818  }
819  }
820  else if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_RESTRICTED ||
821  functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_LIMITED)
822  {
823  // Source cannot have the specified status effect(s)
824  for(int32_t param : skillData->GetSpecial()
825  ->GetSpecialParams())
826  {
827  if(param > 0 && source->StatusEffectActive((uint32_t)param))
828  {
829  SendFailure(activated, client,
830  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
831  return false;
832  }
833  }
834  }
835  }
836 
837  // Stop skills that are demon only instance restricted when not in one
838  // as well as non-restricted skills used by an invalid player entity
839  bool demonOnlyInst = zone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::DEMON_ONLY;
840  bool instRestrict = skillData->GetBasic()->GetFamily() ==
841  SkillFamily_t::DEMON_SOLO;
842  if((instRestrict && !demonOnlyInst) ||
843  (!instRestrict && demonOnlyInst && client &&
844  source->GetEntityType() != EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON))
845  {
846  SendFailure(activated, client,
847  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ZONE_INVALID);
848  return false;
849  }
850 
851  // Check targets
852  auto targetType = skillData->GetTarget()->GetType();
853  bool checkTargets = targetType != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE &&
854  functionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_TARGET_ALL;
855 
856  // Verify the target now
857  if(checkTargets && targetType != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OBJECT)
858  {
859  // Normal target invalidation reasons do not print an error
860  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
861  if(targetEntityID <= 0)
862  {
863  SendFailure(activated, client);
864  return false;
865  }
866 
867  auto targetEntity = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
868 
869  int8_t errCode = ValidateSkillTarget(source, skillData,
870  targetEntity);
871  if(errCode != -1)
872  {
873  SendFailure(activated, client, (uint8_t)errCode);
874  return false;
875  }
876 
877  // Line of sight required for primary target
878  if(!source->HasLineOfSight(targetEntity))
879  {
880  SendFailure(activated, client);
881  return false;
882  }
883 
884  activated->SetEntityTargeted(true);
885 
886  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, activated, targetEntity]()
887  {
888  return libcomp::String("%1 executes skill %2[%3] targeting %4.\n")
889  .Arg(source->GetEntityLabel())
890  .Arg(activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()->GetID())
891  .Arg(activated->GetActivationID())
892  .Arg(targetEntity->GetEntityLabel());
893  });
894  }
895  else
896  {
897  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, activated]()
898  {
899  return libcomp::String("%1 executes skill %2[%3].\n")
900  .Arg(source->GetEntityLabel())
901  .Arg(activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()->GetID())
902  .Arg(activated->GetActivationID());
903  });
904  }
905 
906  // Make sure we have an execution context
907  if(!ctx)
908  {
909  ctx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
910  }
911 
912  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
913  pSkill->SourceExecutionState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
914 
915  if(!DetermineCosts(source, activated, client, ctx))
916  {
917  return false;
918  }
919 
920  // Reset anything that may have happened from previous attempt
921  activated->SetErrorCode(-1);
922 
923  activated->SetExecutionRequestTime(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
924  source->RefreshCurrentPosition(activated->GetExecutionTime());
925 
926  // Execute the skill
927  auto fIter = mSkillFunctions.find(pSkill->FunctionID);
928  if(fIter == mSkillFunctions.end())
929  {
930  switch(skillCategory)
931  {
932  case SKILL_CATEGORY_ACTIVE:
933  return ExecuteNormalSkill(client, activated, ctx);
934  case SKILL_CATEGORY_SWITCH:
935  return ToggleSwitchSkill(client, activated, ctx);
936  case SKILL_CATEGORY_PASSIVE:
937  default:
938  SendFailure(activated, client,
939  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
940  return false;
941  }
942  }
943 
944  bool success = fIter->second(*this, activated, ctx, client);
945  if(success)
946  {
947  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
948  FinalizeSkill(ctx, activated);
949  }
950  else
951  {
952  // Skip finalization if performing an instant activation
953  if(skillData->GetBasic()->GetActivationType() !=
954  SkillActivationType_t::INSTANT)
955  {
956  // Clear skill first as it can affect movement speed
957  source->SetActivatedAbility(nullptr);
958  source->ResetUpkeep();
959 
960  SendCompleteSkill(activated, 1);
961  }
962  }
963 
964  return success;
965 }
966 
967 bool SkillManager::CancelSkill(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
968  int8_t activationID, uint8_t cancelType)
969 {
970  auto activated = GetActivation(source, activationID);
971  if(!activated)
972  {
973  return false;
974  }
975  else
976  {
977  // If the skill is a special toggle, fire its function again
978  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
979  auto functionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
980  auto fIter = mSkillFunctions.find(functionID);
981  if(fIter != mSkillFunctions.end() &&
982  skillData->GetBasic()->GetActivationType() ==
983  SkillActivationType_t::ON_TOGGLE)
984  {
985  auto ctx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
986  auto client = mServer.lock()->GetManagerConnection()
987  ->GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
988  fIter->second(*this, activated, ctx, client);
989  }
990 
991  // A skill is considered hit cancelled if its pending a hit
992  bool hitCancel = !activated->GetCancelled() &&
993  activated->GetHitTime();
994 
995  // If any executions have occurred, the cooldown needs to be activated
996  if(activated->GetExecuteCount() > 0)
997  {
998  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, nullptr);
999  SetSkillCompleteState(pSkill, false);
1000  }
1001  else
1002  {
1003  // Make sure to cancel the skill even if it didn't execute
1004  activated->SetCancelled(true);
1005  }
1006 
1007  if(hitCancel)
1008  {
1009  // Hit cancellations need to send an empty skill report or the
1010  // player who used the skill will display a visual effect bug
1011  // the next time the activation ID rolls around
1012  libcomp::Packet notify;
1013  notify.WritePacketCode(
1014  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_REPORTS);
1015  notify.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
1016  notify.WriteU32Little(activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()
1017  ->GetID());
1018  notify.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
1019  notify.WriteU32Little(0); // Nothing hit
1020 
1021  mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(source
1022  ->GetZone(), notify);
1023 
1024  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, activated]()
1025  {
1026  return libcomp::String("%1 skill %2[%3] has been hit"
1027  " cancelled.\n").Arg(source->GetEntityLabel())
1028  .Arg(activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()->GetID())
1029  .Arg(activated->GetActivationID());
1030  });
1031  }
1032  else
1033  {
1034  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, activated]()
1035  {
1036  return libcomp::String("%1 cancels skill %2[%3].\n")
1037  .Arg(source->GetEntityLabel())
1038  .Arg(activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()->GetID())
1039  .Arg(activated->GetActivationID());
1040  });
1041  }
1042 
1043  if(source->GetSpecialActivations(activationID) == activated)
1044  {
1045  source->RemoveSpecialActivations(activationID);
1046  }
1047 
1048  if(source->GetActivatedAbility() == activated)
1049  {
1050  source->SetActivatedAbility(nullptr);
1051  source->ResetUpkeep();
1052  }
1053 
1054  SendCompleteSkill(activated, cancelType);
1055  return true;
1056  }
1057 }
1058 
1059 void SkillManager::SendFailure(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
1060  uint32_t skillID, const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
1061  uint8_t errorCode, int8_t activationID)
1062 {
1063  libcomp::Packet p;
1064  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_FAILED);
1065  p.WriteS32Little(source ? source->GetEntityID() : -1);
1066  p.WriteU32Little(skillID);
1067  p.WriteS8(activationID);
1068  p.WriteU8(0); // Unknown (values seen: 0, 1, 2)
1069  p.WriteU8(errorCode);
1070  p.WriteS32Little(-1); // Target entity ID, doesn't seem to be used
1071 
1072  if(client)
1073  {
1074  client->SendPacket(p);
1075  }
1076  else if(source)
1077  {
1078  auto zone = source->GetZone();
1079  if(zone)
1080  {
1081  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
1082  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
1083  }
1084  }
1085 }
1086 
1087 bool SkillManager::SkillRestricted(
1088  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
1089  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData>& skillData,
1090  int64_t activationObjectID, std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
1091 {
1092  bool playerEntity = source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
1093  source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON;
1094  if(playerEntity && (!ctx || !ctx->IgnoreAvailable))
1095  {
1096  // Player entities need to have proper availability to the skill
1097  bool available = true;
1098  switch(skillData->GetBasic()->GetFamily())
1099  {
1100  case SkillFamily_t::NORMAL:
1101  case SkillFamily_t::MAGIC:
1102  case SkillFamily_t::SPECIAL:
1103  // Normal availability required
1104  available = source->CurrentSkillsContains(skillData->GetCommon()
1105  ->GetID());
1106  break;
1107  case SkillFamily_t::FUSION: // Should be prepared elsewhere
1108  default: // Handle item skills etc via their cost
1109  break;
1110  }
1111 
1112  if(!available && source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
1113  {
1114  // Allow if its a digitalized demon skill
1115  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(source);
1116  auto dgState = cState ? cState->GetDigitalizeState() : nullptr;
1117  available = dgState && dgState->ActiveSkillsContains(
1118  skillData->GetCommon()->GetID());
1119  }
1120 
1121  if(!available)
1122  {
1123  // If not otherwise available, check to see if it is the use skill
1124  // from an item that is the activation target
1125  bool isUseSkill = false;
1126  if(activationObjectID > 0)
1127  {
1128  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(source
1129  ->GetEntityID());
1130  if(state)
1131  {
1132  auto item = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Item>(
1133  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
1134  state->GetObjectUUID(activationObjectID)));
1135  if(item)
1136  {
1137  auto itemDef = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager()
1138  ->GetItemData(item->GetType());
1139 
1140  isUseSkill = itemDef && itemDef->GetPossession()
1141  ->GetUseSkill() == skillData->GetCommon()->GetID();
1142  }
1143  }
1144  }
1145 
1146  if(!isUseSkill)
1147  {
1148  return true;
1149  }
1150  }
1151  }
1152 
1153  if(skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID() ==
1154  SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIASPORA_QUAKE)
1155  {
1156  // The current state of the source is not checked for quakes, they
1157  // just need to be alive when processed
1158  return false;
1159  }
1160 
1161  if(source->StatusRestrictActCount() > 0)
1162  {
1163  return true;
1164  }
1165 
1166  if(IsTalkSkill(skillData, true) && source->StatusRestrictTalkCount() > 0)
1167  {
1168  return true;
1169  }
1170 
1171  auto zone = source->GetZone();
1172  if(zone)
1173  {
1174  // Player entities can by restricted by bases in the zone
1175  if(playerEntity)
1176  {
1177  auto restricted = zone->GetBaseRestrictedActionTypes();
1178  if(restricted.size() > 0)
1179  {
1180  int8_t actionType = (int8_t)skillData->GetBasic()
1181  ->GetActionType();
1182  if(restricted.find(actionType) != restricted.end())
1183  {
1184  return true;
1185  }
1186 
1187  // Check if an item skill is being used
1188  auto family = skillData->GetBasic()->GetFamily();
1189  if(restricted.find(-1) != restricted.end() &&
1190  (family == SkillFamily_t::ITEM ||
1191  family == SkillFamily_t::DEMON_SOLO))
1192  {
1193  return true;
1194  }
1195  }
1196  }
1197 
1198  // Make sure we're not PvP restricted
1199  switch(skillData->GetPvp()->GetPVPRestriction())
1200  {
1201  case objects::MiSkillPvPData::PVPRestriction_t::PVP_ONLY:
1202  if(zone && zone->GetInstanceType() != InstanceType_t::PVP)
1203  {
1204  return true;
1205  }
1206  break;
1207  case objects::MiSkillPvPData::PVPRestriction_t::PVP_RESTRICTED:
1208  if(zone && zone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::PVP)
1209  {
1210  return true;
1211  }
1212  break;
1213  default:
1214  break;
1215  }
1216  }
1217 
1218  auto restr = skillData->GetCondition()->GetRestriction();
1219  if(source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
1220  {
1221  // Check character specific restrictions
1222  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(source);
1223 
1224  // Verify if the weapon type is valid
1225  auto weapon = cState->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems(
1226  (size_t)objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_WEAPON);
1227  auto weaponDef = weapon ? mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager()
1228  ->GetItemData(weapon->GetType()) : nullptr;
1229  if(weapon && !weaponDef)
1230  {
1231  // Sanity check, not a problem to solve here
1232  return true;
1233  }
1234 
1235  // "No weapon" counts as close range
1236  bool longRange = weaponDef && weaponDef->GetBasic()->GetWeaponType()
1237  == objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE;
1238 
1239  // Check normal and digi restriction (no special logic in case they
1240  // somehow have a digi only skill when not digi'd)
1241  if(restr->GetWeaponType() != objects::MiRestrictionData::
1242  WeaponType_t::NONE &&
1243  (longRange != (restr->GetWeaponType() == objects::
1244  MiRestrictionData::WeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE)))
1245  {
1246  return true;
1247  }
1248  else if(restr->GetDigitizeWeaponType() != objects::MiRestrictionData::
1249  DigitizeWeaponType_t::NONE &&
1250  (longRange != (restr->GetDigitizeWeaponType() == objects::
1251  MiRestrictionData::DigitizeWeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE)))
1252  {
1253  return true;
1254  }
1255 
1256  // Check LNC restrictions
1257  if(restr->GetLNC() != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::ALL)
1258  {
1259  auto lType = restr->GetLNC();
1260  switch(cState->GetLNCType())
1261  {
1262  case LNC_LAW:
1263  if(lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::LAW &&
1264  lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::NEUTRAL_LAW &&
1265  lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::CHAOS_LAW)
1266  {
1267  return true;
1268  }
1269  break;
1270  case LNC_NEUTRAL:
1271  if(lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::NEUTRAL &&
1272  lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::NEUTRAL_LAW &&
1273  lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::CHAOS_NEUTRAL)
1274  {
1275  return true;
1276  }
1277  break;
1278  case LNC_CHAOS:
1279  if(lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::CHAOS &&
1280  lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::CHAOS_LAW &&
1281  lType != objects::MiRestrictionData::LNC_t::CHAOS_NEUTRAL)
1282  {
1283  return true;
1284  }
1285  break;
1286  default:
1287  break;
1288  }
1289  }
1290  }
1291 
1292  switch(skillData->GetBasic()->GetFamily())
1293  {
1294  case SkillFamily_t::NORMAL:
1295  return source->StatusRestrictSpecialCount() > 0;
1296  case SkillFamily_t::MAGIC:
1297  return source->StatusRestrictMagicCount() > 0;
1298  default:
1299  return false;
1300  }
1301 }
1302 
1303 bool SkillManager::SkillZoneRestricted(uint32_t skillID,
1304  const std::shared_ptr<Zone> zone)
1305 {
1306  if(!zone)
1307  {
1308  return true;
1309  }
1310 
1311  auto instance = zone->GetInstance();
1312  auto variant = instance ? instance->GetVariant() : nullptr;
1313  bool whitelistOnly = variant && variant->GetWhitelistSkillsOnly();
1314 
1315  bool blacklisted = zone->GetDefinition()->SkillBlacklistContains(skillID);
1316  bool whitelisted = zone->GetDefinition()->SkillWhitelistContains(skillID);
1317 
1318  auto globalDef = mServer.lock()->GetServerDataManager()
1319  ->GetZonePartialData(0);
1320  if(globalDef)
1321  {
1322  blacklisted |= globalDef->SkillBlacklistContains(skillID);
1323  whitelisted |= globalDef->SkillWhitelistContains(skillID);
1324  }
1325 
1326  return whitelistOnly ? !whitelisted : (blacklisted && !whitelisted);
1327 
1328 }
1329 
1330 bool SkillManager::TargetInRange(
1331  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
1332  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData>& skillData,
1333  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1334 {
1335  if(!target)
1336  {
1337  return false;
1338  }
1339  else if(target == source)
1340  {
1341  // Sanity check
1342  return true;
1343  }
1344 
1345  target->RefreshCurrentPosition(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
1346 
1347  float distance = source->GetDistance(target->GetCurrentX(),
1348  target->GetCurrentY());
1349 
1350  // Occasionally the client will send requests from distances SLIGHTLY off
1351  // from the allowed range but seemingly only from the partner demon. Allow
1352  // it up to the source hitbox size.
1353  uint32_t maxTargetRange = (uint32_t)(SKILL_DISTANCE_OFFSET +
1354  (target->GetHitboxSize() * 10) +
1355  (source->GetHitboxSize() * 10) +
1356  (uint32_t)(skillData->GetTarget()->GetRange() * 10));
1357 
1358  return (float)maxTargetRange >= distance;
1359 }
1360 
1361 int8_t SkillManager::ValidateSkillTarget(
1362  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
1363  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData>& skillData,
1364  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
1365 {
1366  if(!target)
1367  {
1368  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SILENT_FAIL;
1369  }
1370 
1371  // Target must be ready (ignore display state for skills targeting
1372  // hidden sources)
1373  if(!target->Ready(target == source &&
1374  source->GetDisplayState() == ActiveDisplayState_t::ACTIVE))
1375  {
1376  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID;
1377  }
1378 
1379  uint16_t functionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
1380  if(functionID)
1381  {
1382  // Check FID target state restrictions
1383  bool valid = true;
1384  if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_GENDER_RESTRICTED)
1385  {
1386  valid = (int32_t)target->GetGender() ==
1387  skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams(0);
1388  }
1389  else if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SLEEP_RESTRICTED)
1390  {
1391  valid = target->StatusEffectActive(SVR_CONST.STATUS_SLEEP);
1392  }
1393 
1394  if(!valid)
1395  {
1396  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID;
1397  }
1398  }
1399 
1400  bool targetAlive = target->IsAlive();
1401  bool allies = source->SameFaction(target);
1402  auto targetEntityType = target->GetEntityType();
1403  if(IsTalkSkill(skillData, true))
1404  {
1405  if(targetEntityType != EntityType_t::ENEMY)
1406  {
1407  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TALK_INVALID;
1408  }
1409 
1410  auto enemyState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(
1411  target);
1412  auto enemy = enemyState ? enemyState->GetEntity() : nullptr;
1413  auto spawn = enemy ? enemy->GetSpawnSource() : nullptr;
1414 
1415  // Non-spawn and 100% talk resist enemies cannot be
1416  // negotiated with
1417  if(!spawn || spawn->GetTalkResist() >= 100)
1418  {
1419  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TALK_INVALID;
1420  }
1421 
1422  // Talk restrictions apply to source and target
1423  if(target->StatusRestrictTalkCount() > 0)
1424  {
1425  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TALK_INVALID_STATE;
1426  }
1427 
1428  if((spawn->GetTalkResults() & SPAWN_TALK_RESULT_JOIN) == 0)
1429  {
1430  // If an enemy can't join, fail if auto-join skill
1431  auto talkDamage = skillData->GetDamage()
1432  ->GetNegotiationDamage();
1433  if(!talkDamage->GetSuccessAffability() &&
1434  !talkDamage->GetFailureAffability() &&
1435  !talkDamage->GetSuccessFear() &&
1436  !talkDamage->GetFailureFear())
1437  {
1438  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID;
1439  }
1440  }
1441 
1442  int8_t targetLvl = target->GetLevel();
1443  if(targetLvl > source->GetLevel())
1444  {
1445  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TALK_LEVEL;
1446  }
1447 
1448  if(!functionID)
1449  {
1450  // No FID, talk skills use level requirements in the params
1451  auto params = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
1452  if((params[0] && params[0] > (int32_t)targetLvl) ||
1453  (params[1] && params[1] < (int32_t)targetLvl))
1454  {
1455  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID;
1456  }
1457  }
1458  }
1459 
1460  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(source
1461  ->GetEntityID());
1462  auto targetState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(target
1463  ->GetEntityID());
1464 
1465  bool targetInvalid = false;
1466  bool targetLivingStateInvalid = !targetAlive;
1467  switch(skillData->GetTarget()->GetType())
1468  {
1469  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY:
1470  targetInvalid = !allies;
1471  break;
1472  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_ALLY:
1473  targetInvalid = !allies;
1474  targetLivingStateInvalid = targetAlive;
1475  if(!targetInvalid)
1476  {
1477  // If reviving and the target is a character (or demon in a
1478  // demon only instance) and they have not accepted revival,
1479  // stop here
1480  bool isRevive = false;
1481  switch(skillData->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage()->GetFormula())
1482  {
1483  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_NORMAL:
1484  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_STATIC:
1485  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_MAX_PERCENT:
1486  isRevive = true;
1487  break;
1488  default:
1489  break;
1490  }
1491 
1492  auto targetClientState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
1493  target->GetEntityID());
1494  auto zone = target->GetZone();
1495  if(isRevive && targetClientState && zone)
1496  {
1497  targetInvalid = !targetClientState->GetAcceptRevival() &&
1498  (targetClientState->GetCharacterState() == target ||
1499  (targetClientState->GetDemonState() == target &&
1500  zone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::DEMON_ONLY));
1501  }
1502  }
1503  break;
1504  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTNER:
1505  targetInvalid = !sourceState ||
1506  sourceState->GetCharacterState() != source ||
1507  sourceState->GetDemonState() != target;
1508  break;
1509  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTY:
1510  targetInvalid = !sourceState || !targetState ||
1511  (sourceState->GetPartyID() &&
1512  sourceState->GetPartyID() != targetState->GetPartyID()) ||
1513  (!sourceState->GetPartyID() && sourceState != targetState);
1514  break;
1515  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ENEMY:
1516  targetInvalid = allies || !targetAlive;
1517  break;
1518  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_PARTNER:
1519  targetInvalid = !sourceState ||
1520  sourceState->GetCharacterState() != source ||
1521  sourceState->GetDemonState() != target;
1522  targetLivingStateInvalid = targetAlive;
1523  break;
1524  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_PLAYER:
1525  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
1526  sourceState == targetState || !allies;
1527  break;
1528  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_DEMON:
1529  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON ||
1530  (sourceState &&
1531  sourceState->GetDemonState() != target) || !allies;
1532  break;
1533  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_PLAYER:
1534  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
1535  !allies;
1536  break;
1537  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_DEMON:
1538  targetInvalid = targetEntityType != EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON ||
1539  !allies;
1540  break;
1541  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PLAYER:
1542  targetInvalid = !sourceState ||
1543  (sourceState->GetCharacterState() != target &&
1544  sourceState->GetDemonState() != target);
1545  break;
1546  default:
1547  break;
1548  }
1549 
1550  if(targetInvalid)
1551  {
1552  if(target == source)
1553  {
1554  // The client has a very strange habit of setting the target
1555  // as yourself for skills that should never hit you if no
1556  // valid target exists (maybe a side effect of ally buff skills
1557  // that don't NEED a target)
1558  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SILENT_FAIL;
1559  }
1560  else
1561  {
1562  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID;
1563  }
1564  }
1565  else if(targetLivingStateInvalid)
1566  {
1567  // No message here or skill spammers would be spammed in return
1568  return (int8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SILENT_FAIL;
1569  }
1570 
1571  return -1;
1572 }
1573 
1574 bool SkillManager::ValidateActivationItem(
1575  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
1576  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>& item)
1577 {
1578  if(!item || (item->GetRentalExpiration() > 0 &&
1579  item->GetRentalExpiration() < (uint32_t)std::time(0)))
1580  {
1581  // Check if the item is invalid or it is an expired rental
1582  return false;
1583  }
1584  else
1585  {
1586  // Check if its use restricted (applies to equipping too)
1587  bool valid = true;
1588 
1589  auto definitionManager = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager();
1590  auto itemDef = definitionManager->GetItemData(item->GetType());
1591  if(!itemDef)
1592  {
1593  return false;
1594  }
1595 
1596  auto restr = itemDef->GetRestriction();
1597  if(restr->GetLevel())
1598  {
1599  if(restr->GetLevel() > 100)
1600  {
1601  // Level must be less than or equal to limit - 100
1602  valid &= source->GetLevel() <= (int8_t)(
1603  restr->GetLevel() - 100);
1604  }
1605  else
1606  {
1607  // Level must be greater than or equal to limit
1608  valid &= source->GetLevel() >= (int8_t)restr->GetLevel();
1609  }
1610  }
1611 
1612  switch(restr->GetAlignment())
1613  {
1614  case objects::MiUseRestrictionsData::Alignment_t::LAW:
1615  valid &= source->GetLNCType() == LNC_LAW;
1616  break;
1617  case objects::MiUseRestrictionsData::Alignment_t::
1618  NEUTRAL:
1619  valid &= source->GetLNCType() == LNC_NEUTRAL;
1620  break;
1621  case objects::MiUseRestrictionsData::Alignment_t::CHAOS:
1622  valid &= source->GetLNCType() == LNC_CHAOS;
1623  break;
1624  default:
1625  break;
1626  }
1627 
1628  if(restr->GetGender() != GENDER_NA)
1629  {
1630  valid &= source->GetGender() == restr->GetGender();
1631  }
1632 
1633  auto pvp = itemDef->GetPvp();
1634  if(pvp->GetGPRequirement() > 0)
1635  {
1636  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(source
1637  ->GetEntityID());
1638  if(state)
1639  {
1640  auto pvpData = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity()
1641  ->GetPvPData().Get();
1642  valid &= pvpData && pvpData->GetGP() >=
1643  pvp->GetGPRequirement();
1644  }
1645  else
1646  {
1647  valid = false;
1648  }
1649  }
1650 
1651  return valid;
1652  }
1653 }
1654 
1655 bool SkillManager::SkillHasMoreUses(
1656  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated)
1657 {
1658  return activated &&
1659  activated->GetExecuteCount() < activated->GetMaxUseCount();
1660 }
1661 
1662 std::pair<float, float> SkillManager::GetMovementSpeeds(
1663  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
1664  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData>& skillData)
1665 {
1666  float chargeSpeed = 0.f, chargeCompleteSpeed = 0.f;
1667 
1668  // Send movement speed based off skill action type
1669  switch(skillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
1670  {
1671  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SPIN:
1672  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RAPID:
1673  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::COUNTER:
1674  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE:
1675  // No movement during or after
1676  break;
1677  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SHOT:
1678  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
1679  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
1680  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
1681  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SUPPORT:
1682  // Move after only
1683  chargeCompleteSpeed = source->GetMovementSpeed(true);
1684  break;
1685  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD:
1686  // Move during and after charge (1/2 normal speed)
1687  chargeSpeed = chargeCompleteSpeed = (source->GetMovementSpeed(true) *
1688  0.5f);
1689  break;
1690  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::ATTACK:
1691  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH:
1692  default:
1693  // Move during and after charge (normal speed)
1694  chargeSpeed = chargeCompleteSpeed = source->GetMovementSpeed(true);
1695  break;
1696  }
1697 
1698  if(skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID() == SVR_CONST.SKILL_REST)
1699  {
1700  // Rest has a special no movement rule after charging
1701  chargeCompleteSpeed = 0;
1702  }
1703 
1704  return std::make_pair(chargeSpeed, chargeCompleteSpeed);
1705 }
1706 
1707 bool SkillManager::PrepareFusionSkill(
1708  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
1709  uint32_t& skillID, int32_t targetEntityID, int64_t mainDemonID,
1710  int64_t compDemonID)
1711 {
1712  if(!client)
1713  {
1714  return false;
1715  }
1716 
1717  auto state = client->GetClientState();
1718  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
1719  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
1720  auto zone = state->GetZone();
1721 
1722  if(!zone)
1723  {
1724  return false;
1725  }
1726 
1727  auto server = mServer.lock();
1728  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
1729 
1730  // If the executing skill is not the expected type, fail now
1731  auto skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
1732  if(!skillData || skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID() !=
1733  SVR_CONST.SKILL_DEMON_FUSION_EXECUTE)
1734  {
1735  SendFailure(cState, skillID, client,
1736  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ACTIVATION_FAILURE);
1737  return false;
1738  }
1739 
1740  auto demon1 = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
1741  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
1742  state->GetObjectUUID(mainDemonID)));
1743  auto demon2 = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
1744  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
1745  state->GetObjectUUID(compDemonID)));
1746 
1747  // Both demons needed, first summoned, alive, nearby and not using
1748  // a skill, second in COMP
1749  auto comp = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity()->GetCOMP();
1750  if(!demon1 || !demon2 || dState->GetEntity() != demon1 ||
1751  comp.GetUUID() != demon2->GetDemonBox() ||
1752  dState->GetActivatedAbility())
1753  {
1754  SendFailure(cState, skillID, client,
1755  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ACTIVATION_FAILURE);
1756  return false;
1757  }
1758  else if(!dState->IsAlive())
1759  {
1760  SendFailure(cState, skillID, client,
1761  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
1762  return false;
1763  }
1764 
1765  // Demons in valid state, determine skill type
1766  uint32_t demonType1 = demon1->GetType();
1767  uint32_t demonType2 = demon2->GetType();
1768 
1769  auto demon1Data = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demonType1);
1770  auto demon2Data = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demonType2);
1771 
1772  uint32_t baseDemonType1 = demon1Data->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID();
1773  uint32_t baseDemonType2 = demon2Data->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID();
1774 
1775  // If any special pairings exist for the two demons, use that skill
1776  bool specialSkill = false;
1777  for(uint32_t fSkillID : definitionManager->GetDevilFusionIDsByDemonID(
1778  demonType1))
1779  {
1780  bool valid = true;
1781 
1782  auto fusionData = definitionManager->GetDevilFusionData(fSkillID);
1783  for(uint32_t demonType : fusionData->GetRequiredDemons())
1784  {
1785  auto demonDef = definitionManager->GetDevilData(
1786  demonType);
1787  if(demonDef)
1788  {
1789  uint32_t baseDemonType = demonDef->GetUnionData()
1790  ->GetBaseDemonID();
1791  if(baseDemonType != baseDemonType1 &&
1792  baseDemonType != baseDemonType2)
1793  {
1794  valid = false;
1795  break;
1796  }
1797  }
1798  }
1799 
1800  if(valid)
1801  {
1802  skillID = fSkillID;
1803  specialSkill = true;
1804  break;
1805  }
1806  }
1807 
1808  if(!specialSkill)
1809  {
1810  // No special skill found, calculate normal fusion skill
1811  uint8_t iType = demon2Data->GetGrowth()->GetInheritanceType();
1812  if(iType > SVR_CONST.DEMON_FUSION_SKILLS.size())
1813  {
1814  SendFailure(cState, skillID, client,
1815  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ACTIVATION_FAILURE);
1816  return false;
1817  }
1818 
1819  auto& levels = SVR_CONST.DEMON_FUSION_SKILLS[iType];
1820 
1821  uint8_t magAverage = (uint8_t)floor((float)(
1822  demon1Data->GetSummonData()->GetMagModifier() +
1823  demon2Data->GetSummonData()->GetMagModifier()) / 2.f);
1824 
1825  uint8_t magLevel = 4;
1826  if(magAverage <= 10)
1827  {
1828  magLevel = 0;
1829  }
1830  else if(magAverage <= 15)
1831  {
1832  magLevel = 1;
1833  }
1834  else if(magAverage <= 19)
1835  {
1836  magLevel = 2;
1837  }
1838  else if(magAverage <= 24)
1839  {
1840  magLevel = 3;
1841  }
1842 
1843  uint8_t fusionAverage = (uint8_t)floor((float)(
1844  demon1Data->GetBasic()->GetFusionModifier() +
1845  demon2Data->GetBasic()->GetFusionModifier()) / 2.f);
1846 
1847  uint16_t rankSum = (uint16_t)(magLevel + fusionAverage);
1848  if(rankSum <= 2)
1849  {
1850  // Level 1
1851  skillID = levels[0];
1852  }
1853  else if(rankSum <= 5)
1854  {
1855  // Level 2
1856  skillID = levels[1];
1857  }
1858  else
1859  {
1860  // Level 3
1861  skillID = levels[2];
1862  }
1863  }
1864 
1865  bool targeted = skillData->GetTarget()
1866  ->GetType() != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE;
1867  auto target = zone && targetEntityID > 0 && targeted
1868  ? zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID) : nullptr;
1869 
1870  // Skill converted, check target as fusion skills cannot have their
1871  // target set after activation
1872  skillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
1873  if(skillData && (target || !targeted))
1874  {
1875  cState->RefreshCurrentPosition(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
1876 
1877  // Ranges are checked at activation time instead of execution time
1878  if(target && !TargetInRange(cState, skillData, target))
1879  {
1880  SendFailure(cState, skillID, client,
1881  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TOO_FAR);
1882  return false;
1883  }
1884 
1885  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
1886 
1887  // Hide the partner demon now then calculate the demon's position
1888  // that will be warped to
1889  dState->SetAIIgnored(true);
1890 
1891  Point cPoint(cState->GetCurrentX(), cState->GetCurrentY());
1892  Point dPoint(cPoint.x + 150.f, cPoint.y + 100.f);
1893  float rot = cState->GetCurrentRotation();
1894 
1895  dPoint = zoneManager->RotatePoint(dPoint, cPoint, rot);
1896 
1897  // Make sure its not out of bounds
1898  if(zone->Collides(Line(cPoint, dPoint), dPoint))
1899  {
1900  // Correct to character position
1901  dPoint = cPoint;
1902  }
1903 
1904  zoneManager->Warp(client, dState, dPoint.x, dPoint.y, rot);
1905  return true;
1906  }
1907  else
1908  {
1909  SendFailure(cState, skillID, client,
1910  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ACTIVATION_FAILURE);
1911  return false;
1912  }
1913 }
1914 
1915 bool SkillManager::BeginSkillExecution(std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> pSkill,
1916  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
1917 {
1918  auto zone = pSkill->CurrentZone;
1919  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
1920  auto source = activated ? std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
1921  activated->GetSourceEntity()) : nullptr;
1922  if(!source || !zone || source->GetZone() != zone)
1923  {
1924  LogSkillManagerDebug([&]()
1925  {
1926  return libcomp::String("Fizzling starting skill with no source or a"
1927  " source not in the skill's zone: %1\n").Arg(pSkill->SkillID);
1928  });
1929 
1930  return false;
1931  }
1932 
1933  auto server = mServer.lock();
1934  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(source
1935  ->GetEntityID());
1936 
1937  // Complete delay does not appear to adjust the actual hit timing just
1938  // if you can counter it before it completes. If its not specified
1939  // no delay applies at all unless it is also a projectile.
1940  uint32_t completeDelay = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge()
1941  ->GetCompleteDelay();
1942  bool skipDelay = ctx->FastTrack ||
1943  (!completeDelay && !pSkill->IsProjectile);
1944 
1945  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
1946  source->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
1947 
1948  uint64_t processTime = 0;
1949  if(!skipDelay)
1950  {
1951  // If hitstunned, don't start the skill
1952  source->ExpireStatusTimes(now);
1953  if(source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_HIT_STUN))
1954  {
1955  SendFailure(activated, client);
1956  return false;
1957  }
1958 
1959  // Execute the skill now; finalize, calculate damage and effects when
1960  // it hits
1961  processTime = activated->GetExecutionRequestTime() + 500000ULL;
1962  }
1963  else
1964  {
1965  processTime = activated->GetExecutionRequestTime();
1966  }
1967 
1968  if(!ctx->Fizzle)
1969  {
1970  // NRA for the primary target determines how the rest of the skill
1971  // behaves, causing it to fizzle or be eligible to defend
1972  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetTarget()->GetType())
1973  {
1974  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE:
1975  // Source is technically the primary target (though most of
1976  // these types of skills will filter it out)
1977  pSkill->PrimaryTarget = source;
1978  break;
1979  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY:
1980  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_ALLY:
1981  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTNER:
1982  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PARTY:
1983  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ENEMY:
1984  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::DEAD_PARTNER:
1985  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_PLAYER:
1986  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OTHER_DEMON:
1987  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_PLAYER:
1988  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::ALLY_DEMON:
1989  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::PLAYER:
1990  {
1991  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
1992  auto targetEntity = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
1993  if(!targetEntity)
1994  {
1995  // Target is not valid anymore, fizzle it
1996  ctx->Fizzle = true;
1997  break;
1998  }
1999 
2000  if(pSkill->FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_DEMON_FUSION &&
2001  targetEntity != source && !ctx->CounteredSkill &&
2002  !TargetInRange(source, pSkill->Definition, targetEntity))
2003  {
2004  // Out of range, fail execution (checked at activation time
2005  // for fusion skills)
2006  SendFailure(activated, client,
2007  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TOO_FAR);
2008  return false;
2009  }
2010 
2011  SkillTargetResult target;
2012  target.EntityState = targetEntity;
2013  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(targetEntity, pSkill,
2014  true, source);
2015  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, targetEntity);
2016 
2017  if(SetNRA(target, *pSkill, false))
2018  {
2019  // The skill is reflected and the source becomes
2020  // the primary target (except for specific AoE types)
2021  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetRange()->GetAreaType())
2022  {
2023  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE_RADIUS:
2024  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_1:
2025  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_2:
2026  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE:
2027  pSkill->PrimaryTarget = targetEntity;
2028  break;
2029  default:
2030  pSkill->PrimaryTarget = source;
2031  pSkill->EffectiveSource = targetEntity;
2032  pSkill->Targets.push_back(target);
2033  break;
2034  }
2035 
2036  pSkill->Reflected = target.HitReflect;
2037  pSkill->NRAAffinity = target.NRAAffinity;
2038  }
2039  else
2040  {
2041  pSkill->PrimaryTarget = targetEntity;
2042 
2043  pSkill->Nulled = target.HitNull;
2044  pSkill->Absorbed = target.HitAbsorb;
2045  pSkill->NRAAffinity = target.NRAAffinity;
2046 
2047  // If it had been reflected we wouldn't be here!
2048  pSkill->Reflected = 0;
2049  }
2050  }
2051  break;
2052  case objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::OBJECT:
2053  // Nothing special to do (for now)
2054  break;
2055  default:
2056  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
2057  {
2058  return libcomp::String("Unknown target type encountered: %1\n")
2059  .Arg((uint8_t)pSkill->Definition->GetTarget()->GetType());
2060  });
2061 
2062  ctx->Fizzle = true;
2063  }
2064  }
2065 
2066  if(ctx->Fizzle)
2067  {
2068  // Fast track skills fizzle at the end
2069  if(!ctx->FastTrack)
2070  {
2071  return false;
2072  }
2073  }
2074 
2075  // Set again later for projectiles and delayed hits
2076  activated->SetHitTime(processTime);
2077 
2078  uint32_t hitDelay = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge()->GetHitDelay();
2079  if(!pSkill->IsProjectile && !hitDelay)
2080  {
2081  // If the skill can be defended against and it was not nulled or
2082  // absorbed, check for counter, dodge or guard on the primary target
2083  // as these kick off immediately. This happens at projectile hit for
2084  // anything with a projectile.
2085  if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget && pSkill->PrimaryTarget != source &&
2086  pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() &&
2087  !pSkill->Nulled && !pSkill->Reflected && !pSkill->Absorbed)
2088  {
2089  ApplyPrimaryCounter(source, pSkill, true);
2090  }
2091  }
2092 
2093  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
2094 
2095  // If the target is rushing back at the source and this skill is not also
2096  // a rush, interrupt the rush (projectiles cannot interrupt at this point)
2097  // Skip if using a defense skill, the hit is nulled, absorbed or the target
2098  // has hitstun null
2099  if(!ctx->CounteredSkill && !pSkill->IsProjectile && pSkill->PrimaryTarget &&
2100  pSkill->PrimaryTarget != source && !pSkill->RushStartPoint &&
2101  !pSkill->Nulled && !pSkill->Absorbed && !pSkill->PrimaryTarget
2102  ->GetCalculatedState()->ExistingTokuseiAspectsContains((int8_t)
2103  TokuseiAspectType::HITSTUN_NULL))
2104  {
2105  auto tActivated = pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetActivatedAbility();
2106  auto tSkillData = tActivated ? tActivated->GetSkillData() : nullptr;
2107  auto tDischarge = tSkillData ? tSkillData->GetDischarge() : nullptr;
2108  if(tSkillData && tSkillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
2109  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH &&
2110  tDischarge->GetShotInterruptible() &&
2111  source->GetEntityID() == (int32_t)tActivated->GetTargetObjectID())
2112  {
2113  // The last X% of the rush is not interruptible
2114  uint64_t hitWindowAdjust = (uint64_t)(500000.0 *
2115  (double)tDischarge->GetCompleteDelay() * 0.01);
2116  uint64_t hitTime = (uint64_t)(tActivated->GetHitTime()
2117  - hitWindowAdjust);
2118  if(now < hitTime)
2119  {
2120  CancelSkill(pSkill->PrimaryTarget,
2121  tActivated->GetActivationID());
2122  }
2123  }
2124  }
2125 
2126  if(!skipDelay)
2127  {
2128  // Re-pull the process time to handle an updated delay
2129  processTime = activated->GetHitTime();
2130  server->ScheduleWork(processTime, []
2131  (std::shared_ptr<ChannelServer> pServer,
2132  std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> prSkill,
2133  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> pCtx,
2134  uint64_t pSyncTime)
2135  {
2136  pServer->GetSkillManager()->CompleteSkillExecution(prSkill,
2137  pCtx, pSyncTime);
2138  }, server, pSkill, ctx, processTime);
2139  }
2140  else
2141  {
2142  return CompleteSkillExecution(pSkill, ctx, processTime);
2143  }
2144 
2145  return true;
2146 }
2147 
2148 bool SkillManager::CompleteSkillExecution(
2149  std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> pSkill,
2150  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx, uint64_t syncTime)
2151 {
2152  auto zone = pSkill->CurrentZone;
2153  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
2154  auto source = activated ? std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
2155  activated->GetSourceEntity()) : nullptr;
2156  if(!source || !zone || source->GetZone() != zone)
2157  {
2158  LogSkillManagerDebug([&]()
2159  {
2160  return libcomp::String("Fizzling skill with no source or a"
2161  " source not in the skill's zone: %1\n").Arg(pSkill->SkillID);
2162  });
2163 
2164  Fizzle(ctx);
2165  return false;
2166  }
2167 
2168  if(activated->GetCancelled() || (!pSkill->IsProjectile &&
2169  activated->GetActivationID() != -1 &&
2170  source->GetActivatedAbility() != activated))
2171  {
2172  // Skill cancelled or otherwise detached already
2173  Fizzle(ctx);
2174  return false;
2175  }
2176 
2177  // No cancelling past this point, it can only fizzle
2178  if(!ctx->Fizzle)
2179  {
2180  if(ctx->FastTrack && pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() !=
2181  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::COUNTER)
2182  {
2183  // Fizzle fast track skills without line of sight now (excluding
2184  // counter which always hits at this point)
2185  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity((int32_t)activated
2186  ->GetTargetObjectID());
2187  if(target && !source->HasLineOfSight(target))
2188  {
2189  ctx->Fizzle = true;
2190  }
2191  }
2192  }
2193 
2194  if(!ctx->FastTrack || ctx->Fizzle)
2195  {
2196  // Continue on with a copy if more uses exist
2197  pSkill->Activated = activated = FinalizeSkill(ctx, activated);
2198  }
2199 
2200  if(ctx->Fizzle)
2201  {
2202  Fizzle(ctx);
2203  return false;
2204  }
2205  else if(ctx->CounteredSkill)
2206  {
2207  // If this is a counter, dodge or guard, defer final processing to
2208  // the skill being countered
2209  ctx->CounteredSkill->ExecutionContext->CounteringSkills.push_back(
2210  pSkill);
2211  }
2212  else
2213  {
2214  // Determine if we delay the hit or hit right away
2215  uint64_t delay = 0;
2216  if(!ctx->FastTrack)
2217  {
2218  uint32_t hitDelay = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge()
2219  ->GetHitDelay();
2220  delay = (uint64_t)(hitDelay * 1000ULL);
2221 
2222  if(pSkill->IsProjectile)
2223  {
2224  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
2225  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
2226  if(!target)
2227  {
2228  // Target is not valid anymore, let it fizzle
2229  Fizzle(ctx);
2230  return false;
2231  }
2232 
2233  // Determine time from projectile speed and distance (cannot
2234  // miss from range after execution starts)
2235  target->RefreshCurrentPosition(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
2236  double distance = (double)source->GetDistance(target
2237  ->GetCurrentX(), target->GetCurrentY());
2238 
2239  // Projectile speed is measured in how many 10ths of
2240  // a unit the projectile will traverse per millisecond
2241  double distAdjust = distance >= SKILL_DISTANCE_OFFSET
2242  ? distance - (double)SKILL_DISTANCE_OFFSET : 0.0;
2243 
2244  auto discharge = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge();
2245  uint32_t projectileSpeed = discharge->GetProjectileSpeed();
2246  uint64_t projectileTime = (uint64_t)(distAdjust /
2247  (double)(projectileSpeed * 10) *
2248  1000000.0);
2249 
2250  if(projectileTime < 100000)
2251  {
2252  // Projectiles require a delay, even if its miniscule. If
2253  // the projectile will take less than a server tick to
2254  // hit, let it hit as fast as possible to make timing look
2255  // more accurate.
2256  projectileTime = 1;
2257  }
2258 
2259  delay = (uint64_t)(delay + projectileTime);
2260  }
2261  }
2262 
2263  if(delay)
2264  {
2265  delay = syncTime + delay;
2266  activated->SetHitTime(delay);
2267 
2268  auto server = mServer.lock();
2269  server->ScheduleWork(delay, []
2270  (std::shared_ptr<ChannelServer> pServer,
2271  std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> prSkill,
2272  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> pCtx)
2273  {
2274  pServer->GetSkillManager()->ProjectileHit(prSkill, pCtx);
2275  }, server, pSkill, ctx);
2276  }
2277  else
2278  {
2279  activated->SetHitTime(syncTime);
2280 
2281  return ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx);
2282  }
2283  }
2284 
2285  return true;
2286 }
2287 
2288 void SkillManager::ProjectileHit(std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> pSkill,
2289  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
2290 {
2291  // If the skill can be defended against and it was not nulled or absorbed,
2292  // check for counter, dodge or guard on the primary target now that the
2293  // projectile will hit. Under normal circumstances this will only result
2294  // in a dodge.
2295  if(!pSkill->Nulled && !pSkill->Reflected && !pSkill->Absorbed &&
2296  pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
2297  {
2298  ApplyPrimaryCounter(pSkill->EffectiveSource, pSkill, true);
2299  }
2300 
2301  ProcessSkillResult(pSkill->Activated, ctx);
2302 }
2303 
2304 void SkillManager::SendFailure(
2305  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
2306  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client, uint8_t errorCode)
2307 {
2308  activated->SetErrorCode((int8_t)errorCode);
2309 
2310  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
2311  {
2312  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, nullptr);
2313  SendExecuteSkillInstant(pSkill, errorCode);
2314  }
2315  else
2316  {
2317  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
2318  activated->GetSourceEntity());
2319  SendFailure(source, activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()->GetID(),
2320  client, errorCode, activated->GetActivationID());
2321  }
2322 
2323  if(activated->GetActivationTargetType() == ACTIVATION_FUSION)
2324  {
2325  // All failures for fusion skills sent once we have an activated
2326  // ability need to be cancelled or the client will get stuck
2327  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
2328  activated->GetSourceEntity());
2329  CancelSkill(source, activated->GetActivationID());
2330  }
2331 }
2332 
2333 std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> SkillManager::GetActivation(
2334  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source, int8_t activationID) const
2335 {
2336  auto activated = source->GetSpecialActivations(activationID);
2337  if(activated)
2338  {
2339  return activated;
2340  }
2341 
2342  activated = source ? source->GetActivatedAbility() : nullptr;
2343  if(nullptr == activated || activationID != activated->GetActivationID())
2344  {
2345  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, activationID]()
2346  {
2347  return libcomp::String("Unknown activation ID encountered from %1"
2348  ": %2\n").Arg(source->GetEntityLabel()).Arg(activationID);
2349  });
2350 
2351  return nullptr;
2352  }
2353 
2354  return activated;
2355 }
2356 
2357 bool SkillManager::DetermineCosts(std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
2358  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
2359  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
2360  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
2361 {
2362  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
2363  uint8_t skillCategory = pSkill->Definition->GetCommon()->GetCategory()
2364  ->GetMainCategory();
2365 
2366  // Skip invalid skill category or deactivating a switch skill
2367  if(skillCategory != SKILL_CATEGORY_ACTIVE &&
2368  (skillCategory != SKILL_CATEGORY_SWITCH ||
2369  source->ActiveSwitchSkillsContains(pSkill->SkillID)))
2370  {
2371  return true;
2372  }
2373 
2374  // Gather some client specific data if applicable
2375  ClientState* state = 0;
2376  std::shared_ptr<objects::Character> character;
2377  if(client)
2378  {
2379  state = client->GetClientState();
2380  character = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity();
2381  }
2382 
2383  auto server = mServer.lock();
2384  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
2385 
2386  int32_t hpCost = 0, mpCost = 0;
2387  uint32_t fGaugeCost = 0;
2388  uint16_t bulletCost = 0;
2389  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> itemCosts;
2390 
2391  // Gather the normal costs first
2392  if(!DetermineNormalCosts(source, pSkill->Definition, hpCost, mpCost,
2393  bulletCost, itemCosts, pSkill->SourceExecutionState))
2394  {
2395  SendFailure(activated, client,
2396  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
2397  return false;
2398  }
2399 
2400  // Gather special function costs (only applies to client)
2401  if(pSkill->FunctionID && client)
2402  {
2403  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUMMON_DEMON)
2404  {
2405  auto demon = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
2406  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(
2407  activated->GetActivationObjectID())));
2408  if(demon == nullptr)
2409  {
2410  LogSkillManagerErrorMsg(
2411  "Attempted to summon a demon that does not exist.\n");
2412 
2413  SendFailure(activated, client,
2414  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SUMMON_INVALID);
2415  return false;
2416  }
2417 
2418  // Calculate MAG cost (Diaspora cost is always zero)
2419  if(pSkill->CurrentZone->GetInstanceType() !=
2420  InstanceType_t::DIASPORA)
2421  {
2422  uint32_t demonType = demon->GetType();
2423  auto demonData = server->GetDefinitionManager()->GetDevilData(
2424  demonType);
2425 
2426  int16_t characterLNC = character->GetLNC();
2427  int16_t demonLNC = demonData->GetBasic()->GetLNC();
2428  int8_t level = demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel();
2429  uint8_t magMod = demonData->GetSummonData()->GetMagModifier();
2430 
2431  double lncAdjust = characterLNC == 0
2432  ? pow(demonLNC, 2.0f)
2433  : (pow(abs(characterLNC), -0.06f) *
2434  pow(characterLNC - demonLNC, 2.0f));
2435  double magAdjust = (double)(level * magMod);
2436 
2437  double mag = (magAdjust * lncAdjust / 18000000.0) +
2438  (magAdjust * 0.25);
2439 
2440  int8_t magReduction = characterManager->CalculateMagReduction(
2441  client, demon);
2442  if(magReduction > 0)
2443  {
2444  mag = mag * (double)(100 - magReduction) * 0.01;
2445  }
2446 
2447  uint32_t cost = (uint32_t)round(mag);
2448  if(cost)
2449  {
2450  itemCosts[SVR_CONST.ITEM_MAGNETITE] = cost;
2451  }
2452  }
2453  }
2454  else if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DEMON_FUSION)
2455  {
2456  // Pay MAG and fusion gauge stocks
2457  auto fusionData = server->GetDefinitionManager()
2458  ->GetDevilFusionData(pSkill->SkillID);
2459  if(fusionData)
2460  {
2461  int8_t stockCount = fusionData->GetStockCost();
2462  fGaugeCost = (uint32_t)(stockCount * 10000);
2463 
2464  itemCosts[SVR_CONST.ITEM_MAGNETITE] = fusionData->GetMagCost();
2465  }
2466  }
2467  else if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIGITALIZE)
2468  {
2469  auto demon = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
2470  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(
2471  activated->GetActivationObjectID())));
2472  if(demon == nullptr)
2473  {
2474  LogSkillManagerErrorMsg("Attempted to digitalize with a demon "
2475  "that does not exist.\n");
2476 
2477  SendFailure(activated, client,
2478  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SUMMON_INVALID);
2479  return false;
2480  }
2481 
2482  // Calculate MAG cost
2483  uint32_t demonType = demon->GetType();
2484  auto demonData = server->GetDefinitionManager()->GetDevilData(
2485  demonType);
2486 
2487  int16_t characterLNC = character->GetLNC();
2488  int16_t demonLNC = demonData->GetBasic()->GetLNC();
2489  int8_t level = demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel();
2490  int8_t dLevel = character->GetProgress()->GetDigitalizeLevels(
2491  (uint8_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace());
2492  int8_t mRank = (int8_t)(demon->GetMitamaRank() + 1);
2493 
2494  double lncCost = (double)dLevel *
2495  pow(characterLNC - demonLNC, 2) * 0.000001;
2496  double levelCost = (double)level * pow(mRank, 2) * 0.02;
2497  double dLevelCost = pow(dLevel, 2) * (double)mRank * 1.25;
2498 
2499  uint32_t dgCost = (uint32_t)floor(lncCost + levelCost + dLevelCost);
2500  if(dgCost)
2501  {
2502  itemCosts[SVR_CONST.ITEM_MAGNETITE] = dgCost;
2503  }
2504  }
2505  else if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_GEM_COST)
2506  {
2507  // Add one crystal matching target race
2508  int32_t targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
2509  auto zone = state->GetZone();
2510  auto target = zone ? zone->GetEnemy(targetEntityID) : nullptr;
2511  auto demonData = target ? target->GetDevilData() : nullptr;
2512  if(!demonData)
2513  {
2514  SendFailure(activated, client,
2515  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
2516  return false;
2517  }
2518 
2519  uint8_t raceID = (uint8_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace();
2520  for(auto& pair : SVR_CONST.DEMON_CRYSTALS)
2521  {
2522  if(pair.second.find(raceID) != pair.second.end())
2523  {
2524  itemCosts[pair.first] = 1;
2525  }
2526  }
2527  }
2528  }
2529 
2530  if(pSkill->IsItemSkill)
2531  {
2532  // If using an item skill and the item is a specific type and
2533  // non-rental but the skill does not specify a cost for it, it is
2534  // still consumed.
2535  int64_t targetObjectID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
2536  auto item = targetObjectID ? std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Item>(
2537  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
2538  state->GetObjectUUID(targetObjectID))) : nullptr;
2539  if(item && itemCosts.find(item->GetType()) == itemCosts.end())
2540  {
2541  auto itemData = server->GetDefinitionManager()->GetItemData(
2542  item->GetType());
2543  auto category = itemData->GetCommon()->GetCategory();
2544
