2545  bool isRental = itemData->GetRental()->GetRental() != 0;
2546  bool isActive = category->GetMainCategory() ==
2547  ITEM_CATEGORY_ACTIVE;
2548  bool isGeneric = isActive && category->GetSubCategory() ==
2549  ITEM_SUBCATEGORY_GENERIC;
2550  bool isDemonInstItem = isActive && category->GetSubCategory() ==
2551  ITEM_SUBCATEGORY_DEMON_SOLO;
2552  if(!isRental && (isGeneric || isDemonInstItem))
2553  {
2554  itemCosts[item->GetType()] = 1;
2555  }
2556  }
2557  }
2558 
2559  // Determine if the payment is possible
2560  auto sourceStats = source->GetCoreStats();
2561  bool canPay = sourceStats &&
2562  ((hpCost == 0) || hpCost < sourceStats->GetHP()) &&
2563  ((mpCost == 0) || mpCost <= sourceStats->GetMP());
2564  if(itemCosts.size() > 0 || bulletCost > 0)
2565  {
2566  if(client && character)
2567  {
2568  for(auto itemCost : itemCosts)
2569  {
2570  uint32_t itemCount = characterManager->GetExistingItemCount(
2571  character, itemCost.first);
2572  if(itemCount < itemCost.second)
2573  {
2574  canPay = false;
2575  break;
2576  }
2577  }
2578 
2579  if(bulletCost > 0)
2580  {
2581  auto bullets = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
2582  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_BULLETS);
2583  if(bullets && bullets->GetRentalExpiration())
2584  {
2585  // If the bullets are time limited and active, cost
2586  // becomes 0. If they are not active, the cost cannot
2587  // be paid.
2588  if(bullets->GetRentalExpiration() > (uint32_t)std::time(0))
2589  {
2590  bulletCost = 0;
2591  }
2592  else
2593  {
2594  canPay = false;
2595  }
2596  }
2597  else if(!bullets || bullets->GetStackSize() < bulletCost)
2598  {
2599  canPay = false;
2600  }
2601  }
2602  }
2603  else
2604  {
2605  // Non-player entities cannot pay item-based costs
2606  canPay = false;
2607  }
2608  }
2609 
2610  if(fGaugeCost && (!character || character->GetFusionGauge() < fGaugeCost))
2611  {
2612  canPay = false;
2613  }
2614 
2615  // Handle costs that can't be paid as expected errors
2616  if(!canPay)
2617  {
2618  SendFailure(activated, client,
2619  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_COST);
2620  return false;
2621  }
2622 
2623  // Costs valid, set on the skill
2624  activated->SetHPCost(hpCost);
2625  activated->SetMPCost(mpCost);
2626  activated->SetBulletCost(bulletCost);
2627  activated->SetItemCosts(itemCosts);
2628 
2629  return true;
2630 }
2631 
2632 bool SkillManager::DetermineNormalCosts(
2633  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
2634  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData>& skillData,
2635  int32_t& hpCost, int32_t& mpCost, uint16_t& bulletCost,
2636  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t>& itemCosts,
2637  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> calcState)
2638 {
2639  hpCost = 0;
2640  mpCost = 0;
2641  bulletCost = 0;
2642  itemCosts.clear();
2643 
2644  // Only characters and partner demons have to pay item costs
2645  bool noItem = source->GetEntityType() != EntityType_t::CHARACTER &&
2646  source->GetEntityType() != EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON;
2647 
2648  uint32_t hpCostPercent = 0, mpCostPercent = 0;
2649  for(auto cost : skillData->GetCondition()->GetCosts())
2650  {
2651  auto num = cost->GetCost();
2652  bool percentCost = cost->GetNumType() ==
2653  objects::MiCostTbl::NumType_t::PERCENT;
2654  switch(cost->GetType())
2655  {
2656  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::HP:
2657  if(percentCost)
2658  {
2659  hpCostPercent = (uint32_t)(hpCostPercent + num);
2660  }
2661  else
2662  {
2663  hpCost = (int32_t)(hpCost + num);
2664  }
2665  break;
2666  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::MP:
2667  if(percentCost)
2668  {
2669  mpCostPercent = (uint32_t)(mpCostPercent + num);
2670  }
2671  else
2672  {
2673  mpCost = (int32_t)(mpCost + num);
2674  }
2675  break;
2676  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::ITEM:
2677  // Ignore explicit zero item costs
2678  if(!noItem && num)
2679  {
2680  if(percentCost)
2681  {
2682  LogSkillManagerErrorMsg("Item percent cost encountered.\n");
2683 
2684  return false;
2685  }
2686  else
2687  {
2688  auto itemID = cost->GetItem();
2689  if(itemCosts.find(itemID) == itemCosts.end())
2690  {
2691  itemCosts[itemID] = 0;
2692  }
2693  itemCosts[itemID] = (uint32_t)(itemCosts[itemID] + num);
2694  }
2695  }
2696  break;
2697  case objects::MiCostTbl::Type_t::BULLET:
2698  if(!noItem)
2699  {
2700  if(percentCost)
2701  {
2702  LogSkillManagerErrorMsg(
2703  "Bullet percent cost encountered.\n");
2704 
2705  return false;
2706  }
2707  else
2708  {
2709  bulletCost = (uint16_t)(bulletCost + num);
2710  }
2711  }
2712  break;
2713  default:
2714  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
2715  {
2716  return libcomp::String("Unsupported cost type"
2717  " encountered: %1\n").Arg((uint8_t)cost->GetType());
2718  });
2719 
2720  return false;
2721  }
2722  }
2723 
2724  // Get final HP cost
2725  if(hpCost != 0 || hpCostPercent != 0)
2726  {
2727  hpCost = (int32_t)(hpCost + (int32_t)ceil(
2728  ((float)hpCostPercent * 0.01f) * (float)source->GetMaxHP()));
2729 
2730  double multiplier = 1.0;
2731  for(double adjust : mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager()
2732  ->GetAspectValueList(source, TokuseiAspectType::HP_COST_ADJUST,
2733  calcState))
2734  {
2735  multiplier = adjust <= -100.0 ? 0.0 : (multiplier *
2736  (1.0 + adjust * 0.01));
2737  }
2738 
2739  hpCost = (int32_t)ceil((double)hpCost * multiplier);
2740 
2741  if(hpCost < 0)
2742  {
2743  hpCost = 0;
2744  }
2745  }
2746 
2747  // Get final MP cost
2748  if(mpCost != 0 || mpCostPercent != 0)
2749  {
2750  mpCost = (int32_t)(mpCost + (int32_t)ceil(
2751  ((float)mpCostPercent * 0.01f) * (float)source->GetMaxMP()));
2752 
2753  double multiplier = 1.0;
2754  for(double adjust : mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager()
2755  ->GetAspectValueList(source, TokuseiAspectType::MP_COST_ADJUST,
2756  calcState))
2757  {
2758  multiplier = adjust <= -100.0 ? 0.0 : (multiplier *
2759  (1.0 + adjust * 0.01));
2760  }
2761 
2762  mpCost = (int32_t)ceil((double)mpCost * multiplier);
2763 
2764  if(mpCost < 0)
2765  {
2766  mpCost = 0;
2767  }
2768  }
2769 
2770  return true;
2771 }
2772 
2773 void SkillManager::ScheduleAutoCancel(
2774  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
2775  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated)
2776 {
2777  uint32_t cancelTime = activated->GetSkillData()->GetCast()->GetCancel()
2778  ->GetAutoCancelTime();
2779  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
2780  if(cancelTime && zone)
2781  {
2782  uint64_t time = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
2783  if(time < activated->GetChargedTime())
2784  {
2785  // If not already charged, start after charge is complete
2786  time = activated->GetChargedTime();
2787  }
2788 
2789  time = (uint64_t)(time + (uint64_t)(cancelTime * 1000));
2790 
2791  auto server = mServer.lock();
2792  server->ScheduleWork(time, [](SkillManager* skillManager,
2793  uint8_t execCount, const std::shared_ptr<Zone> pZone,
2794  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> pSource,
2795  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> pActivated)
2796  {
2797  // If the source is still in the zone with the same skill usage
2798  // pending and its not executing now, cancel it automatically
2799  if(pSource->GetZone() == pZone &&
2800  pSource->GetActivatedAbility() == pActivated &&
2801  pActivated->GetExecuteCount() == execCount &&
2802  !pActivated->GetExecutionRequestTime())
2803  {
2804  skillManager->CancelSkill(pSource,
2805  pActivated->GetActivationID());
2806  }
2807  }, this, activated->GetExecuteCount(), zone, source, activated);
2808  }
2809 }
2810 
2811 bool SkillManager::FunctionIDMapped(uint16_t functionID)
2812 {
2813  return mSkillFunctions.find(functionID) != mSkillFunctions.end() ||
2814  mSkillEffectFunctions.find(functionID) != mSkillEffectFunctions.end();
2815 }
2816 
2817 bool SkillManager::ExecuteNormalSkill(
2818  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
2819  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
2820  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx)
2821 {
2822  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
2823  activated->GetSourceEntity());
2824  if(!source)
2825  {
2826  return false;
2827  }
2828 
2829  auto zone = source->GetZone();
2830  if(!zone)
2831  {
2832  return false;
2833  }
2834 
2835  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
2836 
2837  bool retry = false;
2838  if(!ctx->FastTrack && IFramesEnabled() &&
2839  skillData->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() && skillData->GetTarget()
2840  ->GetType() != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE)
2841  {
2842  // Check if the hit is valid or if another one is already pending
2843  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
2844  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
2845  if(!target)
2846  {
2847  // Not a retry and not valid
2848  return false;
2849  }
2850 
2851  target->ExpireStatusTimes(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
2852  if(target->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_KNOCKBACK))
2853  {
2854  retry = true;
2855  }
2856  else
2857  {
2858  // Hitstun null removes the stagger requirement
2859  bool targetHitstunNull = target->GetCalculatedState()
2860  ->ExistingTokuseiAspectsContains((int8_t)
2861  TokuseiAspectType::HITSTUN_NULL);
2862  if(!targetHitstunNull && !target->UpdatePendingCombatants(
2863  source->GetEntityID(), activated->GetExecutionRequestTime()))
2864  {
2865  retry = true;
2866  }
2867  }
2868  }
2869 
2870  if(retry)
2871  {
2872  SendFailure(activated, client,
2873  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ACTION_RETRY);
2874 
2875  return true;
2876  }
2877 
2878  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
2879  BeginSkillExecution(pSkill, ctx);
2880 
2881  return true;
2882 }
2883 
2884 bool SkillManager::ProcessSkillResult(std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
2885  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
2886 {
2887  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
2888  activated->GetSourceEntity());
2889 
2890  auto server = mServer.lock();
2891  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
2892 
2893  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
2894  auto zone = pSkill->CurrentZone;
2895  if(!zone || activated->GetCancelled())
2896  {
2897  Fizzle(ctx);
2898  return false;
2899  }
2900 
2901  if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget &&
2902  (pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
2903  pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON))
2904  {
2905  // If the primary target is a player entity and the player has changed
2906  // zones, fizzle the skill
2907  bool targetZoneInvalid = false;
2908  if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetZone() != zone)
2909  {
2910  targetZoneInvalid = true;
2911  }
2912  else
2913  {
2914  auto targetClient = server->GetManagerConnection()
2915  ->GetEntityClient(pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetWorldCID(), true);
2916  auto targetState = targetClient
2917  ? targetClient->GetClientState() : nullptr;
2918  targetZoneInvalid = targetState &&
2919  (!targetState->GetZoneInTime() ||
2920  targetState->GetZoneInTime() > activated->GetExecutionTime());
2921  }
2922 
2923  if(targetZoneInvalid)
2924  {
2925  Fizzle(ctx);
2926  return false;
2927  }
2928  }
2929 
2930  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
2931 
2932  bool initialHitNull = pSkill->Nulled != 0;
2933  bool initialHitReflect = pSkill->Reflected != 0;
2934  if(pSkill->Nulled || pSkill->Reflected || pSkill->Absorbed)
2935  {
2936  // Apply original target NRA
2937  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> nraTarget;
2938  if(activated->GetEntityTargeted())
2939  {
2940  nraTarget = zone->GetActiveEntity((int32_t)activated
2941  ->GetTargetObjectID());
2942  }
2943  else
2944  {
2945  nraTarget = source;
2946  }
2947 
2948  // Let it fail later if the target doesn't exist
2949  if(nraTarget)
2950  {
2951  uint8_t nraIdx = 0;
2952  if(pSkill->Nulled)
2953  {
2954  nraIdx = NRA_NULL;
2955  }
2956  else if(pSkill->Reflected)
2957  {
2958  nraIdx = NRA_REFLECT;
2959  }
2960  else
2961  {
2962  nraIdx = NRA_ABSORB;
2963  }
2964 
2965  // It's possible at this point for all NRA to have been consumed
2966  // or lost. In this instance a delayed counter skill can occur.
2967  bool delayedCounter = false;
2968 
2969  // Attempt to consume a shield first
2970  CorrectTbl nraAffinity = (CorrectTbl)(
2971  pSkill->NRAAffinity + NRA_OFFSET);
2972  if(!nraTarget->GetNRAShield(nraIdx, nraAffinity, true))
2973  {
2974  // If a natural chance exists, use that
2975  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(nraTarget,
2976  pSkill, true, source);
2977  delayedCounter = nraTarget->GetNRAChance((uint8_t)nraIdx,
2978  nraAffinity, calcState) == 0;
2979  }
2980 
2981  if(delayedCounter)
2982  {
2983  // Rest the NRA, and the targets and check if the original
2984  // primary target defends against it
2985  pSkill->Nulled = pSkill->Reflected = 0;
2986  pSkill->Absorbed = false;
2987  pSkill->Targets.clear();
2988  pSkill->PrimaryTarget = nraTarget;
2989 
2990  ApplyPrimaryCounter(source, pSkill, false);
2991  }
2992  }
2993  }
2994 
2995  if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget)
2996  {
2997  if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget != source)
2998  {
2999  // Rotate the source to face the target
3000  float destRot = (float)atan2(
3001  source->GetCurrentY() - pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetCurrentY(),
3002  source->GetCurrentX() - pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetCurrentX());
3003  source->SetCurrentRotation(destRot);
3004  source->SetOriginRotation(destRot);
3005  source->SetDestinationRotation(destRot);
3006  }
3007 
3008  if(pSkill->EffectiveSource != source &&
3009  pSkill->PrimaryTarget == source)
3010  {
3011  // Determine NRA for new primary target and update skill NRA
3012  SkillTargetResult selfTarget;
3013  selfTarget.EntityState = source;
3014  selfTarget.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(source,
3015  pSkill, true, source);
3016  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, source);
3017 
3018  SetNRA(selfTarget, *pSkill, true);
3019 
3020  pSkill->Nulled = selfTarget.HitNull;
3021  pSkill->Reflected = selfTarget.HitReflect;
3022  pSkill->Absorbed = selfTarget.HitAbsorb;
3023  pSkill->NRAAffinity = selfTarget.NRAAffinity;
3024 
3025  // Check guard/dodge and add to target list now so NRA is
3026  // not calculated twice below
3027  ApplySecondaryCounter(source, selfTarget, pSkill);
3028 
3029  skill.Targets.push_back(selfTarget);
3030  }
3031  }
3032 
3033  // Determine if the AoE targets should be gathered based on the state
3034  // of the hit against the primary target
3035  bool gatherTargets = true;
3036  if(initialHitNull || initialHitReflect)
3037  {
3038  // AoE targeting from passive avoidance via null or reflect depends
3039  // on the AoE type
3040  switch(skillData->GetRange()->GetAreaType())
3041  {
3042  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE_RADIUS:
3043  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_1:
3044  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_2:
3045  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE:
3046  // Ignore what happened to the primary target completely
3047  break;
3048  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::TARGET_RADIUS:
3049  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_3:
3050  // Double reflect and reflect to null stops all AoE. Otherwise
3051  // reflect activates AoE on source from target.
3052  gatherTargets = !initialHitNull && !pSkill->Reflected &&
3053  !pSkill->Nulled;
3054  break;
3055  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::NONE:
3056  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::STRAIGHT_LINE:
3057  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE_RADIUS2:
3058  default:
3059  // AoE does nothing upon initial null or reflect
3060  gatherTargets = false;
3061  break;
3062  }
3063  }
3064  else if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget && !pSkill->Reflected && !pSkill->Nulled)
3065  {
3066  // Counter/dodge stop all AoE types
3067  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
3068  {
3069  if(target.EntityState == pSkill->PrimaryTarget)
3070  {
3071  if(target.HitAvoided)
3072  {
3073  gatherTargets = false;
3074  }
3075 
3076  break;
3077  }
3078  }
3079  }
3080 
3081  auto effectiveSource = skill.EffectiveSource;
3082  auto primaryTarget = skill.PrimaryTarget;
3083 
3084  auto skillRange = skillData->GetRange();
3085  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> effectiveTargets;
3086  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_TARGET_ALL)
3087  {
3088  effectiveTargets = zone->GetActiveEntities();
3089  }
3090  else if(gatherTargets && skillRange->GetAreaType() !=
3091  objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::NONE)
3092  {
3093  // Determine area effects
3094  // Unlike damage calculations, this will use effectiveSource instead
3095  // of source since reflects may have changed the context of the skill
3096 
3097  double aoeRange = (double)(skillRange->GetAoeRange() * 10);
3098 
3099  Point srcPoint(effectiveSource->GetCurrentX(),
3100  effectiveSource->GetCurrentY());
3101  if(pSkill->RushStartPoint)
3102  {
3103  srcPoint = *pSkill->RushStartPoint;
3104  }
3105 
3106  switch(skillRange->GetAreaType())
3107  {
3108  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE:
3109  // Not exactly an area but skills targetting the source only should
3110  // pass both this check and area target type filtering for "Ally"
3111  // or "Source"
3112  effectiveTargets.push_back(effectiveSource);
3113  break;
3114  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE_RADIUS:
3115  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::SOURCE_RADIUS2:
3116  // AoE range is extended by the hitbox size of the source
3117  aoeRange = aoeRange + (double)(effectiveSource
3118  ->GetHitboxSize() * 10.0);
3119 
3120  effectiveTargets = zone->GetActiveEntitiesInRadius(
3121  srcPoint.x, srcPoint.y, aoeRange, true);
3122  break;
3123  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::TARGET_RADIUS:
3124  // If the primary target is set and the hit was not absorbed,
3125  // gather other targets
3126  if(primaryTarget && !skill.Absorbed)
3127  {
3128  // AoE range is not extended
3129  effectiveTargets = zone->GetActiveEntitiesInRadius(
3130  primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(), primaryTarget->GetCurrentY(),
3131  aoeRange, true);
3132  }
3133  break;
3134  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_1:
3135  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_2:
3136  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_3:
3137  // NRA behavior differs between the three but is already filtered
3138  // at this point so use effective source to calculate. Type 3 is
3139  // prevented by being absorbed.
3140  if(!skill.Absorbed || skillRange->GetAreaType() !=
3141  objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::FRONT_3)
3142  {
3143  double maxTargetRange = (double)(skillData->GetTarget()
3144  ->GetRange() * 10);
3145 
3146  // Max target range is extended by the hitbox size of the source
3147  maxTargetRange = maxTargetRange + (double)(effectiveSource
3148  ->GetHitboxSize() * 10.0);
3149 
3150  // Get entities in range using the target distance
3151  auto potentialTargets = zone->GetActiveEntitiesInRadius(
3152  srcPoint.x, srcPoint.y, maxTargetRange, true);
3153 
3154  // Center pointer of the arc
3155  float sourceRot = ActiveEntityState::CorrectRotation(
3156  effectiveSource->GetCurrentRotation());
3157 
3158  // AoE range for this is the percentage of a half circle
3159  // included on either side (ex: 20 would mean 20% of a full
3160  // radian on both sides is included and 100 would behave like
3161  // a source radius AoE)
3162  float maxRotOffset = (float)(aoeRange * 0.001 * PI);
3163 
3164  effectiveTargets = ZoneManager::GetEntitiesInFoV(
3165  potentialTargets, srcPoint.x, srcPoint.y, sourceRot,
3166  maxRotOffset, true);
3167  }
3168  break;
3169  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::AreaType_t::STRAIGHT_LINE:
3170  if(primaryTarget && skillRange->GetAoeLineWidth() >= 0)
3171  {
3172  // Create a rotated rectangle to represent the line with
3173  // a designated width equal to the AoE range
3174  Point dest(primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(),
3175  primaryTarget->GetCurrentY());
3176 
3177  // Half width on each side
3178  float lineWidth = (float)(skillRange->GetAoeLineWidth() * 10) *
3179  0.5f;
3180 
3181  // If not rushing, max length can go beyond the target
3182  if(skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() !=
3183  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH)
3184  {
3185  // AoE range is extended by the hitbox size of the source
3186  aoeRange = aoeRange + (double)(effectiveSource
3187  ->GetHitboxSize() * 10.0);
3188 
3189  dest = server->GetZoneManager()->GetLinearPoint(srcPoint.x,
3190  srcPoint.y, dest.x, dest.y, (float)aoeRange, false);
3191  }
3192 
3193  std::list<Point> rect;
3194  if(dest.y != srcPoint.y)
3195  {
3196  // Set the line rectangle corner points from the source,
3197  // destination and perpendicular slope
3198 
3199  float pSlope = ((dest.x - srcPoint.x) /
3200  (dest.y - srcPoint.y)) * -1.f;
3201  float denom = (float)std::sqrt(1.0f + std::pow(pSlope, 2));
3202 
3203  float xOffset = (float)(lineWidth / denom);
3204  float yOffset = (float)fabs((pSlope * lineWidth) / denom);
3205 
3206  if(pSlope > 0)
3207  {
3208  rect.push_back(Point(srcPoint.x + xOffset,
3209  srcPoint.y + yOffset));
3210  rect.push_back(Point(srcPoint.x - xOffset,
3211  srcPoint.y - yOffset));
3212  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x - xOffset,
3213  dest.y - yOffset));
3214  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x + xOffset,
3215  dest.y + yOffset));
3216  }
3217  else
3218  {
3219  rect.push_back(Point(srcPoint.x - xOffset,
3220  srcPoint.y + yOffset));
3221  rect.push_back(Point(srcPoint.x + xOffset,
3222  srcPoint.y - yOffset));
3223  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x - xOffset,
3224  dest.y + yOffset));
3225  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x + xOffset,
3226  dest.y - yOffset));
3227  }
3228  }
3229  else if(dest.x != srcPoint.x)
3230  {
3231  // Horizontal line, add points directly to +Y/-Y
3232  rect.push_back(Point(srcPoint.x, srcPoint.y + lineWidth));
3233  rect.push_back(Point(srcPoint.x, srcPoint.y - lineWidth));
3234  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x, dest.y - lineWidth));
3235  rect.push_back(Point(dest.x, dest.y + lineWidth));
3236  }
3237  else
3238  {
3239  // Same point, only add the target
3240  effectiveTargets.push_back(primaryTarget);
3241  break;
3242  }
3243 
3244  // Gather entities in the polygon as well as ones bisected
3245  // by the boundaries on their hitbox
3246  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
3247  for(auto t : zone->GetActiveEntities())
3248  {
3249  if(t == effectiveSource)
3250  {
3251  // Do not check, just add
3252  effectiveTargets.push_back(t);
3253  continue;
3254  }
3255 
3256  t->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
3257 
3258  Point p(t->GetCurrentX(), t->GetCurrentY());
3259  if(ZoneManager::PointInPolygon(p, rect,
3260  (float)t->GetHitboxSize() * 10.f))
3261  {
3262  effectiveTargets.push_back(t);
3263  }
3264  }
3265  }
3266  break;
3267  default:
3268  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
3269  {
3270  return libcomp::String("Unsupported skill area type"
3271  " encountered: %1\n")
3272  .Arg((uint8_t)skillRange->GetAreaType());
3273  });
3274 
3275  Fizzle(ctx);
3276  return false;
3277  }
3278  }
3279 
3280  // Remove all targets that are not ready
3281  effectiveTargets.remove_if([](
3282  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3283  {
3284  return !target->Ready();
3285  });
3286 
3287  // Make sure the primary target isn't in here twice and it is also
3288  // at the front of the list
3289  if(primaryTarget)
3290  {
3291  effectiveTargets.remove_if([primaryTarget](
3292  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3293  {
3294  return target == primaryTarget;
3295  });
3296  effectiveTargets.push_front(primaryTarget);
3297  }
3298 
3299  // Filter out invalid effective targets
3300  auto validType = skillRange->GetValidType();
3301  switch(validType)
3302  {
3303  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::ENEMY:
3304  effectiveTargets.remove_if([effectiveSource](
3305  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3306  {
3307  return effectiveSource->SameFaction(target) ||
3308  !target->IsAlive();
3309  });
3310  break;
3311  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::ALLY:
3312  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::PARTY:
3313  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_ALLY:
3314  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_PARTY:
3315  {
3316  bool deadOnly = validType ==
3317  objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_ALLY ||
3318  validType == objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_PARTY;
3319  effectiveTargets.remove_if([effectiveSource, deadOnly](
3320  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3321  {
3322  return !effectiveSource->SameFaction(target)
3323  || (deadOnly == target->IsAlive());
3324  });
3325 
3326  if(validType == objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::PARTY ||
3327  validType == objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::DEAD_PARTY)
3328  {
3329  // This will result in an empty list if cast by an enemy, though
3330  // technically it should in that instance
3331  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(effectiveSource->GetEntityID());
3332  uint32_t sourcePartyID = sourceState ? sourceState->GetPartyID() : 0;
3333 
3334  effectiveTargets.remove_if([sourceState, sourcePartyID](
3335  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3336  {
3337  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(target->GetEntityID());
3338  return !state || (!sourcePartyID && state != sourceState) ||
3339  (sourcePartyID && state->GetPartyID() != sourcePartyID);
3340  });
3341  }
3342  }
3343  break;
3344  case objects::MiEffectiveRangeData::ValidType_t::SOURCE:
3345  // Only affect source and partner or summoner
3346  {
3347  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
3348  effectiveSource->GetEntityID());
3349  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> otherValid;
3350  if(sourceState)
3351  {
3352  switch(effectiveSource->GetEntityType())
3353  {
3354  case EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
3355  otherValid = sourceState->GetDemonState();
3356  break;
3357  case EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
3358  otherValid = sourceState->GetCharacterState();
3359  break;
3360  default:
3361  // Shouldn't happen
3362  break;
3363  }
3364  }
3365 
3366  effectiveTargets.remove_if([effectiveSource, otherValid](
3367  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3368  {
3369  return target != effectiveSource && target != otherValid;
3370  });
3371  }
3372  break;
3373  default:
3374  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
3375  {
3376  return libcomp::String("Unsupported skill valid target type "
3377  "encountered: %1\n").Arg((uint8_t)validType);
3378  });
3379 
3380  Fizzle(ctx);
3381  return false;
3382  }
3383 
3384  // Filter out special target restrictions
3385  if(pSkill->FunctionID)
3386  {
3387  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_GENDER_RESTRICTED)
3388  {
3389  // Specific gender targets only
3390  uint8_t gender = (uint8_t)skillData->GetSpecial()
3391  ->GetSpecialParams(0);
3392  effectiveTargets.remove_if([gender](
3393  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3394  {
3395  return target->GetGender() != gender;
3396  });
3397  }
3398  else if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SLEEP_RESTRICTED)
3399  {
3400  // Sleeping targets only
3401  effectiveTargets.remove_if([](
3402  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target)
3403  {
3404  return !target->StatusEffectActive(SVR_CONST.STATUS_SLEEP);
3405  });
3406  }
3407  }
3408 
3409  // Make sure nothing would be added twice (should only be the initial
3410  // target under very strange conditions)
3411  effectiveTargets.remove_if([pSkill](
3412  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eTarget)
3413  {
3414  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
3415  {
3416  if(target.EntityState == eTarget)
3417  {
3418  return true;
3419  }
3420  }
3421 
3422  return false;
3423  });
3424 
3425  // Filter down to all valid targets
3426  uint16_t aoeReflect = 0;
3427  for(auto effectiveTarget : effectiveTargets)
3428  {
3429  SkillTargetResult target;
3430  target.PrimaryTarget = effectiveTarget == primaryTarget;
3431  target.EntityState = effectiveTarget;
3432  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(effectiveTarget, pSkill, true,
3433  source);
3434  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, effectiveTarget);
3435 
3436  // Set NRA
3437  // If the primary target is still in the set and a reflect did not
3438  // occur on the original target, apply the initially calculated flags
3439  // If an AOE target that is not the source is in the set, increase
3440  // the number of AOE reflections as needed
3441  bool isSource = effectiveTarget == source;
3442  if(target.PrimaryTarget && !initialHitReflect)
3443  {
3444  target.HitNull = skill.Nulled;
3445  target.HitReflect = skill.Reflected;
3446  target.HitAbsorb = skill.Absorbed;
3447  target.HitAvoided = skill.Nulled != 0;
3448  target.NRAAffinity = skill.NRAAffinity;
3449  }
3450  else
3451  {
3452  if(SetNRA(target, skill) && !isSource)
3453  {
3454  aoeReflect++;
3455  }
3456 
3457  ApplySecondaryCounter(source, target, pSkill);
3458  }
3459 
3460  skill.Targets.push_back(target);
3461  }
3462 
3463  // For each time the skill was reflected by an AOE target, target the
3464  // source again as each can potentially have NRA and damage calculated
3465  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < aoeReflect; i++)
3466  {
3467  SkillTargetResult target;
3468  target.EntityState = source;
3469 
3470  // Calculate the effects done to and from the source itself
3471  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, true, source);
3472  GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, source);
3473  SetNRA(target, skill);
3474 
3475  skill.Targets.push_back(target);
3476  }
3477 
3478  // Apply skill effect functions now that all normal handling is complete
3479  auto fIter = mSkillEffectFunctions.find(pSkill->FunctionID);
3480  if(fIter != mSkillEffectFunctions.end())
3481  {
3482  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(source
3483  ->GetEntityID());
3484  fIter->second(*this, activated, ctx, client);
3485  }
3486 
3487  if(skillData->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() && ctx->ApplyAggro)
3488  {
3489  // Update all opponents
3490  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
3491  for(auto& target : skill.Targets)
3492  {
3493  if(!source->SameFaction(target.EntityState))
3494  {
3495  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(true, source,
3496  target.EntityState);
3497  }
3498  }
3499  }
3500 
3501  // Finalize the skill processing
3502  ProcessSkillResultFinal(pSkill, ctx);
3503 
3504  // Lastly if the skill was countered, finalize those too
3505  if(ctx->CounteringSkills.size() > 0)
3506  {
3507  for(auto counteringSkill : ctx->CounteringSkills)
3508  {
3509  auto copyCtx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>(
3510  *counteringSkill->ExecutionContext);
3511  ProcessSkillResult(counteringSkill->Activated, copyCtx);
3512 
3513  // Now that we're done make sure we clean up the context pointer
3514  counteringSkill->ExecutionContext = nullptr;
3515  }
3516  }
3517 
3518  // Clean up the related contexts as they are no longer needed
3519  ctx->CounteringSkills.clear();
3520  ctx->SubContexts.clear();
3521 
3522  return true;
3523 }
3524 
3525 void SkillManager::ProcessSkillResultFinal(const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
3526  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
3527 {
3528  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
3529 
3530  auto activated = skill.Activated;
3531  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
3532  auto zone = skill.CurrentZone;
3533 
3534  auto server = mServer.lock();
3535  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
3536  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3537  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
3538  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
3539 
3540  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage();
3541  bool hasBattleDamage = damageData->GetBattleDamage()->GetFormula()
3542  != objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::NONE;
3543  if(hasBattleDamage)
3544  {
3545  auto battleDamage = damageData->GetBattleDamage();
3546  if(!CalculateDamage(source, pSkill))
3547  {
3548  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
3549  {
3550  return libcomp::String("Damage failed to calculate: %1\n")
3551  .Arg(skill.SkillID);
3552  });
3553 
3554  return;
3555  }
3556 
3557  // Now that damage has been calculated, merge final NRA flags in
3558  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
3559  {
3560  switch(target.HitNull)
3561  {
3562  case 1:
3563  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_BLOCK_PHYS;
3564  break;
3565  case 2:
3566  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_BLOCK_MAGIC;
3567  break;
3568  case 3:
3569  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_BARRIER;
3570  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
3571  break;
3572  default:
3573  break;
3574  }
3575 
3576  switch(target.HitReflect)
3577  {
3578  case 1:
3579  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REFLECT_PHYS;
3580  break;
3581  case 2:
3582  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REFLECT_MAGIC;
3583  break;
3584  default:
3585  break;
3586  }
3587 
3588  if(target.HitAbsorb)
3589  {
3590  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_ABSORB;
3591  }
3592  }
3593 
3594  // Now that damage is calculated, apply drain
3595  uint8_t hpDrainPercent = battleDamage->GetHPDrainPercent();
3596  uint8_t mpDrainPercent = battleDamage->GetMPDrainPercent();
3597  if(skill.Targets.size() > 0 &&
3598  (hpDrainPercent > 0 || mpDrainPercent > 0))
3599  {
3600  auto selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source, skill.Targets, true);
3601 
3602  int32_t hpDrain = 0, mpDrain = 0;
3603  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
3604  {
3605  if(target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC &&
3606  hpDrainPercent > 0)
3607  {
3608  hpDrain = (int32_t)(hpDrain -
3609  (int32_t)floorl((float)target.Damage1 *
3610  (float)hpDrainPercent * 0.01f));
3611 
3612  // Check limit
3613  if(hpDrain > 9999)
3614  {
3615  hpDrain = 9999;
3616  }
3617  }
3618 
3619  if(target.Damage2Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC &&
3620  mpDrainPercent > 0)
3621  {
3622  mpDrain = (int32_t)(mpDrain -
3623  (int32_t)floorl((float)target.Damage2 *
3624  (float)mpDrainPercent * 0.01f));
3625 
3626  // Check limit
3627  if(mpDrain > 9999)
3628  {
3629  mpDrain = 9999;
3630  }
3631  }
3632  }
3633 
3634  // Heal HP/MP if part of the skill even if value is 0
3635  if(hpDrainPercent)
3636  {
3637  selfTarget->Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING;
3638  selfTarget->Damage1 = hpDrain < 0 ? hpDrain : 0;
3639  }
3640 
3641  if(mpDrainPercent)
3642  {
3643  selfTarget->Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING;
3644  selfTarget->Damage2 = mpDrain < 0 ? mpDrain : 0;
3645  }
3646  }
3647  }
3648 
3649  // Get knockback info
3650  auto skillKnockback = damageData->GetKnockBack();
3651  int8_t kbMod = skillKnockback->GetModifier();
3652  uint8_t kbType = skillKnockback->GetKnockBackType();
3653  float kbDistance = (float)(skillKnockback->GetDistance() * 10);
3654  bool knockbackExists = false;
3655 
3656  bool doTalk = IsTalkSkill(skill.Definition, false) &&
3657  source->StatusRestrictTalkCount() == 0;
3658  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
3659  source->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
3660 
3661  // Apply calculation results
3662  std::list<std::pair<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>, uint8_t>> talkDone;
3663  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
3664  {
3665  if(target.HitAvoided) continue;
3666 
3667  auto targetCalc = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true, source);
3668  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
3669 
3670  target.EntityState->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
3671  target.EntityState->ExpireStatusTimes(now);
3672 
3673  bool hpMpSet = false;
3674  int32_t hpDamage = target.TechnicalDamage + target.PursuitDamage;
3675  int32_t mpDamage = 0;
3676  if(hasBattleDamage)
3677  {
3678  for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
3679  {
3680  bool hpMode = i == 0;
3681  int32_t val = i == 0 ? target.Damage1 : target.Damage2;
3682  uint8_t type = i == 0 ? target.Damage1Type : target.Damage2Type;
3683 
3684  switch(type)
3685  {
3686  case DAMAGE_EXPLICIT_SET:
3687  if(hpMode)
3688  {
3689  hpDamage = val;
3690  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
3691  hpMpSet = true;
3692  }
3693  else
3694  {
3695  mpDamage = val;
3696  target.Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
3697  hpMpSet = true;
3698  }
3699  break;
3700  case DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING:
3701  case DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN:
3702  if(hpMode)
3703  {
3704  hpDamage = (int32_t)(hpDamage + val);
3705  }
3706  else
3707  {
3708  mpDamage = (int32_t)(mpDamage + val);
3709  }
3710  break;
3711  default:
3712  if(hpMode)
3713  {
3714  hpDamage = (int32_t)(hpDamage + val);
3715  }
3716  break;
3717  }
3718  }
3719  }
3720 
3721  auto battleDamage = damageData->GetBattleDamage();
3722  bool applyKnockback = skill.HardStrike && !target.IndirectTarget &&
3723  !target.HitAvoided && !target.HitAbsorb;
3724  if(!applyKnockback && kbMod && kbType != 2)
3725  {
3726  if(battleDamage->GetFormula()
3727  == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::NONE)
3728  {
3729  // Perform knockback if configured for knockback with no
3730  // damage possible
3731  applyKnockback = true;
3732  }
3733  else if((battleDamage->GetFormula()
3734  == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL &&
3735  battleDamage->GetModifier1() == 0 &&
3736  battleDamage->GetModifier2() == 0) ||
3737  (!hpMpSet && hpDamage > 0) || (hpMpSet && hpDamage != -1))
3738  {
3739  // Also perform knockback if there is normal damage but no
3740  // damage potential or if damage will be dealt (since effective
3741  // damage cannot be set to zero past this point)
3742  applyKnockback = true;
3743  }
3744  }
3745 
3746  if(applyKnockback)
3747  {
3748  if(target.EntityState->GetStatusTimes(STATUS_KNOCKBACK))
3749  {
3750  // Cannot knockback during knockback (or active rush)
3751  applyKnockback = false;
3752  }
3753  else if(target.GuardModifier)
3754  {
3755  // Guarding prevents all knockback increases
3756  applyKnockback = false;
3757  }
3758  }
3759 
3760  if(applyKnockback)
3761  {
3762  // Check if the source removes knockback
3763  int32_t kbRemove = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
3764  TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_REMOVE, calcState) * 100;
3765 
3766  // Check if the target nulls knockback
3767  int32_t kbNull = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
3768  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_NULL,
3769  targetCalc) * 100;
3770 
3771  target.CanKnockback = true;
3772  if(target.EntityState->StatusRestrictKnockbackCount() > 0)
3773  {
3774  // Target knockback locked by status
3775  target.CanKnockback = false;
3776  }
3777  else if(kbRemove && (kbRemove >= 10000 ||
3778  RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) <= kbRemove))
3779  {
3780  // Source nulls knockback
3781  target.CanKnockback = false;
3782  }
3783  else if(kbNull && (kbNull >= 10000 ||
3784  RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) <= kbNull))
3785  {
3786  // Target nulls knockback
3787  target.CanKnockback = false;
3788  }
3789 
3790  if(target.CanKnockback)
3791  {
3792  float kbRecoverBoost = (float)(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
3793  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_RECOVERY,
3794  targetCalc) * 0.01);
3795 
3796  // Hard strikes are instant knockbacks if we get here
3797  float kb = target.EntityState->UpdateKnockback(now,
3798  skill.HardStrike ? -1.f : kbMod, kbRecoverBoost);
3799  if(kb == 0.f)
3800  {
3801  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_KNOCKBACK;
3802  target.EffectCancellations |= EFFECT_CANCEL_KNOCKBACK;
3803  target.CanHitstun = true;
3804  knockbackExists = true;
3805  }
3806  }
3807  }
3808 
3809  // Now that knockback has been calculated, determine which status
3810  // effects to apply
3811  std::set<uint32_t> cancelOnKill;
3812  if(!(skill.ExecutionContext && !skill.ExecutionContext->ApplyStatusEffects) &&
3813  !target.IndirectTarget && !target.HitAbsorb)
3814  {
3815  cancelOnKill = HandleStatusEffects(source, target, pSkill);
3816 
3817  if(hpMpSet)
3818  {
3819  // Explicitly setting HP/MP stops all ailment damage
3820  target.AilmentDamage = 0;
3821  }
3822  else
3823  {
3824  hpDamage += target.AilmentDamage;
3825  }
3826  }
3827 
3828  // If death is applied, kill the target and stop HP damage
3829  bool targetKilled = false;
3830  int32_t hpAdjustedSum = 0, mpAdjusted = 0;
3831  if(target.AddedStatuses.find(SVR_CONST.STATUS_DEATH) !=
3832  target.AddedStatuses.end())
3833  {
3834  targetKilled = target.EntityState->SetHPMP(0, -1, false, true,
3835  0, hpAdjustedSum, mpAdjusted);
3836  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_INSTANT_DEATH;
3837  }
3838 
3839  // Now apply damage
3840  if(hpMpSet || hpDamage != 0 || mpDamage != 0)
3841  {
3842  bool targetAlive = target.EntityState->IsAlive();
3843 
3844  // If the target can be killed by the hit, get clench chance
3845  // but only if ailment damage has not occurred. Suicide skills
3846  // cannot allow the source to clench and zone target all skills
3847  // cannot be clenched by anyone.
3848  int32_t clenchChance = 0;
3849  if(hpDamage > 0 && targetAlive && !target.AilmentDamage &&
3850  skill.FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_TARGET_ALL &&
3851  (skill.FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUICIDE ||
3852  target.EntityState != source))
3853  {
3854  // If reflect occurred, a special clench type must be active
3855  auto clenchType = skill.Reflected
3856  ? TokuseiAspectType::CLENCH_REFLECT_CHANCE
3857  : TokuseiAspectType::CLENCH_CHANCE;
3858 
3859  clenchChance = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
3860  target.EntityState, clenchType, targetCalc) * 100.0);
3861  }
3862 
3863  if(!hpMpSet)
3864  {
3865  hpDamage = -hpDamage;
3866  mpDamage = -mpDamage;
3867  }
3868 
3869  int32_t hpAdjusted;
3870  if(target.EntityState->SetHPMP(hpDamage, mpDamage, !hpMpSet,
3871  true, clenchChance, hpAdjusted, mpAdjusted))
3872  {
3873  // Changed from alive to dead or vice versa
3874  if(target.EntityState->GetEntityType() ==
3875  EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
3876  {
3877  // Reset accept revival
3878  auto targetClientState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
3879  target.EntityState->GetEntityID());
3880  if(targetClientState)
3881  {
3882  targetClientState->SetAcceptRevival(false);
3883  }
3884  }
3885 
3886  if(targetAlive)
3887  {
3888  targetKilled = true;
3889  }
3890  else
3891  {
3892  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REVIVAL;
3893  }
3894  }
3895 
3896  hpAdjustedSum += hpAdjusted;
3897 
3898  if(hpMpSet)
3899  {
3900  // Correct explicit damage
3901  target.Damage1 = -hpAdjusted;
3902  target.Damage2 = -mpAdjusted;
3903  }
3904  else if(hpAdjusted != hpDamage)
3905  {
3906  // HP damage can only change when clench occurs (HP update
3907  // prevented from being lethal when it should have been).
3908  if(!target.TechnicalDamage &&
3909  !target.PursuitDamage)
3910  {
3911  // If no technical or pursuit damage occurs, the number
3912  // just reduces to the actual damage dealt.
3913  target.Damage1 = -hpAdjusted;
3914  }
3915  else
3916  {
3917  // Otherwise the overflow numbers display and the entity
3918  // is left with 1 HP if they're still alive (see followup
3919  // packet for how we force this).
3920  target.ClenchOverflow = !targetKilled;
3921  }
3922 
3923  // I'm going to assume the second flag was SUPPOSED to leave
3924  // you with 1 HP but the client doesn't do this :(
3925  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_CLENCH;
3926  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_CLENCH;
3927  }
3928 
3929  if(mpAdjusted != 0)
3930  {
3931  target.RecalcTriggers.insert(TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_MP);
3932  }
3933  }
3934 
3935  if(hpAdjustedSum != 0)
3936  {
3937  target.RecalcTriggers.insert(TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP);
3938 
3939  if(hpAdjustedSum < 0)
3940  {
3941  target.EffectCancellations |= EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE;
3942  }
3943  }
3944 
3945  // If we haven't already set hitstun, check if we can now
3946  if(!target.CanHitstun)
3947  {
3948  bool nonDamaging = battleDamage->GetFormula()
3949  == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::NONE ||
3950  battleDamage->GetModifier1() == 0;
3951  bool calcHitstun = false;
3952  if(hpAdjustedSum < 0)
3953  {
3954  calcHitstun = true;
3955  }
3956  else if(!target.IndirectTarget && nonDamaging &&
3957  !target.HitAvoided && !target.HitAbsorb &&
3958  skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetHitStopTime())
3959  {
3960  // If the skill is non-damaging and the target is
3961  // "hit", hitstun applies when set
3962  calcHitstun = true;
3963  }
3964 
3965  if(calcHitstun)
3966  {
3967  int32_t hitstunNull = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
3968  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::HITSTUN_NULL,
3969  targetCalc) * 100;
3970  target.CanHitstun = hitstunNull != 10000 &&
3971  (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_GUARDED) == 0 && !target.HitAbsorb &&
3972  (hitstunNull < 0 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) > hitstunNull);
3973  }
3974  }
3975 
3976  // Hitstun or damage counts as a hit cancellation
3977  if((target.CanHitstun || hpAdjustedSum < 0) && !target.HitAvoided)
3978  {
3979  target.EffectCancellations |= EFFECT_CANCEL_HIT;
3980  }
3981 
3982  switch(target.EntityState->GetEntityType())
3983  {
3984  case EntityType_t::ENEMY:
3985  if(hpAdjustedSum < 0)
3986  {
3987  // If an enemy is damaged by a player character or their
3988  // partner demon, keep track of the damage for the damage
3989  // race drop rule
3990  auto sourceState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
3991  source->GetEntityID());
3992  if(sourceState)
3993  {
3994  auto worldCID = sourceState->GetWorldCID();
3995 
3996  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(
3997  target.EntityState);
3998  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
3999  if(!enemy->DamageSourcesKeyExists(worldCID))
4000  {
4001  enemy->SetDamageSources(worldCID,
4002  (uint64_t)-hpAdjustedSum);
4003  }
4004  else
4005  {
4006  uint64_t damage = enemy->GetDamageSources(
4007  worldCID);
4008  damage = (uint64_t)(damage + (uint64_t)-hpAdjustedSum);
4009  enemy->SetDamageSources(worldCID, damage);
4010  }
4011  }
4012  }
4013  break;
4014  default:
4015  break;
4016  }
4017 
4018  // Set the killed state
4019  if(targetKilled)
4020  {
4021  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_LETHAL;
4022  target.EffectCancellations |= EFFECT_CANCEL_DEATH;
4023 
4024  for(uint32_t effectID : cancelOnKill)
4025  {
4026  target.AddedStatuses.erase(effectID);
4027  }
4028  }
4029 
4030  if(doTalk && !targetKilled &&
4031  target.EntityState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::ENEMY)
4032  {
4033  if(ApplyNegotiationDamage(source, target, pSkill))
4034  {
4035  talkDone.push_back(std::make_pair(target.EntityState,
4036  target.TalkFlags));
4037  }
4038  }
4039  }
4040 
4041  ApplyZoneSpecificEffects(pSkill);
4042 
4043  std::set<uint32_t> keepEffects;
4044  if(skill.FunctionID &&
4045  skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SLEEP_RESTRICTED)
4046  {
4047  // Sleep effects are not cancelled by these skills
4048  keepEffects.insert(SVR_CONST.STATUS_SLEEP);
4049  }
4050 
4051  // Handle status and skill interruptions
4052  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4053  {
4054  if(target.EffectCancellations)
4055  {
4056  auto eState = target.EntityState;
4057  uint8_t cancelFlags = target.EffectCancellations;
4058 
4059  bool cancelled = false;
4060 
4061  auto keep = eState->IsAlive() ? keepEffects : std::set<uint32_t>();
4062  eState->CancelStatusEffects(cancelFlags, cancelled, keep);
4063 
4064  HandleSkillInterrupt(source, target, pSkill);
4065 
4066  if(cancelled)
4067  {
4068  target.RecalcTriggers.insert(
4069  TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE);
4070  }
4071  }
4072  }
4073 
4074  // Now that previous effects have been cancelled, add the new ones
4075  uint32_t effectTime = (uint32_t)std::time(0);
4076  bool canAddEffects = skill.Definition->GetDamage()->AddStatusesCount() > 0;
4077  if(!ctx || ctx->ApplyStatusEffects)
4078  {
4079  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4080  {
4081  bool ailmentDamage = target.AilmentDamage != 0;
4082  if(ailmentDamage && target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE)
4083  {
4084  // This will display zero normal damage but it appears to be
4085  // the only way to get ailment damage to show when its the only
4086  // damage dealt using the late-game damage timing
4087  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
4088  }
4089 
4090  if(target.AddedStatuses.size() > 0)
4091  {
4092  auto removed = target.EntityState->AddStatusEffects(
4093  target.AddedStatuses, definitionManager, effectTime, false);
4094  for(auto r : removed)
4095  {
4096  target.CancelledStatuses.insert(r);
4097  }
4098 
4099  target.RecalcTriggers.insert(TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE);
4100  }
4101  else if(canAddEffects && target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE &&
4102  target.Damage2Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_NONE && !target.HitAvoided)
4103  {
4104  // If status effects could be added but weren't and the hit was
4105  // not avoided but no damage was dealt, the target was missed
4106  target.Damage1Type = target.Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_MISS;
4107  target.HitAvoided = true;
4108  }
4109  }
4110  }
4111 
4112  // Recalculate any effects that trigger from the skill effects
4113  std::unordered_map<int32_t, bool> effectRecalc;
4114  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4115  {
4116  if(target.RecalcTriggers.size() == 0) continue;
4117 
4118  std::unordered_map<int32_t, bool> result;
4119 
4120  auto eState = target.EntityState;
4121  auto& triggers = target.RecalcTriggers;
4122 
4123  // Anything with a status effect modified needs a full tokusei
4124  // and stat recalc
4125  bool statusChanged = triggers.find(TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE)
4126  != triggers.end();
4127  if(effectRecalc.find(eState->GetEntityID()) == effectRecalc.end())
4128  {
4129  if(statusChanged)
4130  {
4131  result = tokuseiManager->Recalculate(eState, true);
4132  }
4133  else
4134  {
4135  result = tokuseiManager->Recalculate(eState, triggers);
4136  }
4137  }
4138 
4139  for(auto resultPair : result)
4140  {
4141  if(effectRecalc.find(resultPair.first) == effectRecalc.end())
4142  {
4143  effectRecalc[resultPair.first] = resultPair.second;
4144  }
4145  else
4146  {
4147  effectRecalc[resultPair.first] |= resultPair.second;
4148  }
4149  }
4150 
4151  if(statusChanged && !effectRecalc[eState->GetEntityID()])
4152  {
4153  characterManager->RecalculateStats(eState);
4154  }
4155  }
4156 
4157  // Send negotiation results first since some are dependent upon the
4158  // skill hit
4159  if(talkDone.size() > 0)
4160  {
4161  HandleNegotiations(source, zone, talkDone);
4162  }
4163 
4164  if(!ctx || !ctx->Executed || !ctx->Finalized)
4165  {
4166  // Send right before finishing execution if we haven't already
4167  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
4168  source->GetEntityID());
4169  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
4170  FinalizeSkill(ctx, activated);
4171  }
4172 
4173  bool isDefense = (skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
4174  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD ||
4175  skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
4176  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE) && skill.PrimaryTarget;
4177 
4178  bool doRush = skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
4179  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH && skill.PrimaryTarget;
4180  if(doRush)
4181  {
4182  // If a rush is countered, do not actually rush
4183  bool countered = false;
4184  for(auto& target : skill.Targets)
4185  {
4186  if(target.PrimaryTarget &&
4187  (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_GUARDED) != 0 && target.HitAvoided)
4188  {
4189  countered = true;
4190  break;
4191  }
4192  }
4193 
4194  if(!countered)
4195  {
4196  SkillTargetResult* selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source,
4197  skill.Targets, true);
4198  selfTarget->Flags1 |= FLAG1_RUSH_MOVEMENT;
4199  }
4200  else
4201  {
4202  doRush = false;
4203  }
4204  }
4205 
4206  auto effectiveSource = skill.EffectiveSource;
4207  auto primaryTarget = skill.PrimaryTarget;
4208  auto effectiveTarget = primaryTarget ? primaryTarget : effectiveSource;
4209 
4210  uint64_t hitTimings[3];
4211  uint64_t completeTime = activated->GetExecutionTime() +
4212  (skill.Definition->GetDischarge()->GetStiffness() * 1000);
4213  uint64_t hitStopTime = activated->GetExecutionTime() +
4214  (skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetHitStopTime() * 1000);
4215  uint64_t selfDelay = 0;
4216 
4217  // Knockback time is a fixed 2s (hitstun can extend delay)
4218  uint64_t kbTime = activated->GetExecutionTime() + 2000000;
4219 
4220  // Make sure the hit stop times aren't somehow before now
4221  if(hitStopTime < now)
4222  {
4223  hitStopTime = now;
4224  }
4225 
4226  if(kbTime < now)
4227  {
4228  kbTime = now;
4229  }
4230 
4231  if(knockbackExists && !doRush && activated->GetLockOutTime() &&
4232  activated->GetLockOutTime() > now)
4233  {
4234  // Causing knockback results in a longer immobolization period for
4235  // the source entity but only if they would still be stopped by
4236  // the lockout time
4237  GetSelfTarget(source, skill.Targets, true);
4238  selfDelay = kbTime;
4239  }
4240 
4241  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
4242  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
4243 
4244  // The skill report packet can easily go over the max packet size so
4245  // the targets in the results need to be batched
4246  std::list<std::list<SkillTargetResult*>> targetBatches;
4247  std::list<SkillTargetResult*> currentBatch;
4248  int32_t currentBatchSize = 0;
4249  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4250  {
4251  int32_t currentTargetSize = (int32_t)(64 + (target.AddedStatuses.size() * 9)
4252  + (target.CancelledStatuses.size() * 4));
4253 
4254  // If the new list size + the header size is larger than the max
4255  // packet size, move on to the next batch
4256  if((uint32_t)(currentBatchSize + currentTargetSize + 15) > MAX_CHANNEL_PACKET_SIZE)
4257  {
4258  targetBatches.push_back(currentBatch);
4259  currentBatch.clear();
4260  currentBatchSize = currentTargetSize;
4261  }
4262  else
4263  {
4264  currentBatchSize += currentTargetSize;
4265  }
4266 
4267  currentBatch.push_back(&target);
4268  }
4269 
4270  // If we get here with an empty target list, send the empty list
4271  targetBatches.push_back(currentBatch);
4272 
4273  for(auto it = targetBatches.begin(); it != targetBatches.end(); it++)
4274  {
4275  if(it != targetBatches.begin())
4276  {
4277  timeMap.clear();
4278 
4279  // An execute packet must be sent once per report (even if its
4280  // identical) or the client starts ignoring the reports
4281  SendExecuteSkill(pSkill);
4282  }
4283 
4284  libcomp::Packet p;
4285  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_REPORTS);
4286  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
4287  p.WriteU32Little(skill.SkillID);
4288  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
4289 
4290  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)it->size());
4291  for(SkillTargetResult* skillTarget : *it)
4292  {
4293  SkillTargetResult& target = *skillTarget;
4294 
4295  p.WriteS32Little(target.EntityState->GetEntityID());
4296  p.WriteS32Little(abs(target.Damage1));
4297  p.WriteU8(target.Damage1Type);
4298  p.WriteS32Little(abs(target.Damage2));
4299  p.WriteU8(target.Damage2Type);
4300  p.WriteU16Little(target.Flags1);
4301 
4302  p.WriteU8(target.AilmentDamageType);
4303  p.WriteS32Little(abs(target.AilmentDamage));
4304 
4305  bool rushing = false, knockedBack = false;
4306  bool defended = isDefense && target.EntityState == skill.PrimaryTarget;
4307  hitTimings[0] = hitTimings[1] = hitTimings[2] = 0;
4308  if(target.Flags1 & FLAG1_KNOCKBACK)
4309  {
4310  uint8_t kbEffectiveType = kbType;
4311  if(kbType == 1 && target.PrimaryTarget)
4312  {
4313  // Targets of AOE knockback are treated like default knockback
4314  kbEffectiveType = 0;
4315  }
4316 
4317  // Ignore knockback type 2 which is "None"
4318  Point kbPoint(target.EntityState->GetCurrentX(),
4319  target.EntityState->GetCurrentY());
4320  switch(kbEffectiveType)
4321  {
4322  case 1:
4323  {
4324  // Away from the effective target (ex: AOE explosion)
4325  kbPoint = zoneManager->MoveRelative(target.EntityState,
4326  effectiveTarget->GetCurrentX(), effectiveTarget->GetCurrentY(),
4327  kbDistance, true, now, kbTime);
4328  }
4329  break;
4330  case 4:
4331  if(target.EntityState != effectiveTarget)
4332  {
4333  // Move to the same spot as the target entity
4334  target.EntityState->SetOriginX(target.EntityState->GetCurrentX());
4335  target.EntityState->SetOriginY(target.EntityState->GetCurrentY());
4336  target.EntityState->SetOriginTicks(now);
4337 
4338  target.EntityState->SetDestinationX(effectiveTarget->GetCurrentX());
4339  target.EntityState->SetDestinationY(effectiveTarget->GetCurrentY());
4340  target.EntityState->SetDestinationTicks(kbTime);
4341  }
4342  break;
4343  case 5:
4344  {
4345  // Position becomes source position
4346  target.EntityState->SetOriginX(target.EntityState->GetCurrentX());
4347  target.EntityState->SetOriginY(target.EntityState->GetCurrentY());
4348  target.EntityState->SetOriginTicks(now);
4349 
4350  target.EntityState->SetDestinationX(source->GetCurrentX());
4351  target.EntityState->SetDestinationY(source->GetCurrentY());
4352  target.EntityState->SetDestinationTicks(kbTime);
4353  }
4354  break;
4355  case 0:
4356  case 3:
4357  default:
4358  // Default if not specified, directly away from source
4359  kbPoint = zoneManager->MoveRelative(target.EntityState, effectiveSource
4360  ->GetCurrentX(), effectiveSource->GetCurrentY(), kbDistance, true, now,
4361  kbTime);
4362  break;
4363  }
4364 
4365  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_KNOCKBACK, kbTime);
4366 
4367  p.WriteFloat(kbPoint.x);
4368  p.WriteFloat(kbPoint.y);
4369 
4370  knockedBack = true;
4371  }
4372  else if(target.EntityState == source && doRush)
4373  {
4374  // Set the new location of the rush user
4375  float dist = source->GetDistance(primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(),
4376  primaryTarget->GetCurrentY());
4377 
4378  hitTimings[0] = now;
4379  hitTimings[1] = now + 200000ULL;
4380 
4381  // Count rushing as knockback because functionally the same
4382  // AI and skill rules apply
4383  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_KNOCKBACK,
4384  hitTimings[1]);
4385 
4386  Point rushPoint = zoneManager->MoveRelative(source,
4387  primaryTarget->GetCurrentX(), primaryTarget->GetCurrentY(),
4388  dist + 250.f, false, now, hitTimings[1]);
4389 
4390  p.WriteFloat(rushPoint.x);
4391  p.WriteFloat(rushPoint.y);
4392 
4393  rushing = true;
4394  }
4395  else
4396  {
4397  p.WriteBlank(8);
4398  }
4399 
4400  p.WriteFloat(0); // Unused additional timing value
4401 
4402  // Calculate hit timing
4403  if(rushing)
4404  {
4405  // Timing calculated above
4406  }
4407  else if(target.CanHitstun)
4408  {
4409  uint64_t effectiveHitStop = knockedBack && kbTime > hitStopTime
4410  ? kbTime : hitStopTime;
4411  if(target.Damage1 || defended)
4412  {
4413  // Damage dealt (or defended), determine stun time
4414  bool extendHitStun = target.AilmentDamageType != 0 || knockedBack;
4415  if(extendHitStun)
4416  {
4417  // Apply extended hit stop and determine what else may be needed
4418  hitTimings[0] = knockedBack ? now : completeTime;
4419  hitTimings[1] = effectiveHitStop;
4420 
4421  if(!target.AilmentDamageType)
4422  {
4423  // End after hit stop
4424  hitTimings[2] = effectiveHitStop;
4425  }
4426  else
4427  {
4428  // Apply ailment damage after hit stop
4429  hitTimings[2] = effectiveHitStop + target.AilmentDamageTime;
4430  }
4431  }
4432  else
4433  {
4434  // Normal hit stop
4435  hitTimings[2] = effectiveHitStop;
4436  }
4437 
4438  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_HIT_STUN,
4439  hitTimings[2]);
4440  }
4441  else if(knockedBack)
4442  {
4443  // Normal hit stop time to finish knockback
4444  hitTimings[0] = now;
4445  hitTimings[2] = hitTimings[1] = effectiveHitStop;
4446 
4447  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_HIT_STUN,
4448  hitTimings[2]);
4449  }
4450  else if(target.AilmentDamageType != 0)
4451  {
4452  // Only apply ailment stun time
4453  hitTimings[2] = effectiveHitStop + target.AilmentDamageTime;
4454 
4455  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_HIT_STUN,
4456  hitTimings[2]);
4457  }
4458  else
4459  {
4460  // No damage, just result displays
4461  hitTimings[2] = completeTime;
4462  }
4463  }
4464  else if(target.EntityState == source && selfDelay)
4465  {
4466  // Source is quasi-hitstunned until the knockback ends
4467  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_IMMOBILE, selfDelay);
4468  hitTimings[2] = selfDelay;
4469  }
4470 
4471  for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++)
4472  {
4473  if(hitTimings[i])
4474  {
4475  timeMap[(uint32_t)(p.Size() + (4 * i))] = hitTimings[i];
4476  }
4477  }
4478 
4479  // Double back at the end and write client specific times
4480  p.WriteBlank(12);
4481 
4482  p.WriteU8(target.TalkFlags);
4483 
4484  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::StatusEffect>> addedStatuses;
4485  std::set<uint32_t> cancelledStatuses;
4486  if(target.AddedStatuses.size() > 0)
4487  {
4488  // Make sure the added statuses didn't get removed/re-added
4489  // already for some reason
4490  auto effects = target.EntityState->GetStatusEffects();
4491  for(auto added : target.AddedStatuses)
4492  {
4493  if(effects.find(added.first) != effects.end())
4494  {
4495  addedStatuses.push_back(effects[added.first]);
4496  }
4497  }
4498 
4499  for(auto cancelled : target.CancelledStatuses)
4500  {
4501  if(effects.find(cancelled) == effects.end())
4502  {
4503  cancelledStatuses.insert(cancelled);
4504  }
4505  }
4506  }
4507 
4508  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)addedStatuses.size());
4509  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)cancelledStatuses.size());
4510 
4511  for(auto effect : addedStatuses)
4512  {
4513  p.WriteU32Little(effect->GetEffect());
4514  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)effect->GetExpiration());
4515  p.WriteU8(effect->GetStack());
4516  }
4517 
4518  for(auto cancelled : cancelledStatuses)
4519  {
4520  p.WriteU32Little(cancelled);
4521  }
4522 
4523  p.WriteU16Little(target.Flags2);
4524  p.WriteS32Little(target.TechnicalDamage);
4525  p.WriteS32Little(target.PursuitDamage);
4526  }
4527 
4528  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p, timeMap);
4529  }
4530 
4531  // Handle all skill side effects
4532  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> durabilityHit;
4533  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> inheritSkill;
4534  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> revived;
4535  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> killed;
4536  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> cOverflow;
4537  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> aiHit;
4538  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> displayStateModified;
4539  std::set<int32_t> interruptEvent;
4540 
4541  // Determine if the zone or specific teams need to be tracked
4542  bool trackZone = false;
4543  bool diaspora = zone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::DIASPORA;
4544  std::set<std::shared_ptr<objects::Team>> trackedTeams;
4545 
4546  bool playerSkill = false;
4547  switch(source->GetEntityType())
4548  {
4549  case EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
4550  durabilityHit.insert(source);
4551  playerSkill = true;
4552  break;
4553  case EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
4554  // If any (direct) target didn't auto avoid, raise inheritance
4555  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4556  {
4557  if(!target.IndirectTarget &&
4558  (!target.HitAvoided || !target.HitNull || !target.HitReflect))
4559  {
4560  inheritSkill.insert(source);
4561  break;
4562  }
4563  }
4564  playerSkill = true;
4565  break;
4566  default:
4567  break;
4568  }
4569 
4570  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
4571  {
4572  auto eState = target.EntityState;
4573  auto& triggers = target.RecalcTriggers;
4574 
4575  bool playerEntity = false;
4576  switch(eState->GetEntityType())
4577  {
4578  case EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
4579  if(!target.IndirectTarget && !target.HitAvoided &&
4580  !target.HitAbsorb)
4581  {
4582  durabilityHit.insert(eState);
4583  }
4584  playerEntity = true;
4585  break;
4586  case EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
4587  // Manual avoids do not raise inheritance, auto avoids do
4588  if(!target.IndirectTarget &&
4589  (!target.HitAvoided || target.HitNull || target.HitReflect))
4590  {
4591  inheritSkill.insert(eState);
4592  }
4593  playerEntity = true;
4594  break;
4595  default:
4596  break;
4597  }
4598 
4599  if(target.ClenchOverflow)
4600  {
4601  cOverflow.insert(eState);
4602  }
4603 
4604  bool targetRevived = false;
4605  bool targetKilled = false;
4606  if(target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING &&
4607  (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_REVIVAL) != 0)
4608  {
4609  revived.insert(eState);
4610 
4611  // Set AI ignore
4612  target.EntityState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_IGNORE,
4613  now + (uint64_t)AI_REVIVE_IGNORE);
4614  }
4615  else if((target.Flags1 & FLAG1_LETHAL) != 0)
4616  {
4617  killed.insert(eState);
4618  targetKilled = true;
4619  }
4620 
4621  if(playerEntity)
4622  {
4623  // If a player entity is hit by a combat skill while in an event,
4624  // whether it did damage or not, interrupt the event
4625  if(skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() &&
4626  eState->HasActiveEvent())
4627  {
4628  interruptEvent.insert(eState->GetWorldCID());
4629  }
4630 
4631  // If alive state changed for a character and they are in a tracked
4632  // zone, notify the rest of the players/teammates
4633  if((targetRevived || targetKilled) &&
4634  eState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER &&
4635  zone->GetDefinition()->GetTrackTeam())
4636  {
4637  if(diaspora)
4638  {
4639  // Track entire zone
4640  trackZone = true;
4641  }
4642  else
4643  {
4644  // Track just the teams
4645  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
4646  eState->GetEntityID());
4647  auto team = state ? state->GetTeam() : nullptr;
4648  if(team)
4649  {
4650  trackedTeams.insert(team);
4651  }
4652  }
4653  }
4654 
4655  // Be sure to update the party display state
4656  if(targetRevived || targetKilled ||
4657  triggers.find(TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP) != triggers.end() ||
4658  triggers.find(TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_MP) != triggers.end())
4659  {
4660  displayStateModified.insert(eState);
4661  }
4662  }
4663 
4664  if(eState != source && eState->GetAIState() &&
4665  skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
4666  {
4667  aiHit.push_back(eState);
4668  }
4669  }
4670 
4671  // Process all additional effects
4672  for(auto entity : cOverflow)
4673  {
4674  // Entities can survive a lethal blow via clench without damage
4675  // reduction (when pursuit or technical damage occurs) but will
4676  // sit at 0 HP. The problem arises when the entity regens back to
4677  // max HP - 1 which is easily noticeable on player entities. The
4678  // sitting at 0 HP behavior has been observed but to more properly
4679  // correct this, increase each entity's HP back to 1 via regen
4680  // client side since it still is server side. Only send this to
4681  // the same connections sent the skill packets.
4682  libcomp::Packet p;
4683  CharacterManager::GetTDamagePacket(p, entity->GetEntityID(), 1, 0);
4684  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
4685  }
4686 
4687  if(interruptEvent.size() > 0)
4688  {
4689  InterruptEvents(interruptEvent);
4690  }
4691 
4692  if(playerSkill)
4693  {
4694  HandleFusionGauge(pSkill);
4695  }
4696 
4697  // Update durability (ignore for PvP)
4698  if(!skill.InPvP)
4699  {
4700  for(auto entity : durabilityHit)
4701  {
4702  HandleDurabilityDamage(entity, pSkill);
4703  }
4704  }
4705 
4706  // Update inherited skills
4707  for(auto entity : inheritSkill)
4708  {
4709  // Even if the hit is avoided, anything that touches the entity will
4710  // update inheriting skills
4711  HandleSkillLearning(entity, pSkill);
4712  }
4713 
4714  // Report each revived entity
4715  if(revived.size() > 0)
4716  {
4717  HandleRevives(zone, revived, pSkill);
4718  }
4719 
4720  // Set all killed entities
4721  if(killed.size() > 0)
4722  {
4723  HandleKills(source, zone, killed);
4724  }
4725 
4726  // Make sure all AI entities that got attacked are notified
4727  if(aiHit.size() > 0)
4728  {
4729  server->GetAIManager()->CombatSkillHit(aiHit, source,
4730  skill.Definition);
4731  }
4732 
4733  if(source->GetAIState() &&
4734  skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
4735  {
4736  // The skill hit if it wasn't nulled, absorbed or countered
4737  bool hit = !skill.Nulled && !skill.Absorbed &&
4738  ctx->CounteringSkills.size() == 0;
4739  server->GetAIManager()->CombatSkillComplete(source,
4740  activated, skill.Definition, skill.PrimaryTarget,
4741  hit);
4742  }
4743 
4744  // Report all updates to the world
4745  if(displayStateModified.size() > 0)
4746  {
4747  characterManager->UpdateWorldDisplayState(
4748  displayStateModified);
4749  }
4750 
4751  // Report tracking updates
4752  if(trackZone)
4753  {
4754  zoneManager->UpdateTrackedZone(zone);
4755  }
4756  else
4757  {
4758  for(auto team : trackedTeams)
4759  {
4760  zoneManager->UpdateTrackedTeam(team);
4761  }
4762  }
4763 }
4764 
4765 std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill> SkillManager::GetProcessingSkill(
4766  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
4767  std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext> ctx)
4768 {
4769  if(ctx && ctx->Skill)
4770  {
4771  return ctx->Skill;
4772  }
4773 
4774  auto server = mServer.lock();
4775  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
4776  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
4777  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated->GetSourceEntity());
4778  auto cSource = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(source);
4779 
4780  auto skill = std::make_shared<ProcessingSkill>();
4781  skill->SkillID = skillData->GetCommon()->GetID();
4782  skill->Definition = skillData;
4783  skill->Activated = activated;
4784  skill->BaseAffinity = skill->EffectiveAffinity = skillData->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
4785  skill->EffectiveDependencyType = skillData->GetBasic()->GetDependencyType();
4786  skill->EffectiveSource = source;
4787  skill->CurrentZone = source->GetZone();
4788  skill->InPvP = skill->CurrentZone &&
4789  skill->CurrentZone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::PVP;
4790  skill->IsItemSkill =
4791  skillData->GetBasic()->GetFamily() == SkillFamily_t::ITEM ||
4792  skillData->GetBasic()->GetFamily() == SkillFamily_t::DEMON_SOLO;
4793  skill->IsProjectile = skillData->GetDischarge()->GetProjectileSpeed() &&
4794  skillData->GetTarget()->GetType() != objects::MiTargetData::Type_t::NONE;
4795  skill->FunctionID = skillData->GetDamage()->GetFunctionID();
4796 
4797  // Non-combat skills cannot be NRA'd meaning NRA_HEAL was (apparently)
4798  // never implemented originally
4799  skill->CanNRA = skillData->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() &&
4800  (!skill->FunctionID ||
4801  skill->FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_TARGET_ALL);
4802 
4803  if(skill->FunctionID &&
4804  (skill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_ABS_DAMAGE ||
4805  skill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_ZONE_TARGET_ALL))
4806  {
4807  skill->AbsoluteDamage = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams(0);
4808  }
4809 
4810  // Set the expertise and any boosts gained from ranks
4811  // The expertise type of a skill is determined by the first
4812  // type listed in the expertise growth list (defaults to attack)
4813  auto expGrowth = skillData->GetExpertGrowth();
4814  if(expGrowth.size() > 0)
4815  {
4816  skill->ExpertiseType = expGrowth.front()->GetExpertiseID();
4817  if(cSource)
4818  {
4819  skill->ExpertiseRankBoost = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
4820  skill->ExpertiseType, definitionManager);
4821 
4822  // Calculate charge reduction before any boost extensions
4823  skill->ChargeReduce = (int16_t)(skill->ExpertiseRankBoost * 2);
4824 
4825  if(skill->ExpertiseType == EXPERTISE_ATTACK)
4826  {
4827  // Attack expertise gains an extra bonus from regal presence
4828  uint8_t boost2 = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
4829  EXPERTISE_CHAIN_R_PRESENCE, definitionManager);
4830  skill->ExpertiseRankBoost = (uint8_t)(skill->ExpertiseRankBoost + boost2);
4831  }
4832  }
4833  }
4834 
4835  // Calculate effective dependency and affinity types if "weapon" is specified
4836  if(skill->EffectiveDependencyType == SkillDependencyType_t::WEAPON ||
4837  skill->BaseAffinity == 1)
4838  {
4839  auto weapon = cSource ? cSource->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
4840  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_WEAPON).Get() : nullptr;
4841  auto weaponDef = weapon ? definitionManager->GetItemData(weapon->GetType()) : nullptr;
4842 
4843  if(weaponDef)
4844  {
4845  if(skill->EffectiveDependencyType == SkillDependencyType_t::WEAPON)
4846  {
4847  switch(weaponDef->GetBasic()->GetWeaponType())
4848  {
4849  case objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE:
4850  skill->EffectiveDependencyType = SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR;
4851  break;
4852  case objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::CLOSE_RANGE:
4853  default:
4854  // Use default below
4855  break;
4856  }
4857  }
4858 
4859  if(skill->EffectiveAffinity == 1)
4860  {
4861  if(weaponDef->GetBasic()->GetWeaponType() ==
4862  objects::MiItemBasicData::WeaponType_t::LONG_RANGE)
4863  {
4864  // If the bullet has an affinity, use that instead
4865  auto bullet = cSource ? cSource->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
4866  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_BULLETS).Get() : nullptr;
4867  auto bulletDef = bullet ? definitionManager->GetItemData(bullet->GetType()) : nullptr;
4868  if(bulletDef && bulletDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity() != 0)
4869  {
4870  skill->EffectiveAffinity = bulletDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
4871  }
4872  }
4873 
4874  if(skill->EffectiveAffinity == 1)
4875  {
4876  // Weapon affinity comes from the basic effect (if one is set)
4877  uint32_t basicEffect = weapon->GetBasicEffect();
4878  auto bWeaponDef = definitionManager->GetItemData(
4879  basicEffect ? basicEffect : weapon->GetType());
4880  if(bWeaponDef)
4881  {
4882  skill->EffectiveAffinity = bWeaponDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
4883  }
4884  }
4885 
4886  // Take the lowest value applied tokusei affinity override if one exists
4887  auto tokuseiOverrides = server->GetTokuseiManager()->GetAspectValueList(source,
4888  TokuseiAspectType::WEAPON_AFFINITY_OVERRIDE);
4889  if(tokuseiOverrides.size() > 0)
4890  {
4891  tokuseiOverrides.sort();
4892  skill->EffectiveAffinity = (uint8_t)tokuseiOverrides.front();
4893  }
4894 
4895  skill->WeaponAffinity = skill->EffectiveAffinity;
4896  }
4897  }
4898 
4899  // If at any point the type cannot be determined,
4900  // default to strike, close range (ex: no weapon/non-character source)
4901  if(skill->EffectiveAffinity == 1)
4902  {
4903  skill->EffectiveAffinity = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_STRIKE - RES_OFFSET;
4904  }
4905 
4906  if(skill->EffectiveDependencyType == SkillDependencyType_t::WEAPON)
4907  {
4908  skill->EffectiveDependencyType = SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR;
4909  }
4910  }
4911 
4912  if(cSource)
4913  {
4914  // Set the knowledge rank for critical and durability adjustment
4915  switch(skill->EffectiveDependencyType)
4916  {
4917  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
4918  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
4919  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
4920  skill->KnowledgeRank = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
4921  EXPERTISE_WEAPON_KNOWLEDGE);
4922  break;
4923  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
4924  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
4925  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
4926  skill->KnowledgeRank = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
4927  EXPERTISE_GUN_KNOWLEDGE);
4928  break;
4929  default:
4930  break;
4931  }
4932 
4933  // Magic control lowers charge time
4934  uint8_t mcRank = cSource->GetExpertiseRank(EXPERTISE_MAGIC_CONTROL);
4935  skill->ChargeReduce = (int16_t)(skill->ChargeReduce +
4936  (uint8_t)(mcRank / 10) * 4);
4937  }
4938 
4939  if(ctx)
4940  {
4941  skill->ExecutionContext = ctx.get();
4942  ctx->Skill = skill;
4943  }
4944 
4945  // Lastly set skill definition overrides
4946  auto sourceState = GetCalculatedState(source, skill, false, nullptr);
4947 
4948  auto affinityOverride = server->GetTokuseiManager()->GetAspectValueList(source,
4949  TokuseiAspectType::AFFINITY_OVERRIDE, sourceState);
4950  for(double ovr : affinityOverride)
4951  {
4952  // Skip weapon affinity overrides (includes base affinity because the
4953  // skill is being redefined, not added to)
4954  if(ovr > (double)((uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_WEAPON - RES_OFFSET) &&
4955  ovr <= (double)((uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RES_SUICIDE - RES_OFFSET))
4956  {
4957  skill->BaseAffinity = skill->EffectiveAffinity = (uint8_t)ovr;
4958  break;
4959  }
4960  }
4961 
4962  return skill;
4963 }
4964 
4965 
4966 std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> SkillManager::GetCalculatedState(
4967  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
4968  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
4969  bool isTarget, const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& otherState)
4970 {
4971  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
4972 
4973  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> calcState;
4974  if(isTarget)
4975  {
4976  calcState = skill.TargetCalcStates[eState->GetEntityID()];
4977  }
4978  else if(otherState)
4979  {
4980  calcState = skill.SourceCalcStates[otherState->GetEntityID()];
4981  }
4982 
4983  if(!calcState)
4984  {
4985  auto server = mServer.lock();
4986  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
4987 
4988  // Determine which tokusei are active and don't need to be calculated again
4989  if(!isTarget && otherState && skill.SourceExecutionState)
4990  {
4991  // If we're calculating for a skill target, start with the execution state
4992  calcState = skill.SourceExecutionState;
4993  }
4994  else
4995  {
4996  // Otherwise start with the base calculated state
4997  calcState = eState->GetCalculatedState();
4998  }
4999 
5000  // Keep track of tokusei that are not valid for the skill conditions but
5001  // CAN become active given the correct target (only valid for source)
5002  std::unordered_map<int32_t, uint16_t> stillPendingSkillTokusei;
5003 
5004  auto effectiveTokusei = calcState->GetEffectiveTokusei();
5005  auto pendingSkillTokusei = calcState->GetPendingSkillTokusei();
5006  auto aspects = calcState->GetExistingTokuseiAspects();
5007 
5008  // Determine if a skill context will change the state calculation
5009  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiSkillData> contextSkill;
5010  if(!isTarget)
5011  {
5012  // Always use current skill
5013  contextSkill = skill.Definition;
5014  }
5015  else
5016  {
5017  // Only apply guard stats if targeted (adjustments apply while
5018  // guarding too)
5019  auto otherSkill = eState->GetActivatedAbility();
5020  auto otherDef = otherSkill ? otherSkill->GetSkillData() : nullptr;
5021  if(otherDef && otherDef->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
5022  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD)
5023  {
5024  contextSkill = otherDef;
5025  }
5026  }
5027 
5028  bool useSkillContext = contextSkill != nullptr;
5029  if(useSkillContext)
5030  {
5031  // Filter invalid skills out
5032  if(contextSkill->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory() !=
5033  SKILL_CATEGORY_ACTIVE)
5034  {
5035  // Active only
5036  contextSkill = nullptr;
5037  useSkillContext = false;
5038  }
5039  else if(contextSkill->GetCommon()->CorrectTblCount() == 0)
5040  {
5041  // No adjustments, nothing to do
5042  contextSkill = nullptr;
5043  useSkillContext = false;
5044  }
5045  else if(contextSkill->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage()->GetFormula() ==
5046  objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE)
5047  {
5048  // Used post recalc only
5049  useSkillContext = false;
5050  }
5051  }
5052 
5053  bool modified = contextSkill != nullptr;
5054  for(auto pair : pendingSkillTokusei)
5055  {
5056  auto tokusei = definitionManager->GetTokuseiData(pair.first);
5057  if(tokusei)
5058  {
5059  auto sourceConditions = tokusei->GetSkillConditions();
5060  auto targetConditions = tokusei->GetSkillTargetConditions();
5061  if((sourceConditions.size() > 0 && isTarget) ||
