5062  (targetConditions.size() > 0 && !isTarget))
5063  {
5064  stillPendingSkillTokusei[tokusei->GetID()] = pair.second;
5065  continue;
5066  }
5067 
5068  auto& conditions = isTarget
5069  ? targetConditions : sourceConditions;
5070  int8_t eval = EvaluateTokuseiSkillConditions(eState,
5071  conditions, pSkill, otherState);
5072  if(eval == 1)
5073  {
5074  effectiveTokusei[tokusei->GetID()] = pair.second;
5075  modified = true;
5076 
5077  for(auto aspect : tokusei->GetAspects())
5078  {
5079  aspects.insert((int8_t)aspect->GetType());
5080  }
5081  }
5082  else if(eval == -1)
5083  {
5084  stillPendingSkillTokusei[tokusei->GetID()] = pair.second;
5085  }
5086  }
5087  }
5088 
5089  if(modified)
5090  {
5091  // If the tokusei set was modified, calculate skill specific stats
5092  calcState = std::make_shared<objects::CalculatedEntityState>();
5093  calcState->SetExistingTokuseiAspects(aspects);
5094  calcState->SetEffectiveTokusei(effectiveTokusei);
5095  calcState->SetPendingSkillTokusei(stillPendingSkillTokusei);
5096 
5097  eState->RecalculateStats(definitionManager, calcState,
5098  useSkillContext ? contextSkill : nullptr);
5099 
5100  if(contextSkill &&
5101  contextSkill->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage()->GetFormula() ==
5102  objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE)
5103  {
5104  // Stats on skill override entity stats
5105  for(auto ct : contextSkill->GetCommon()->GetCorrectTbl())
5106  {
5107  calcState->SetCorrectTbl(ct->GetType(), ct->GetValue());
5108  }
5109  }
5110  }
5111 
5112  if(isTarget)
5113  {
5114  skill.TargetCalcStates[eState->GetEntityID()] = calcState;
5115  }
5116  else if(otherState)
5117  {
5118  skill.SourceCalcStates[otherState->GetEntityID()] = calcState;
5119  }
5120  }
5121 
5122  return calcState;
5123 }
5124 
5125 int8_t SkillManager::EvaluateTokuseiSkillConditions(
5126  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
5127  const std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::TokuseiSkillCondition>>& conditions,
5128  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
5129  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& otherState)
5130 {
5131  // Just like non-skill conditions, compare singular (and) and option group
5132  // (or) conditions and only return 0 if the entire clause evaluates to
5133  // true. If at any point an invalid target condition is encountered, the
5134  // conditions cannot be evaluated until this changes.
5135  std::unordered_map<uint8_t, bool> optionGroups;
5136  for(auto condition : conditions)
5137  {
5138  // If the option group has already had a condition pass, skip it
5139  uint8_t optionGroupID = condition->GetOptionGroupID();
5140  if(optionGroupID != 0)
5141  {
5142  if(optionGroups.find(optionGroupID) == optionGroups.end())
5143  {
5144  optionGroups[optionGroupID] = false;
5145  }
5146  else if(optionGroups[optionGroupID])
5147  {
5148  continue;
5149  }
5150  }
5151 
5152  int8_t eval = EvaluateTokuseiSkillCondition(eState, condition, pSkill,
5153  otherState);
5154  if(eval == -1)
5155  {
5156  // If a single condition requires re-evaluation, stop here
5157  return -1;
5158  }
5159 
5160  if(optionGroupID != 0)
5161  {
5162  optionGroups[optionGroupID] |= (eval == 1);
5163  }
5164  else if(eval == 0)
5165  {
5166  // Standalone did not pass
5167  return 0;
5168  }
5169  }
5170 
5171  for(auto pair : optionGroups)
5172  {
5173  if(!pair.second)
5174  {
5175  // Option group did not pass
5176  return 0;
5177  }
5178  }
5179 
5180  return 1;
5181 }
5182 
5183 int8_t SkillManager::EvaluateTokuseiSkillCondition(
5184  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
5185  const std::shared_ptr<objects::TokuseiSkillCondition>& condition,
5186  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
5187  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& otherState)
5188 {
5189  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
5190 
5191  // TokuseiSkillCondition comparators can only be equals or not equal
5192  bool negate = condition->GetComparator() ==
5193  objects::TokuseiCondition::Comparator_t::NOT_EQUAL;
5194 
5195  switch(condition->GetSkillConditionType())
5196  {
5197  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ANY_SKILL:
5198  // Used to bind conditions to skill processing time only
5199  return 1;
5200  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::EXPLICIT_SKILL:
5201  // Current skill is the specified skill
5202  return (skill.SkillID == (uint32_t)condition->GetValue()) == !negate
5203  ? 1 : 0;
5204  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ACTION_TYPE:
5205  // Current skill is the specified action type
5206  return ((int32_t)skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
5207  condition->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5208  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::AFFINITY:
5209  // Current skill is the specified affinity type
5210  return ((int32_t)skill.BaseAffinity == condition->GetValue() ||
5211  (int32_t)skill.EffectiveAffinity == condition->GetValue()) == !negate
5212  ? 1 : 0;
5213  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::SKILL_CLASS:
5214  // Current skill is magic, physical or misc
5215  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
5216  {
5217  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL:
5218  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR:
5219  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR_LNGR:
5220  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_LNGR:
5221  case SkillDependencyType_t::SUPPORT:
5222  // Magic
5223  return (1 == condition->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5224  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
5225  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
5226  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
5227  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
5228  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
5229  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
5230  // Physical
5231  return (2 == condition->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5232  case SkillDependencyType_t::NONE:
5233  default:
5234  // Misc
5235  return (3 == condition->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5236  }
5237  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::SKILL_EXPERTISE:
5238  // Current skill is the specified expertise type
5239  return ((int32_t)skill.ExpertiseType == condition->GetValue()) ==
5240  !negate ? 1 : 0;
5241  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_DIGITALIZED:
5242  // Enemy is digitalized (must be a player entity)
5243  if(!otherState)
5244  {
5245  // Target required
5246  return -1;
5247  }
5248  else
5249  {
5250  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(otherState
5251  ->GetEntityID(), false);
5252  auto cState = state ? state->GetCharacterState() : nullptr;
5253  return (cState && cState->GetDigitalizeState()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5254  }
5255  break;
5256  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_EQUIPPED:
5257  // Enemy has the specified item equipped (must be a character)
5258  if(!otherState)
5259  {
5260  // Target required
5261  return -1;
5262  }
5263  else
5264  {
5265  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(
5266  otherState);
5267 
5268  bool equipped = false;
5269  if(cState)
5270  {
5271  for(auto equip : cState->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems())
5272  {
5273  if(!equip.IsNull() &&
5274  equip->GetType() == (uint32_t)condition->GetValue())
5275  {
5276  equipped = true;
5277  break;
5278  }
5279  }
5280  }
5281 
5282  return equipped == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5283  }
5284  break;
5285  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_FACTION:
5286  // Enemy is in a different faction (0) or the same faction (1)
5287  if(!otherState)
5288  {
5289  // Target required
5290  return -1;
5291  }
5292  else
5293  {
5294  return eState->SameFaction(otherState) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5295  }
5296  break;
5297  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_GENDER:
5298  // Enemy's gender matches the specified type (can be any target type)
5299  if(!otherState)
5300  {
5301  // Target required
5302  return -1;
5303  }
5304  else
5305  {
5306  int32_t gender = (int32_t)objects::MiNPCBasicData::Gender_t::NONE;
5307 
5308  auto demonData = otherState->GetDevilData();
5309  if(demonData)
5310  {
5311  gender = demonData
5312  ? (int32_t)demonData->GetBasic()->GetGender() : gender;
5313  }
5314  else if(otherState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
5315  {
5316  auto character = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(
5317  otherState)->GetEntity();
5318  gender = character ? (int32_t)character->GetGender() : gender;
5319  }
5320 
5321  return (gender == condition->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5322  }
5323  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_LNC:
5324  // Enemy's LNC matches the specified type (can be any target type)
5325  if(!otherState)
5326  {
5327  // Target required
5328  return -1;
5329  }
5330  else
5331  {
5332  return otherState->IsLNCType((uint8_t)condition->GetValue(),
5333  false) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5334  }
5335  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::ENEMY_TOKUSEI:
5336  // Enemy has a tokusei matching the specified type (tokusei cannot be
5337  // skill granted like the one being checked)
5338  if(!otherState)
5339  {
5340  // Target required
5341  return -1;
5342  }
5343  else
5344  {
5345  return otherState->GetCalculatedState()->EffectiveTokuseiKeyExists(
5346  condition->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5347  }
5348  default:
5349  break;
5350  }
5351 
5352  // The remaining conditions depend on the other entity being a demon
5353  if(!otherState)
5354  {
5355  // Target required
5356  return -1;
5357  }
5358 
5359  auto demonData = otherState ? otherState->GetDevilData() : nullptr;
5360  if(!demonData)
5361  {
5362  // Target is not a demon
5363  return 0;
5364  }
5365 
5366  switch(condition->GetSkillConditionType())
5367  {
5368  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_TYPE:
5369  // Demon is the specified type
5370  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetBasic()->GetID() == condition
5371  ->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5372  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_FAMILY:
5373  // Demon is the specified family
5374  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetFamily() == condition
5375  ->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5376  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_RACE:
5377  // Demon is the specified race
5378  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace() == condition
5379  ->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5380  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_TITLE:
5381  // Demon has the specified title
5382  return ((int32_t)demonData->GetBasic()->GetTitle() == condition
5383  ->GetValue()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5384  case TokuseiSkillConditionType::DEMON_PARTNER_MATCH:
5385  // Demon is the same family, race or type as the entity's partner demon
5386  {
5387  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData> partnerData;
5388  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(eState
5389  ->GetEntityID(), false);
5390  if(state && state->GetCharacterState() == eState &&
5391  state->GetDemonState()->Ready())
5392  {
5393  partnerData = state->GetDemonState()->GetDevilData();
5394  }
5395 
5396  if(!partnerData)
5397  {
5398  // Unlike the target not existing, the partner not existing is
5399  // not a condition to evaluate later
5400  return negate ? 1 : 0;
5401  }
5402 
5403  switch(condition->GetValue())
5404  {
5405  case 0:
5406  // Same family
5407  return (partnerData->GetCategory()->GetFamily() ==
5408  demonData->GetCategory()->GetFamily()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5409  case 1:
5410  // Same race
5411  return (partnerData->GetCategory()->GetRace() ==
5412  demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5413  case 2:
5414  // Same type
5415  return (partnerData->GetBasic()->GetID() ==
5416  demonData->GetBasic()->GetID()) == !negate ? 1 : 0;
5417  default:
5418  return 0;
5419  }
5420  }
5421  break;
5422  default:
5423  break;
5424  }
5425 
5426  return 0;
5427 }
5428 
5429 uint16_t SkillManager::CalculateOffenseValue(
5430  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
5431  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& target,
5432  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5433 {
5434  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
5435  if(skill.OffenseValues.find(target->GetEntityID()) != skill.OffenseValues.end())
5436  {
5437  return skill.OffenseValues[target->GetEntityID()];
5438  }
5439 
5440  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target);
5441 
5442  int16_t clsr = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::CLSR);
5443  int16_t lngr = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::LNGR);
5444  int16_t spell = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::SPELL);
5445  int16_t support = calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::SUPPORT);
5446 
5447  uint16_t off = 0;
5448  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
5449  {
5450  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
5451  off = (uint16_t)clsr;
5452  break;
5453  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
5454  off = (uint16_t)lngr;
5455  break;
5456  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL:
5457  off = (uint16_t)spell;
5458  break;
5459  case SkillDependencyType_t::SUPPORT:
5460  off = (uint16_t)support;
5461  break;
5462  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
5463  off = (uint16_t)(lngr + spell / 2);
5464  break;
5465  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR:
5466  off = (uint16_t)(spell + clsr / 2);
5467  break;
5468  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_LNGR:
5469  off = (uint16_t)(spell + lngr / 2);
5470  break;
5471  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
5472  off = (uint16_t)(clsr + lngr + spell);
5473  break;
5474  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
5475  off = (uint16_t)(lngr + clsr + spell);
5476  break;
5477  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR_LNGR:
5478  off = (uint16_t)(spell + clsr + lngr);
5479  break;
5480  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
5481  off = (uint16_t)(clsr + spell / 2);
5482  break;
5483  case SkillDependencyType_t::NONE:
5484  default:
5485  LogSkillManagerError([skill]()
5486  {
5487  return libcomp::String("Invalid dependency type for"
5488  " damage calculation encountered: %1\n")
5489  .Arg((uint8_t)skill.EffectiveDependencyType);
5490  });
5491 
5492  return false;
5493  }
5494 
5495  if(skill.ExecutionContext->CounteredSkill)
5496  {
5497  // If countering, modify the offensive value with the offense value
5498  // of the original skill used, min for invalid dependency type
5499  uint16_t counterOff = 0;
5500  if(skill.ExecutionContext->CounteredSkill
5501  ->EffectiveDependencyType == SkillDependencyType_t::NONE)
5502  {
5503  counterOff = 1;
5504  }
5505  else
5506  {
5507  counterOff = CalculateOffenseValue(target, source,
5508  skill.ExecutionContext->CounteredSkill);
5509  }
5510 
5511  off = (uint16_t)(off + (counterOff * 2));
5512  }
5513 
5514  skill.OffenseValues[target->GetEntityID()] = off;
5515 
5516  return off;
5517 }
5518 
5519 bool SkillManager::ApplyPrimaryCounter(
5520  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
5521  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill, bool guard)
5522 {
5523  auto tActivated = pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetActivatedAbility();
5524  if(!tActivated || !pSkill->PrimaryTarget)
5525  {
5526  return false;
5527  }
5528 
5529  if(pSkill->ExecutionContext->CounteredSkill)
5530  {
5531  // Cannot double counter
5532  return false;
5533  }
5534 
5535  SkillTargetResult target;
5536  target.PrimaryTarget = true;
5537  target.EntityState = pSkill->PrimaryTarget;
5538  target.CalcState = GetCalculatedState(pSkill->PrimaryTarget, pSkill,
5539  true, source);
5540 
5541  auto tSkillData = tActivated->GetSkillData();
5542  switch(tSkillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
5543  {
5544  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::COUNTER:
5545  if(HandleCounter(source, target, pSkill))
5546  {
5547  pSkill->Targets.push_back(target);
5548  return true;
5549  }
5550  break;
5551  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE:
5552  if(HandleDodge(source, target, pSkill))
5553  {
5554  pSkill->Targets.push_back(target);
5555  return true;
5556  }
5557  break;
5558  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD:
5559  if(guard && HandleGuard(source, target, pSkill))
5560  {
5561  pSkill->Targets.push_back(target);
5562  return true;
5563  }
5564  break;
5565  default:
5566  // Cancellations occur based on knockback or damage later
5567  break;
5568  }
5569 
5570  return false;
5571 }
5572 
5573 void SkillManager::ApplySecondaryCounter(const std::shared_ptr<
5574  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
5575  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5576 {
5577  if(!target.HitNull && !target.HitAbsorb && !target.HitReflect &&
5578  pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
5579  {
5580  // Check if the target dodges or guards the skill. Counters
5581  // only apply for the primary target and are handled earlier.
5582  auto tActivated = target.EntityState->GetActivatedAbility();
5583  if(tActivated && target.EntityState != pSkill->EffectiveSource)
5584  {
5585  auto tSkillData = tActivated->GetSkillData();
5586  switch(tSkillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
5587  {
5588  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD:
5589  HandleGuard(source, target, pSkill);
5590  break;
5591  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE:
5592  HandleDodge(source, target, pSkill);
5593  break;
5594  default:
5595  // Cancellations occur based on knockback or damage
5596  // later
5597  break;
5598  }
5599  }
5600  }
5601 }
5602 
5603 bool SkillManager::HandleGuard(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
5604  SkillTargetResult& target, const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5605 {
5606  auto tActivated = target.EntityState->GetActivatedAbility();
5607  if(!tActivated)
5608  {
5609  return false;
5610  }
5611 
5612  bool guardValid = false;
5613  uint8_t cancelType = 1;
5614  int8_t activationID = tActivated->GetActivationID();
5615  if(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetDefensible())
5616  {
5617  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
5618  {
5619  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::ATTACK:
5620  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SPIN:
5621  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
5622  guardValid = true;
5623  break;
5624  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH:
5625  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
5626  cancelType = 3; // Display guard break animation
5627  break;
5628  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
5629  // Nothing happens, skill stays active
5630  return true;
5631  default:
5632  break;
5633  }
5634  }
5635 
5636  bool quake = false;
5637  if(!guardValid && pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIASPORA_QUAKE)
5638  {
5639  guardValid = true;
5640  quake = true;
5641  }
5642 
5643  if(guardValid &&
5644  tActivated->GetChargedTime() <= pSkill->Activated->GetHitTime())
5645  {
5646  auto tSkillData = tActivated->GetSkillData();
5647 
5648  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_GUARDED;
5649  target.GuardModifier = tSkillData->GetDamage()
5650  ->GetBattleDamage()->GetModifier1();
5651 
5652  // Fast track execute now but fizzle if not the primary target,
5653  // defense bonus still applies
5654  auto guardCtx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
5655  guardCtx->CounteredSkill = pSkill;
5656  guardCtx->FastTrack = true;
5657  guardCtx->Fizzle = quake ||
5658  target.EntityState != pSkill->PrimaryTarget;
5659 
5660  if(ExecuteSkill(target.EntityState, activationID, source
5661  ->GetEntityID(), guardCtx))
5662  {
5663  LogSkillManagerDebug([target, pSkill]()
5664  {
5665  return libcomp::String("%1 guards against skill %2[%3].\n")
5666  .Arg(target.EntityState->GetEntityLabel())
5667  .Arg(pSkill->SkillID)
5668  .Arg(pSkill->Activated->GetActivationID());
5669  });
5670 
5671  if(quake)
5672  {
5673  // The Diaspora Quake skill is fully cancelled when guarding
5674  target.HitNull = 2;
5675  target.HitAvoided = true;
5676  }
5677 
5678  pSkill->ExecutionContext->SubContexts.push_back(guardCtx);
5679  return true;
5680  }
5681  }
5682 
5683  CancelSkill(target.EntityState, tActivated->GetActivationID(), cancelType);
5684  return false;
5685 }
5686 
5687 bool SkillManager::HandleCounter(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
5688  SkillTargetResult& target, const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5689 {
5690  auto tActivated = target.EntityState->GetActivatedAbility();
5691  if(!tActivated)
5692  {
5693  return false;
5694  }
5695 
5696  uint8_t cancelType = 1;
5697  int8_t activationID = tActivated->GetActivationID();
5698  if(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetDefensible())
5699  {
5700  auto tSkillData = tActivated->GetSkillData();
5701  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
5702  {
5703  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::ATTACK:
5704  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH:
5705  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
5706  if(tActivated->GetChargedTime() <= pSkill->Activated->GetHitTime())
5707  {
5708  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_GUARDED;
5709  target.HitAvoided = true;
5710 
5711  auto counterCtx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
5712  counterCtx->CounteredSkill = pSkill;
5713  counterCtx->FastTrack = true;
5714 
5715  if(ExecuteSkill(target.EntityState, activationID, source
5716  ->GetEntityID(), counterCtx))
5717  {
5718  LogSkillManagerDebug([target, pSkill]()
5719  {
5720  return libcomp::String("%1 counters skill %2[%3].\n")
5721  .Arg(target.EntityState->GetEntityLabel())
5722  .Arg(pSkill->SkillID)
5723  .Arg(pSkill->Activated->GetActivationID());
5724  });
5725 
5726  pSkill->ExecutionContext->SubContexts.push_back(
5727  counterCtx);
5728  return true;
5729  }
5730  }
5731  break;
5732  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SPIN:
5733  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
5734  cancelType = 3; // Display counter break animation
5735  break;
5736  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
5737  // Nothing happens, skill stays active
5738  return true;
5739  default:
5740  break;
5741  }
5742  }
5743 
5744  CancelSkill(target.EntityState, activationID, cancelType);
5745  return false;
5746 }
5747 
5748 bool SkillManager::HandleDodge(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
5749  SkillTargetResult& target, const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5750 {
5751  auto tActivated = target.EntityState->GetActivatedAbility();
5752  if(!tActivated)
5753  {
5754  return false;
5755  }
5756 
5757  int8_t activationID = tActivated->GetActivationID();
5758  if(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetDefensible())
5759  {
5760  auto tSkillData = tActivated->GetSkillData();
5761  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
5762  {
5763  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::SHOT:
5764  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RAPID:
5765  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
5766  if(tActivated->GetChargedTime() <= pSkill->Activated->GetHitTime())
5767  {
5768  LogSkillManagerDebug([target, pSkill]()
5769  {
5770  return libcomp::String("%1 dodges skill %2[%3].\n")
5771  .Arg(target.EntityState->GetEntityLabel())
5772  .Arg(pSkill->SkillID)
5773  .Arg(pSkill->Activated->GetActivationID());
5774  });
5775 
5776  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_DODGED;
5777  target.Damage1Type = target.Damage2Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_MISS;
5778  target.HitAvoided = true;
5779 
5780  // Fast track execute now but fizzle if not the primary target
5781  auto dodgeCtx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>();
5782  dodgeCtx->CounteredSkill = pSkill;
5783  dodgeCtx->FastTrack = true;
5784  dodgeCtx->Fizzle = target.EntityState != pSkill->PrimaryTarget;
5785 
5786  if(ExecuteSkill(target.EntityState, activationID, source
5787  ->GetEntityID(), dodgeCtx))
5788  {
5789  pSkill->ExecutionContext->SubContexts.push_back(dodgeCtx);
5790  return true;
5791  }
5792  }
5793  break;
5794  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
5795  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
5796  // Nothing happens, skill stays active
5797  return true;
5798  default:
5799  break;
5800  }
5801  }
5802 
5803  CancelSkill(target.EntityState, activationID);
5804  return false;
5805 }
5806 
5807 bool SkillManager::HandleSkillInterrupt(const std::shared_ptr<
5808  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
5809  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5810 {
5811  auto eState = target.EntityState;
5812  uint8_t cancelFlags = target.EffectCancellations;
5813 
5814  // Check for skills that need to be cancelled
5815  if(cancelFlags & (EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE | EFFECT_CANCEL_KNOCKBACK))
5816  {
5817  auto tActivated = eState->GetActivatedAbility();
5818  auto tSkillData = tActivated ? tActivated->GetSkillData() : nullptr;
5819  bool applyInterrupt = false;
5820  if(tSkillData)
5821  {
5822  auto tDischarge = tSkillData->GetDischarge();
5823  if(!tActivated->GetExecutionRequestTime())
5824  {
5825  // Not executed yet, apply charge cancellations
5826  auto tCancel = tSkillData->GetCast()->GetCancel();
5827 
5828  if((cancelFlags & EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE) != 0 &&
5829  tCancel->GetDamageCancel())
5830  {
5831  // Interrupted from damage
5832  applyInterrupt = true;
5833  }
5834  else if((cancelFlags & EFFECT_CANCEL_KNOCKBACK) != 0 &&
5835  tCancel->GetKnockbackCancel())
5836  {
5837  // Interrupted from knockback
5838  applyInterrupt = true;
5839  }
5840 
5841  if(applyInterrupt)
5842  {
5843  // Cast interrupt must exist regardless of hitstun null
5844  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
5845 
5846  int32_t interruptNull = (int32_t)tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
5847  source, TokuseiAspectType::CAST_INTERRUPT_NULL,
5848  GetCalculatedState(eState, pSkill, true, source)) * 100;
5849 
5850  applyInterrupt = interruptNull < 10000 &&
5851  (interruptNull < 0 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) > interruptNull);
5852  }
5853  }
5854  else if(target.CanHitstun && tDischarge->GetShotInterruptible() &&
5855  !pSkill->IsProjectile)
5856  {
5857  // Determine which part of the skill can be interrupted (not
5858  // possible for projectile sources past charge)
5859  uint64_t hit = pSkill->Activated->GetHitTime();
5860  if(tActivated->GetHitTime() == 0)
5861  {
5862  // Interrupted before shot
5863  applyInterrupt = true;
5864  }
5865  else if(hit < tActivated->GetHitTime())
5866  {
5867  uint64_t hitWindowAdjust = (uint64_t)(500000.0 *
5868  (double)tDischarge->GetCompleteDelay() * 0.01);
5869  uint64_t hitTime = 0;
5870  if(tSkillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
5871  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH)
5872  {
5873  // The last X% of rush skills is not interruptible
5874  hitTime = (uint64_t)(tActivated->GetHitTime()
5875  - hitWindowAdjust);
5876  }
5877  else
5878  {
5879  // The first X% of non-rush skills is interruptible
5880  hitTime = (uint64_t)((tActivated->GetHitTime() -
5881  500000ULL) + hitWindowAdjust);
5882  }
5883 
5884  if(hit < hitTime)
5885  {
5886  // Interrupted during shot
5887  applyInterrupt = true;
5888  }
5889  }
5890  }
5891  }
5892 
5893  // If an interrupt would happen but the skill is a countering
5894  // skill, do not cancel
5895  if(applyInterrupt)
5896  {
5897  auto ctx = pSkill->ExecutionContext;
5898  for(auto counteringSkill : ctx->CounteringSkills)
5899  {
5900  if(counteringSkill->Activated == tActivated)
5901  {
5902  applyInterrupt = false;
5903  break;
5904  }
5905  }
5906  }
5907 
5908  if(applyInterrupt)
5909  {
5910  CancelSkill(eState, tActivated->GetActivationID());
5911  return true;
5912  }
5913  }
5914 
5915  return false;
5916 }
5917 
5918 std::set<uint32_t> SkillManager::HandleStatusEffects(const std::shared_ptr<
5919  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
5920  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
5921 {
5922  std::set<uint32_t> cancelOnKill;
5923 
5924  // Gather status effects from the skill
5925  auto directStatuses = pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses();
5926 
5927  int16_t stackScale = 1;
5928  if(pSkill->FunctionID)
5929  {
5930  // Apply FID transformations
5931  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_RANDOM ||
5932  pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_RANDOM2)
5933  {
5934  // Randomly pick one
5935  auto entry = libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(directStatuses);
5936  directStatuses.clear();
5937  directStatuses.push_back(entry);
5938  }
5939  else if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_SCALE)
5940  {
5941  // Multiply stacks from stat
5942  auto params = pSkill->Definition->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
5943  int16_t stat = source->GetCorrectValue((CorrectTbl)params[0]);
5944 
5945  stackScale = (int16_t)floor((float)stat *
5946  ((float)(100 - params[1]) / 100.f));
5947 
5948  if(stackScale < 1)
5949  {
5950  stackScale = 1;
5951  }
5952  }
5953  }
5954 
5955  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, double> addStatusMap;
5956  std::unordered_map<uint32_t,
5957  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiAddStatusTbl>> addStatusDefs;
5958  std::set<uint32_t> maxRates;
5959  for(auto addStatus : directStatuses)
5960  {
5961  uint32_t effectID = addStatus->GetStatusID();
5962  if(!addStatus->GetOnKnockback() || (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_KNOCKBACK) != 0)
5963  {
5964  addStatusMap[effectID] = (double)addStatus->GetSuccessRate();
5965  addStatusDefs[effectID] = addStatus;
5966  if(addStatus->GetSuccessRate() >= 100)
5967  {
5968  maxRates.insert(effectID);
5969  }
5970  }
5971  }
5972 
5973  auto eState = target.EntityState;
5974  auto sourceCalc = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, eState);
5975 
5976  // If a knockback occurred, add bonus knockback status effects from tokusei
5977  if((target.Flags1 & FLAG1_KNOCKBACK) != 0)
5978  {
5979  for(auto addStatus : mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager()->GetAspectMap(source,
5980  TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_STATUS_ADD, sourceCalc))
5981  {
5982  uint32_t effectID = (uint32_t)addStatus.first;
5983  if(addStatus.second >= 100)
5984  {
5985  maxRates.insert(effectID);
5986  }
5987 
5988  if(addStatusMap.find(effectID) != addStatusMap.end())
5989  {
5990  addStatusMap[effectID] += addStatus.second;
5991  }
5992  else
5993  {
5994  addStatusMap[effectID] = addStatus.second;
5995  }
5996  }
5997  }
5998 
5999  if(addStatusMap.size() == 0)
6000  {
6001  return cancelOnKill;
6002  }
6003 
6004  auto targetCalc = GetCalculatedState(eState, pSkill, true, source);
6005 
6006  auto server = mServer.lock();
6007  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6008  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
6009 
6010  const static bool nraStatusNull = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
6011  ->GetNRAStatusNull();
6012 
6013  auto statusAdjusts = tokuseiManager->GetAspectMap(source,
6014  TokuseiAspectType::STATUS_INFLICT_ADJUST, sourceCalc);
6015  auto statusNulls = tokuseiManager->GetAspectMap(eState,
6016  TokuseiAspectType::STATUS_NULL, targetCalc);
6017 
6018  for(auto statusPair : addStatusMap)
6019  {
6020  uint32_t effectID = statusPair.first;
6021 
6022  auto addStatus = addStatusDefs[effectID];
6023 
6024  bool isRemove = addStatus && addStatus->GetMinStack() == 0 &&
6025  addStatus->GetMaxStack() == 0;
6026  bool isReplace = addStatus && addStatus->GetIsReplace();
6027 
6028  auto statusDef = definitionManager->GetStatusData(effectID);
6029  if(!statusDef) continue;
6030 
6031  uint8_t affinity = statusDef->GetCommon()->GetAffinity();
6032  uint8_t statusCategory = statusDef->GetCommon()->GetCategory()
6033  ->GetMainCategory();
6034 
6035  // Adjusted category (-category - 1) can be used to null or alter rate
6036  int32_t adjustCategory = (int32_t)(statusCategory * -1) - 1;
6037 
6038  // Determine if the effect can be added
6039  if(!isRemove)
6040  {
6041  // If its application logic type 1, it cannot be applied if
6042  // it is already active unless we're replacing (ex: sleep)
6043  if(statusDef->GetBasic()->GetApplicationLogic() == 1 &&
6044  !isReplace && eState->StatusEffectActive(effectID))
6045  {
6046  continue;
6047  }
6048 
6049  // Determine if the effect should be nullified by direct ID,
6050  // then adjusted category
6051  if(statusNulls.find((int32_t)effectID) != statusNulls.end())
6052  {
6053  continue;
6054  }
6055  else if(statusNulls.find(adjustCategory) != statusNulls.end())
6056  {
6057  continue;
6058  }
6059 
6060  if(nraStatusNull && affinity)
6061  {
6062  // Optional server setting to nullify status effects with
6063  // an affinity type that the target could potentially NRA
6064  // (this does not take NRA shields into account since nothing
6065  // is "consumed" by this)
6066  CorrectTbl nraType = (CorrectTbl)(affinity + NRA_OFFSET);
6067  if(eState->GetNRAChance(NRA_NULL, nraType, targetCalc) > 0 ||
6068  eState->GetNRAChance(NRA_REFLECT, nraType, targetCalc) > 0 ||
6069  eState->GetNRAChance(NRA_ABSORB, nraType, targetCalc) > 0)
6070  {
6071  continue;
6072  }
6073  }
6074  }
6075 
6076  uint8_t statusSubCategory = statusDef->GetCommon()->GetCategory()
6077  ->GetSubCategory();
6078 
6079  // Only certain types of status effects can be resisted
6080  bool canResist = !isRemove &&
6081  statusCategory != STATUS_CATEGORY_GOOD &&
6082  statusSubCategory != STATUS_SUBCATEGORY_BUFF &&
6083  statusSubCategory != STATUS_SUBCATEGORY_DEBUFF;
6084 
6085  // Effect can be added (or removed), determine success rate
6086  double successRate = statusPair.second;
6087 
6088  // Hard 100% success rates cannot be adjusted, only avoided entirely
6089  if(maxRates.find(effectID) == maxRates.end())
6090  {
6091  // Boost for certain epertise
6092  if((pSkill->ExpertiseType == EXPERTISE_CHAIN_COTW ||
6093  pSkill->ExpertiseType == EXPERTISE_CHAIN_M_BULLET) &&
6094  pSkill->ExpertiseRankBoost)
6095  {
6096  // Raise by 1% per rank
6097  successRate += (double)(pSkill->ExpertiseRankBoost / 2);
6098  }
6099 
6100  // Apply affinity based adjustments
6101  if(affinity)
6102  {
6103  // Add affinity boost/2
6104  successRate += (double)GetAffinityBoost(source, sourceCalc,
6105  (CorrectTbl)(affinity + BOOST_OFFSET)) / 2.0;
6106 
6107  if(successRate > 0.f && canResist)
6108  {
6109  // Multiply by 100% + -resistance
6110  CorrectTbl resistCorrectType = (CorrectTbl)(affinity +
6111  RES_OFFSET);
6112 
6113  double resist = (double)(eState->GetCorrectValue(
6114  resistCorrectType, targetCalc) * 0.01);
6115  successRate *= (1.0 + resist * -1.0);
6116  }
6117  }
6118 
6119  if(successRate < 0.f)
6120  {
6121  // Minimum value for this point is 0%
6122  successRate = 0.f;
6123  }
6124 
6125  if(statusAdjusts.size() > 0)
6126  {
6127  // Boost success by direct inflict adjust
6128  double rateBoost = 0.0;
6129  auto it = statusAdjusts.find((int32_t)effectID);
6130  if(it != statusAdjusts.end())
6131  {
6132  rateBoost += it->second;
6133  }
6134 
6135  // Boost success by adjusted category inflict adjust
6136  it = statusAdjusts.find(adjustCategory);
6137  if(it != statusAdjusts.end())
6138  {
6139  rateBoost += it->second;
6140  }
6141 
6142  // Add rate boost directly
6143  if(rateBoost > 0.0)
6144  {
6145  successRate += rateBoost;
6146  }
6147  }
6148 
6149  // Add bad status resistance from target
6150  if(successRate > 0.f && canResist)
6151  {
6152  double resist = ((double)eState->GetCorrectValue(
6153  CorrectTbl::RES_STATUS, targetCalc) - 100.0) / 10.0;
6154  successRate += resist;
6155  }
6156  }
6157 
6158  if(effectID == SVR_CONST.STATUS_DEATH && successRate > 50.0)
6159  {
6160  // Instant death has a hard cap at 50%
6161  successRate = 50.0;
6162  }
6163 
6164  // Check if the status effect hits
6165  if(successRate >= 100.0 || (successRate > 0.0 &&
6166  RNG(int32_t, 1, 10000) <= (int32_t)(successRate * 100.0)))
6167  {
6168  // If the status was added by the skill itself, use that for
6169  // application logic, otherwise default to 1 non-replace
6170  int8_t minStack = addStatus ? addStatus->GetMinStack() : 1;
6171  int8_t maxStack = addStatus ? addStatus->GetMaxStack() : 1;
6172 
6173  // Scale stacks
6174  if(stackScale > 1)
6175  {
6176  minStack = (int8_t)(minStack * stackScale);
6177  maxStack = (int8_t)(maxStack * stackScale);
6178 
6179  // Adjust for overflow
6180  if(minStack < 0)
6181  {
6182  minStack = 127;
6183  }
6184 
6185  if(maxStack < 0)
6186  {
6187  maxStack = 127;
6188  }
6189  }
6190 
6191  int8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(minStack, maxStack);
6192  if(stack == 0 && !isReplace) continue;
6193 
6194  // Check for status damage to apply at the end of the skill
6195  if(statusCategory == 2)
6196  {
6197  // Apply ailment damage only if HP damage exists and the target
6198  // does not min normal damage (ignore crit level)
6199  auto tDamage = statusDef->GetEffect()->GetDamage();
6200  bool minDamage = targetCalc->ExistingTokuseiAspectsContains(
6201  (int8_t)TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_MIN);
6202  if(tDamage->GetHPDamage() > 0 && !minDamage && stack > 0)
6203  {
6204  uint8_t ailmentDamageType = (uint8_t)(affinity - AIL_OFFSET);
6205 
6206  // If the ailment damage type is not set yet or the type is
6207  // lower than the one assigned, set the type
6208  if(target.AilmentDamage == 0 ||
6209  ailmentDamageType < target.AilmentDamageType)
6210  {
6211  target.AilmentDamageType = ailmentDamageType;
6212  }
6213 
6214  target.AilmentDamage += tDamage->GetHPDamage() + stack;
6215 
6216  uint64_t ailmentTime = (uint64_t)((uint32_t)stack *
6217  statusDef->GetCancel()->GetDuration()) * 1000;
6218  if(ailmentTime > target.AilmentDamageTime)
6219  {
6220  target.AilmentDamageTime = ailmentTime;
6221  }
6222  }
6223  }
6224  else
6225  {
6226  target.AddedStatuses[effectID] = StatusEffectChange(effectID,
6227  stack, isReplace);
6228 
6229  auto cancelDef = statusDef->GetCancel();
6230  if(cancelDef->GetCancelTypes() & EFFECT_CANCEL_DEATH)
6231  {
6232  cancelOnKill.insert(effectID);
6233  }
6234  }
6235  }
6236  }
6237 
6238  return cancelOnKill;
6239 }
6240 
6241 void SkillManager::HandleKills(std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
6242  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
6243  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> killed)
6244 {
6245  auto server = mServer.lock();
6246  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
6247  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
6248  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
6249 
6250  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
6251 
6252  auto sourceDevilData = source->GetDevilData();
6253  uint32_t sourceDemonBaseType = sourceDevilData
6254  ? sourceDevilData->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID() : 0;
6255 
6256  // Familiarity is reduced from death or same demon kills and is dependent
6257  // upon familiarity type
6258  auto sourceDemonFType = sourceDevilData ? server->GetServerDataManager()
6259  ->GetDemonFamiliarityTypeData(sourceDevilData->GetFamiliarity()
6260  ->GetFamiliarityType()) : nullptr;
6261 
6262  bool playerSource = source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER ||
6263  source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON;
6264  auto instance = zone->GetInstance();
6265 
6266  auto sourceClient = playerSource ? managerConnection->GetEntityClient(
6267  source->GetEntityID()) : nullptr;
6268  auto sourceState = sourceClient ? sourceClient->GetClientState()
6269  : nullptr;
6270 
6271  // Source cooldowns can affect restricted drops as well as invoke points
6272  std::set<int32_t> sourceCooldowns;
6273  if(sourceState)
6274  {
6275  // Only pull character level cooldowns
6276  auto cState = sourceState->GetCharacterState();
6277  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6278  if(character)
6279  {
6280  cState->RefreshActionCooldowns(false);
6281  for(auto& pair : character->GetActionCooldowns())
6282  {
6283  sourceCooldowns.insert(pair.first);
6284  }
6285  }
6286  }
6287 
6288  auto deathTriggers = zoneManager->GetZoneTriggers(zone,
6289  ZoneTrigger_t::ON_DEATH);
6290 
6291  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int32_t> adjustments;
6292  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> enemiesKilled;
6293  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> partnerDemonsKilled;
6294  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> playersKilled;
6295  libcomp::EnumMap<objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t,
6296  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>>> killValues;
6297  for(auto entity : killed)
6298  {
6299  // Remove all opponents
6300  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(false, entity, nullptr);
6301 
6302  // Cancel any pending skill
6303  auto activated = entity->GetActivatedAbility();
6304  if(activated)
6305  {
6306  CancelSkill(entity, activated->GetActivationID());
6307  }
6308 
6309  // Determine familiarity adjustments
6310  bool partnerDeath = false;
6311  auto demonData = entity->GetDevilData();
6312  switch(entity->GetEntityType())
6313  {
6314  case EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
6315  playersKilled.push_back(entity);
6316  characterManager->CancelMount(
6317  ClientState::GetEntityClientState(entity->GetEntityID()));
6318  break;
6319  case EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
6320  partnerDemonsKilled.push_back(entity);
6321  partnerDeath = true;
6322  break;
6323  case EntityType_t::ENEMY:
6324  case EntityType_t::ALLY:
6325  enemiesKilled.push_back(entity);
6326  break;
6327  default:
6328  break;
6329  }
6330 
6331  int32_t killVal = entity->GetKillValue();
6332  if(killVal)
6333  {
6334  auto type = objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::INHERITED;
6335 
6336  auto eBase = entity->GetEnemyBase();
6337  auto spawn = eBase ? eBase->GetSpawnSource() : nullptr;
6338  if(spawn)
6339  {
6340  type = spawn->GetKillValueType();
6341  }
6342 
6343  killValues[type].push_back(entity);
6344  }
6345 
6346  // Trigger death actions (before zone removal)
6347  if(deathTriggers.size() > 0)
6348  {
6349  auto client = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(entity
6350  ->GetEntityID());
6351  zoneManager->HandleZoneTriggers(zone, deathTriggers, entity,
6352  client);
6353  }
6354 
6355  if(demonData && sourceDemonFType)
6356  {
6357  std::list<std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>> adjusts;
6358  if(partnerDeath)
6359  {
6360  // Partner demon has died
6361  int32_t adjust = (int32_t)sourceDemonFType->GetDeath();
6362  adjusts.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(
6363  entity->GetEntityID(), adjust));
6364  }
6365 
6366  if(entity != source && sourceDemonBaseType == demonData
6367  ->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID())
6368  {
6369  // Same (base) demon type killed
6370  int32_t adjust = (int32_t)sourceDemonFType->GetKillTypeMatch();
6371  adjusts.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(
6372  source->GetEntityID(), adjust));
6373  }
6374 
6375  for(auto aPair : adjusts)
6376  {
6377  if(adjustments.find(aPair.first) == adjustments.end())
6378  {
6379  adjustments[aPair.first] = aPair.second;
6380  }
6381  else
6382  {
6383  adjustments[aPair.first] = (int32_t)(
6384  adjustments[aPair.first] + aPair.second);
6385  }
6386  }
6387  }
6388 
6389  LogSkillManagerDebug([entity]()
6390  {
6391  return libcomp::String("%1 has been killed.\n")
6392  .Arg(entity->GetEntityLabel());
6393  });
6394  }
6395 
6396  // Apply familiarity adjustments
6397  for(auto aPair : adjustments)
6398  {
6399  auto demonClient = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(aPair.first);
6400  if(demonClient)
6401  {
6402  characterManager->UpdateFamiliarity(demonClient, aPair.second,
6403  true);
6404  }
6405  }
6406 
6407  switch(zone->GetInstanceType())
6408  {
6409  case InstanceType_t::PVP:
6410  // Increase by PvP values and set auto-revive time-out
6411  {
6412  auto matchManager = server->GetMatchManager();
6413 
6414  if(playerSource)
6415  {
6416  // Reward points to player entities that get a kill
6417  // (including self)
6418  for(auto entity : killValues[objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::
6419  INHERITED])
6420  {
6421  matchManager->UpdatePvPPoints(instance->GetID(),
6422  source, entity, entity->GetKillValue());
6423  }
6424  }
6425 
6426  for(auto entity : playersKilled)
6427  {
6428  matchManager->PlayerKilled(entity, instance);
6429  }
6430  }
6431  break;
6432  case InstanceType_t::DEMON_ONLY:
6433  // Start demon only instance death time-outs
6434  for(auto dState : partnerDemonsKilled)
6435  {
6436  auto demonCState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
6437  dState->GetEntityID());
6438  zoneManager->UpdateDeathTimeOut(demonCState, 60);
6439  }
6440 
6441  // Convert inherited kill values to SP
6442  for(auto entity : killValues[objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::
6443  INHERITED])
6444  {
6445  killValues[objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::SOUL_POINTS]
6446  .push_back(entity);
6447  }
6448  break;
6449  case InstanceType_t::PENTALPHA:
6450  // Convert inherited kill values to bethel
6451  for(auto entity : killValues[objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::
6452  INHERITED])
6453  {
6454  killValues[objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::BETHEL]
6455  .push_back(entity);
6456  }
6457  break;
6458  default:
6459  break;
6460  }
6461 
6462  // Inherited kill values must be handled by variant types above
6463  killValues.erase(objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::INHERITED);
6464 
6465  auto ubMatch = zone->GetUBMatch();
6466 
6467  if(enemiesKilled.size() > 0)
6468  {
6469  // Gather all enemy entity IDs and levels
6470  std::list<int32_t> removeIDs;
6471  std::list<int8_t> levels;
6472  std::set<int32_t> canRevive;
6473 
6474  auto aiManager = server->GetAIManager();
6475  for(auto eState : enemiesKilled)
6476  {
6477  aiManager->UpdateAggro(eState, -1);
6478 
6479  zone->RemoveEntity(eState->GetEntityID(), 1);
6480  levels.push_back(eState->GetLevel());
6481 
6482  if(eState->GetEnemyBase()->GetCanRevive())
6483  {
6484  canRevive.insert(eState->GetEntityID());
6485  }
6486  else
6487  {
6488  removeIDs.push_back(eState->GetEntityID());
6489  }
6490  }
6491 
6492  // Update status effects one last time for each entity so none stick
6493  // on the bodies
6494  zoneManager->UpdateStatusEffectStates(zone, (uint32_t)std::time(0),
6495  enemiesKilled);
6496 
6497  zoneManager->RemoveEntitiesFromZone(zone, removeIDs, 4, true);
6498 
6499  // Transform enemies into loot bodies and gather quest kills
6500  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<LootBoxState>,
6501  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> lStates;
6502  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, int32_t> questKills;
6503  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> encounterGroups;
6504  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> dgEnemies;
6505  std::list<uint32_t> multiZoneBosses;
6506  for(auto eState : enemiesKilled)
6507  {
6508  auto eBase = eState->GetEnemyBase();
6509  auto enemyData = eState->GetDevilData();
6510 
6511  if(enemyData->GetBattleData()->GetDigitalizeXP())
6512  {
6513  dgEnemies.push_back(eState);
6514  }
6515 
6516  auto spawn = eBase->GetSpawnSource();
6517  if(spawn)
6518  {
6519  if(spawn->GetBossGroup())
6520  {
6521  multiZoneBosses.push_back(eBase->GetType());
6522  }
6523 
6524  // Add recently killed here as any source counts as a kill
6525  if(ubMatch && spawn->GetKillValueType() ==
6526  objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::UB_POINTS)
6527  {
6528  ubMatch->AppendRecentlyKilled(spawn);
6529  }
6530  }
6531 
6532  if(canRevive.find(eState->GetEntityID()) != canRevive.end())
6533  {
6534  continue;
6535  }
6536 
6537  auto lootBody = std::make_shared<objects::LootBox>();
6538  lootBody->SetType(objects::LootBox::Type_t::BODY);
6539  lootBody->SetEnemy(eBase);
6540 
6541  auto lState = std::make_shared<LootBoxState>(lootBody);
6542  lState->SetCurrentX(eState->GetDestinationX());
6543  lState->SetCurrentY(eState->GetDestinationY());
6544  lState->SetCurrentRotation(eState->GetDestinationRotation());
6545  lState->SetEntityID(server->GetNextEntityID());
6546  lStates[lState] = eState;
6547 
6548  zone->AddLootBox(lState);
6549 
6550  uint32_t dType = enemyData->GetBasic()->GetID();
6551  if(sourceState && sourceState->QuestTargetEnemiesContains(dType))
6552  {
6553  if(questKills.find(dType) == questKills.end())
6554  {
6555  questKills[dType] = 1;
6556  }
6557  else
6558  {
6559  questKills[dType] = (questKills[dType] + 1);
6560  }
6561  }
6562 
6563  encounterGroups[eBase->GetEncounterID()] = eBase->GetSpawnGroupID();
6564  }
6565 
6566  // For each loot body generate and send loot and show the body
6567  // After this schedule all of the bodies for cleanup after their
6568  // loot time passes
6569  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
6570  int16_t luck = 0;
6571  float maccaRate = 1.f;
6572  float magRate = 1.f;
6573 
6574  if(sourceState)
6575  {
6576  auto cState = sourceState->GetCharacterState();
6577 
6578  luck = source->GetLUCK();
6579  maccaRate = (float)cState->GetCorrectValue(
6580  CorrectTbl::RATE_MACCA) / 100.f;
6581  magRate = (float)cState->GetCorrectValue(
6582  CorrectTbl::RATE_MAG) / 100.f;
6583  }
6584 
6585  auto firstClient = zConnections.size() > 0 ? zConnections.front() : nullptr;
6586  auto sourceParty = sourceState ? sourceState->GetParty() : nullptr;
6587 
6588  std::set<int32_t> sourcePartyMembers;
6589  if(sourceParty)
6590  {
6591  // Filter out party members not in the zone
6592  for(int32_t memberID : sourceParty->GetMemberIDs())
6593  {
6594  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(memberID, true);
6595  if(state && state->GetZone() == zone)
6596  {
6597  sourcePartyMembers.insert(memberID);
6598  }
6599  }
6600  }
6601 
6602  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> lootTimeEntityIDs;
6603  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> delayedLootEntityIDs;
6604  for(auto lPair : lStates)
6605  {
6606  auto lState = lPair.first;
6607  auto eState = lPair.second;
6608 
6609  int32_t lootEntityID = lState->GetEntityID();
6610 
6611  auto lootBody = lState->GetEntity();
6612  auto eBase = lootBody->GetEnemy();
6613 
6614  auto enemy = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Enemy>(eBase);
6615 
6616  // Create loot based off drops and send if any was added
6617  std::set<int32_t> validLooterIDs;
6618  bool timedAdjust = false;
6619 
6620  // Anyone can loot non-enemy bodies or the bodies of enemies
6621  // not damage by a player
6622  if(enemy && enemy->DamageSourcesCount() > 0)
6623  {
6624  // Only certain players can loot enemy bodies
6625  if(sourceState)
6626  {
6627  // Include skill source if a player entity
6628  validLooterIDs.insert(sourceState->GetWorldCID());
6629  }
6630  else
6631  {
6632  // Include anyone who damaged the entity that is in
6633  // the zone (ignore party rules)
6634  for(auto pair : enemy->GetDamageSources())
6635  {
6636  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
6637  pair.first, true);
6638  if(state && state->GetZone() == zone)
6639  {
6640  validLooterIDs.insert(pair.first);
6641  }
6642  }
6643  }
6644 
6645  timedAdjust = true;
6646  if(sourceParty)
6647  {
6648  switch(sourceParty->GetDropRule())
6649  {
6650  case objects::Party::DropRule_t::DAMAGE_RACE:
6651  {
6652  // Highest damage dealer member wins
6653  std::map<uint64_t, int32_t> damageMap;
6654  for(auto pair : enemy->GetDamageSources())
6655  {
6656  if(sourcePartyMembers.find(pair.first) !=
6657  sourcePartyMembers.end())
6658  {
6659  damageMap[pair.second] = pair.first;
6660  }
6661  }
6662 
6663  if(damageMap.size() > 0)
6664  {
6665  validLooterIDs = { damageMap.rbegin()->second };
6666  }
6667  }
6668  break;
6669  case objects::Party::DropRule_t::RANDOM_LOOT:
6670  {
6671  // Randomly pick a member
6672  auto it = sourcePartyMembers.begin();
6673  size_t offset = (size_t)RNG(uint16_t, 0,
6674  (uint16_t)(sourcePartyMembers.size() - 1));
6675  std::advance(it, offset);
6676 
6677  validLooterIDs = { *it };
6678  }
6679  break;
6680  case objects::Party::DropRule_t::FREE_LOOT:
6681  {
6682  // Every member is valid
6683  validLooterIDs = sourcePartyMembers;
6684  timedAdjust = false;
6685  }
6686  break;
6687  default:
6688  break;
6689  }
6690  }
6691  }
6692 
6693  auto drops = GetItemDrops(source, eState, sourceClient, zone);
6694 
6695  // Remove cooldown restricted drops
6696  std::set<int32_t> invalid;
6697  for(auto& pair : drops)
6698  {
6699  for(auto loot : pair.second)
6700  {
6701  int32_t cd = loot->GetCooldownRestrict();
6702  if(cd)
6703  {
6704  if(sourceCooldowns.find(cd) == sourceCooldowns.end())
6705  {
6706  invalid.insert(cd);
6707  }
6708  }
6709  }
6710 
6711  pair.second.remove_if([invalid](
6712  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>& drop)
6713  {
6714  return invalid.find(drop->GetCooldownRestrict()) !=
6715  invalid.end();
6716  });
6717  }
6718 
6719  if(validLooterIDs.size() > 0)
6720  {
6721  lootBody->SetValidLooterIDs(validLooterIDs);
6722 
6723  if(timedAdjust)
6724  {
6725  // The last 60 seconds are fair game for everyone
6726  uint64_t delayedlootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 60000000);
6727  delayedLootEntityIDs[delayedlootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
6728  }
6729  }
6730 
6731  auto nDrops = drops[(uint8_t)objects::DropSet::Type_t::NORMAL];
6732  auto dDrops = drops[(uint8_t)objects::DropSet::Type_t::DESTINY];
6733 
6734  uint64_t lootTime = 0;
6735  if(characterManager->CreateLootFromDrops(lootBody, nDrops, luck,
6736  false, maccaRate, magRate))
6737  {
6738  // Bodies remain lootable for 120 seconds with loot
6739  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 120000000);
6740  }
6741  else
6742  {
6743  // Bodies remain visible for 10 seconds without loot
6744  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 10000000);
6745  }
6746 
6747  lootBody->SetLootTime(lootTime);
6748  lootTimeEntityIDs[lootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
6749 
6750  if(firstClient)
6751  {
6752  zoneManager->SendLootBoxData(firstClient, lState, eState,
6753  true, true);
6754  }
6755 
6756  if(dDrops.size() > 0 && instance && sourceState)
6757  {
6758  // Always add at least one item
6759  auto filtered = characterManager->DetermineDrops(dDrops, 0, false);
6760  if(filtered.size() == 0)
6761  {
6762  filtered = { libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(dDrops) };
6763  }
6764 
6765  if(filtered.size() > 0)
6766  {
6767  // Create loot one drop at a time so we don't combine
6768  // two non-max stacks into one
6769  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Loot>> loot;
6770  for(auto f : filtered)
6771  {
6772  auto dList = { f };
6773  for(auto l : characterManager->CreateLootFromDrops(
6774  dList))
6775  {
6776  loot.push_back(l);
6777  }
6778  }
6779 
6780  zoneManager->UpdateDestinyBox(instance, sourceState
6781  ->GetWorldCID(), loot);
6782  }
6783  }
6784  }
6785 
6786  for(auto pair : lootTimeEntityIDs)
6787  {
6788  zoneManager->ScheduleEntityRemoval(pair.first, zone, pair.second, 13);
6789  }
6790 
6791  for(auto pair : delayedLootEntityIDs)
6792  {
6793  ScheduleFreeLoot(pair.first, zone, pair.second, sourcePartyMembers);
6794  }
6795 
6796  if(multiZoneBosses.size() > 0)
6797  {
6798  zoneManager->MultiZoneBossKilled(zone, sourceState,
6799  multiZoneBosses);
6800  }
6801 
6802  // Update quest kill counts (ignore for demon only zones)
6803  if(sourceClient && questKills.size() > 0 &&
6804  zone->GetInstanceType() != InstanceType_t::DEMON_ONLY)
6805  {
6806  server->GetEventManager()->UpdateQuestKillCount(sourceClient,
6807  questKills);
6808  }
6809 
6810  if(zone->DiasporaMiniBossUpdated())
6811  {
6812  // Update mini-boss count before firing defeat actions
6813  server->GetTokuseiManager()->UpdateDiasporaMinibossCount(zone);
6814  }
6815 
6816  // Perform defeat actions for all empty encounters
6817  HandleEncounterDefeat(source, zone, encounterGroups);
6818 
6819  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(zConnections);
6820 
6821  // Loop through one last time and send all XP gained
6822  for(auto state : enemiesKilled)
6823  {
6824  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(state);
6825  if(eState)
6826  {
6827  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
6828  HandleKillXP(enemy, zone);
6829  }
6830  }
6831 
6832  if(dgEnemies.size() > 0)
6833  {
6834  HandleDigitalizeXP(source, dgEnemies, zone);
6835  }
6836 
6837  // Update crushing technique
6838  if(source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER &&
6839  sourceClient)
6840  {
6841  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(source);
6842  auto character = cState ? cState->GetEntity() : nullptr;
6843  auto expertise = character ? character->GetExpertises(
6844  EXPERTISE_CRUSH_TECHNIQUE).Get() : nullptr;
6845  if(expertise && !expertise->GetDisabled())
6846  {
6847  int8_t lvl = cState->GetLevel();
6848  double rate = (double)cState->GetCorrectValue(
6849  CorrectTbl::RATE_EXPERTISE) * 0.01;
6850 
6851  int32_t points = 0;
6852  for(int8_t dLvl : levels)
6853  {
6854  int32_t up = (int32_t)(3.0 * (double)(5 +
6855  (dLvl / 10 - lvl / 10)) * rate);
6856  points += (5 + (up > 0 ? up : 0));
6857  }
6858 
6859  std::list<std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>> expPoints;
6860  expPoints.push_back(std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>(
6861  EXPERTISE_CRUSH_TECHNIQUE, points));
6862 
6863  characterManager->UpdateExpertisePoints(sourceClient,
6864  expPoints);
6865  }
6866  }
6867 
6868  // Update invoke values for active cooldowns
6869  if(sourceClient)
6870  {
6871  // Should only be one at a time but account for more just in case
6872  for(int32_t invokeID : { COOLDOWN_INVOKE_LAW,
6873  COOLDOWN_INVOKE_NEUTRAL, COOLDOWN_INVOKE_CHAOS })
6874  {
6875  if(sourceCooldowns.find(invokeID) != sourceCooldowns.end())
6876  {
6877  characterManager->UpdateEventCounter(sourceClient,
6878  invokeID, (int32_t)enemiesKilled.size());
6879  }
6880  }
6881  }
6882  }
6883 
6884  // Handle additional kill values
6885  if(sourceClient)
6886  {
6887  for(auto& pair : killValues)
6888  {
6889  int32_t valSum = 0;
6890  for(auto entity : pair.second)
6891  {
6892  if(entity->GetKillValue() > 0)
6893  {
6894  valSum += entity->GetKillValue();
6895  }
6896  }
6897 
6898  if(valSum == 0) continue;
6899 
6900  switch(pair.first)
6901  {
6902  case objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::SOUL_POINTS:
6903  characterManager->UpdateSoulPoints(sourceClient, valSum, true,
6904  true);
6905  break;
6906  case objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::BETHEL:
6907  // If in an active Pentalpha instance, bethel is "held" until
6908  // the timer expires and is also divided amongst everyone who
6909  // has access to the instance. Otherwise it is given right
6910  // away. Both require active Pentalpha entries to actually do
6911  // anything.
6912  {
6913  float globalBonus = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
6914  ->GetBethelBonus();
6915  if(globalBonus != 0.f)
6916  {
6917  valSum = (int32_t)((double)valSum * (double)(1.f +
6918  globalBonus));
6919  }
6920 
6921  if(zone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::PENTALPHA &&
6922  instance->GetTimerStart() && !instance->GetTimerStop())
6923  {
6924  // Distribute bethel by access CID, currently connected
6925  // or not and divide evenly so being in a group is not
6926  // the clear better way to run these instances
6927  valSum = (int32_t)ceil((double)valSum /
6928  (double)instance->OriginalAccessCIDsCount());
6929  for(auto c : managerConnection->GetEntityClients(
6930  instance->GetOriginalAccessCIDs(), true))
6931  {
6932  auto s = c->GetClientState();
6933  s->SetInstanceBethel(valSum +
6934  s->GetInstanceBethel());
6935  }
6936  }
6937  else
6938  {
6939  characterManager->UpdateBethel(sourceClient, valSum,
6940  true);
6941  }
6942  }
6943  break;
6944  case objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::UB_POINTS:
6945  server->GetMatchManager()->UpdateUBPoints(sourceClient,
6946  valSum);
6947  break;
6948  case objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::ZIOTITE:
6949  {
6950  // Ziotite can only be granted to a team and is increased
6951  // by 15% per team member over 1
6952  auto team = sourceState->GetTeam();
6953  if(team)
6954  {
6955  valSum = (int32_t)((float)valSum * (1.f +
6956  (float)(team->MemberIDsCount() - 1) * 0.15f));
6957  server->GetMatchManager()->UpdateZiotite(team, valSum, 0,
6958  sourceState->GetWorldCID());
6959  }
6960  }
6961  break;
6962  case objects::Spawn::KillValueType_t::INHERITED:
6963  default:
6964  // Should have been handled above by the instance variant
6965  break;
6966  }
6967  }
6968  }
6969 
6970  if(playersKilled.size() > 0 || partnerDemonsKilled.size() > 0)
6971  {
6972  // If dead tokusei are disabled, recalculate player entities now
6973  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
6974  if(tokuseiManager->DeadTokuseiDisabled())
6975  {
6976  auto all = playersKilled;
6977  for(auto demon : partnerDemonsKilled)
6978  {
6979  all.push_back(demon);
6980  }
6981 
6982  tokuseiManager->Recalculate(all, true);
6983  }
6984  }
6985 }
6986 
6987 void SkillManager::HandleKillXP(const std::shared_ptr<objects::Enemy>& enemy,
6988  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone)
6989 {
6990  auto spawn = enemy->GetSpawnSource();
6991 
6992  int64_t totalXP = 0;
6993  if(spawn && spawn->GetXP() >= 0)
6994  {
6995  totalXP = spawn->GetXP();
6996  }
6997  else
6998  {
6999  // All non-spawn enemies have a calculated value
7000  totalXP = (int64_t)(enemy->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel() * 20);
7001  }
7002 
7003  if(totalXP <= 0)
7004  {
7005  return;
7006  }
7007 
7008  auto server = mServer.lock();
7009  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
7010  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
7011 
7012  // Apply global XP bonus
7013  float globalXPBonus = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
7014  ->GetXPBonus();
7015 
7016  totalXP = (int64_t)((double)totalXP * (double)(1.f + globalXPBonus));
7017 
7018  // Apply zone XP multiplier
7019  totalXP = (int64_t)((double)totalXP * (double)zone->GetXPMultiplier());
7020 
7021  // Determine XP distribution
7022  // -Individuals/single parties gain max XP
7023  // -Multiple individuals/parties have XP distributed by damage dealt
7024  // -Party members gain alloted XP - ((number of members in the zone - 1) * 10%)
7025  std::unordered_map<int32_t, uint64_t> playerDamage;
7026  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint64_t> partyDamage;
7027  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, std::shared_ptr<objects::Party>> parties;
7028 
7029  uint64_t totalDamage = 0;
7030  auto damageSources = enemy->GetDamageSources();
7031  for(auto damagePair : damageSources)
7032  {
7033  totalDamage = (uint64_t)(totalDamage + damagePair.second);
7034  }
7035 
7036  std::unordered_map<int32_t,
7037  std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>> clientMap;
7038  for(auto damagePair : damageSources)
7039  {
7040  auto c = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(damagePair.first, true);
7041  if(c)
7042  {
7043  clientMap[damagePair.first] = c;
7044 
7045  uint64_t dmg = damagePair.second;
7046  auto s = c->GetClientState();
7047  auto party = s->GetParty();
7048  if(party)
7049  {
7050  uint32_t partyID = party->GetID();
7051  if(partyDamage.find(partyID) == partyDamage.end())
7052  {
7053  parties[partyID] = party;
7054  partyDamage[partyID] = dmg;
7055  }
7056  else
7057  {
7058  partyDamage[partyID] = partyDamage[partyID] + dmg;
7059  }
7060  }
7061  else
7062  {
7063  if(s->GetCharacterState()->GetZone() == zone)
7064  {
7065  playerDamage[s->GetWorldCID()] = dmg;
7066  }
7067  else
7068  {
7069  // Since the player is not still in the zone,
7070  // reduce the total damage since the player will not
7071  // receive any XP
7072  totalDamage = (totalDamage - dmg);
7073  }
7074  }
7075  }
7076  }
7077 
7078  // Find all party members that are active in the zone
7079  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, std::set<int32_t>> membersInZone;
7080  for(auto pPair : partyDamage)
7081  {
7082  for(int32_t memberID : parties[pPair.first]->GetMemberIDs())
7083  {
7084  auto c = clientMap[memberID];
7085  if(c == nullptr)
7086  {
7087  c = server->GetManagerConnection()
7088  ->GetEntityClient(memberID, true);
7089  clientMap[memberID] = c;
7090  }
7091 
7092  if(c)
7093  {
7094  auto s = c->GetClientState();
7095  if(s->GetCharacterState()->GetZone() == zone)
7096  {
7097  membersInZone[pPair.first].insert(memberID);
7098  }
7099  }
7100  }
7101 
7102  // No party members are in the zone
7103  if(membersInZone[pPair.first].size() == 0)
7104  {
7105  // Since no one in the party is still in the zone,
7106  // reduce the total damage since no member will
7107  // receive any XP
7108  totalDamage = (totalDamage - pPair.second);
7109  }
7110  }
7111 
7112  // Calculate the XP gains based on damage dealt by players
7113  // and parties still in the zone
7114  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int64_t> xpMap;
7115  for(auto pair : playerDamage)
7116  {
7117  xpMap[pair.first] = (int64_t)ceil((double)totalXP *
7118  (double)pair.second / (double)totalDamage);
7119  }
7120 
7121  for(auto pair : membersInZone)
7122  {
7123  double xp = (double)totalXP *
7124  (double)partyDamage[pair.first] / (double)totalDamage;
7125 
7126  int64_t partyXP = (int64_t)ceil(xp * 1.0 -
7127  ((double)(membersInZone.size() - 1) * 0.1));
7128 
7129  for(auto memberID : pair.second)
7130  {
7131  xpMap[memberID] = partyXP;
7132  }
7133  }
7134 
7135  // Apply the adjusted XP values to each player
7136  for(auto xpPair : xpMap)
7137  {
7138  auto c = clientMap[xpPair.first];
7139  if(c == nullptr) continue;
7140 
7141  auto s = c->GetClientState();
7142  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>>
7143  clientStates = { s->GetCharacterState() };
7144  clientStates.push_back(s->GetDemonState());
7145  for(auto cState : clientStates)
7146  {
7147  // Demons only get XP if they are alive, characters get
7148  // it regardless
7149  if(cState->Ready() && (cState == s->GetCharacterState() ||
7150  cState->IsAlive()))
7151  {
7152  int64_t finalXP = (int64_t)ceil((double)xpPair.second *
7153  ((double)cState->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::RATE_XP)
7154  * 0.01));
7155  if(finalXP > 0)
7156  {
7157  characterManager->UpdateExperience(c, finalXP, cState->GetEntityID());
7158  }
7159  }
7160  }
7161  }
7162 }
7163 
7164 void SkillManager::HandleDigitalizeXP(
7165  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
7166  const std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>>& enemies,
7167  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone)
7168 {
7169  // Grant digitalize XP to all players in the source's party that
7170  // have a digitalized character
7171  auto server = mServer.lock();
7172  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
7173 
7174  auto client = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
7175  if(!client)
7176  {
7177  // Not a player entity/not connected
7178  return;
7179  }
7180 
7181  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
7182  float globalDXPBonus = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
7183  ->GetDigitalizePointBonus();
7184 
7185  // Sum points gained from all enemies
7186  int32_t dxp = 0;
7187  for(auto enemy : enemies)
7188  {
7189  dxp = (int32_t)(dxp + (int32_t)enemy->GetDevilData()
7190  ->GetBattleData()->GetDigitalizeXP());
7191  }
7192 
7193  // Apply global XP bonus
7194  dxp = (int32_t)((double)dxp * (double)(1.f + globalDXPBonus));
7195 
7196  for(auto c : managerConnection->GetPartyConnections(client, true, false))
7197  {
7198  auto state = c->GetClientState();
7199 
7200  // Only party members in the same zone get points
7201  if(state != client->GetClientState() && state->GetZone() != zone)
7202  {
7203  continue;
7204  }
7205 
7206  auto dgState = state->GetCharacterState()->GetDigitalizeState();
7207  uint8_t raceID = dgState ? dgState->GetRaceID() : 0;
7208  if(raceID)
7209  {
7210  std::unordered_map<uint8_t, int32_t> points;
7211  points[raceID] = dxp;
7212 
7213  characterManager->UpdateDigitalizePoints(c, points, true);
7214  }
7215  }
7216 }
7217 
7218 void SkillManager::HandleEncounterDefeat(const std::shared_ptr<
7219  ActiveEntityState> source, const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
7220  const std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t>& encounterGroups)
7221 {
7222  if(encounterGroups.size() == 0 || (encounterGroups.size() == 1 &&
7223  encounterGroups.find(0) != encounterGroups.end()))
7224  {
7225  // Nothing to do
7226  return;
7227  }
7228 
7229  auto server = mServer.lock();
7230  auto actionManager = server->GetActionManager();
7231  auto sourceClient = server->GetManagerConnection()->
7232  GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
7233  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Action>> defeatActions;
7234  for(auto ePair : encounterGroups)
7235  {
7236  if(!ePair.first) continue;
7237 
7238  if(zone->EncounterDefeated(ePair.first, defeatActions))
7239  {
7240  ActionOptions options;
7241  options.GroupID = ePair.first;
7242  options.NoEventInterrupt = true;
7243 
7244  // If the defeatActionSource has actions, those override the
7245  // group's default
7246  if(defeatActions.size() > 0)
7247  {
7248  actionManager->PerformActions(sourceClient, defeatActions,
7249  source->GetEntityID(), zone, options);
7250  }
7251  else
7252  {
7253  auto group = zone->GetDefinition()->GetSpawnGroups(
7254  ePair.second);
7255  if(group && group->DefeatActionsCount() > 0)
7256  {
7257  actionManager->PerformActions(sourceClient,
7258  group->GetDefeatActions(), source->GetEntityID(),
7259  zone, options);
7260  }
7261  }
7262  }
7263  }
7264 }
7265 
7266 void SkillManager::HandleRevives(const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
7267  const std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> revived,
7268  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
7269 {
7270  auto server = mServer.lock();
7271  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
7272  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
7273 
7274  double maxLoss = 0.01;
7275  double lossDrop = 0.00005;
7276 
7277  auto rateIter = SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_SKILLS.find(pSkill->SkillID);
7278  if(rateIter != SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_SKILLS.end() &&
7279  rateIter->second[0] == 5)
7280  {
7281  maxLoss = (double)rateIter->second[2] / 100000;
7282  lossDrop = (double)rateIter->second[1] / 100000;
7283  }
7284 
7285  for(auto entity : revived)
7286  {
7287  libcomp::Packet p;
7288  if(characterManager->GetEntityRevivalPacket(p, entity, 6))
7289  {
7290  zoneManager->BroadcastPacket(zone, p);
7291  }
7292 
7293  // Clear the death time-out if one exists
7294  if(entity->GetDeathTimeOut())
7295  {
7296  auto entityCState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
7297  entity->GetEntityID());
7298  zoneManager->UpdateDeathTimeOut(entityCState, -1);
7299  }
7300 
7301  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(entity);
7302  if(cState && maxLoss > 0.f)
7303  {
7304  float xpLossPercent = (float)(maxLoss - (lossDrop * cState
7305  ->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel()));
7306  if(xpLossPercent > 0.f)
7307  {
7308  characterManager->UpdateRevivalXP(cState, xpLossPercent);
7309  }
7310  }
7311 
7312  LogSkillManagerDebug([entity]()
7313  {
7314  return libcomp::String("%1 has been revived.\n")
7315  .Arg(entity->GetEntityLabel());
7316  });
7317  }
7318 
7319  // Trigger revival actions (but not respawn)
7320  auto reviveTriggers = zoneManager->GetZoneTriggers(zone,
7321  ZoneTrigger_t::ON_REVIVAL);
7322  if(reviveTriggers.size() > 0)
7323  {
7324  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
7325  for(auto entity : revived)
7326  {
7327  auto client = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(entity
7328  ->GetEntityID());
7329  zoneManager->HandleZoneTriggers(zone, reviveTriggers, entity,
7330  client);
7331  }
7332  }
7333 
7334  // Check if we need to recalculate player tokusei
7335  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
7336  if(tokuseiManager->DeadTokuseiDisabled())
7337  {
7338  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> playerEntities;
7339  for(auto e : revived)
7340  {
7341  switch(e->GetEntityType())
7342  {
7343  case EntityType_t::CHARACTER:
7344  case EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
7345  playerEntities.push_back(e);
7346  break;
7347  default:
7348  break;
7349  }
7350  }
7351 
7352  if(playerEntities.size() > 0)
7353  {
7354  tokuseiManager->Recalculate(playerEntities, true);
7355  }
7356  }
7357 }
7358 
7359 bool SkillManager::ApplyZoneSpecificEffects(const std::shared_ptr<
7360  channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
7361 {
7362  bool changed = false;
7363  switch(pSkill->CurrentZone->GetInstanceType())
7364  {
7365  case InstanceType_t::PVP:
7366  // Update end of match stats
7367  UpdatePvPStats(pSkill);
7368  break;
7369  case InstanceType_t::DEMON_ONLY:
7370  {
7371  // If a partner demon was killed or revived, mirror the effect on
7372  // the associated character
7373  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> revive;
7374  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> kill;
7375  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
7376  {
7377  bool revived = (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_REVIVAL) != 0;
7378  bool killed = (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_LETHAL) != 0;
7379 
7380  auto eState = target.EntityState;
7381  if(eState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON &&
7382  (revived || killed))
7383  {
7384  auto demonCState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
7385  eState->GetEntityID());
7386  if(demonCState)
7387  {
7388  auto cState = demonCState->GetCharacterState();
7389  if(revived && !cState->IsAlive())
7390  {
7391  revive.push_back(cState);
7392  }
7393  else if(killed && cState->IsAlive())
7394  {
7395  kill.push_back(cState);
7396  }
7397  }
7398  }
7399  }
7400 
7401  for(auto cState : revive)
7402  {
7403  // Revive the character with 1 HP
7404  if(cState->SetHPMP(1, -1, true, true))
7405  {
7406  SkillTargetResult target;
7407  target.EntityState = cState;
7408  target.Damage1 = 1;
7409  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING;
7410 
7411  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_REVIVAL;
7412  target.RecalcTriggers.insert(
7413  TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP);
7414 
7415  pSkill->Targets.push_back(target);
7416  changed = true;
7417  }
7418  }
7419 
7420  for(auto cState : kill)
7421  {
7422  // Kill the character
7423  if(cState->SetHPMP(0, -1, false, true))
7424  {
7425  SkillTargetResult target;
7426  target.EntityState = cState;
7427  target.Damage1 = MAX_PLAYER_HP_MP;
7428  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
7429 
7430  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_LETHAL;
7431  target.RecalcTriggers.insert(
7432  TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP);
7433  target.EffectCancellations |= EFFECT_CANCEL_HIT |
7434  EFFECT_CANCEL_DEATH | EFFECT_CANCEL_DAMAGE;
7435 
7436  pSkill->Targets.push_back(target);
7437  changed = true;
7438  }
7439  }
7440  }
7441  break;
7442  default:
7443  break;
7444  }
7445 
7446  return changed;
7447 }
7448 
7449 void SkillManager::UpdatePvPStats(const std::shared_ptr<
7450  channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
7451 {
7452  auto instance = pSkill->CurrentZone->GetInstance();
7453  auto pvpStats = instance ? instance->GetPvPStats() : nullptr;
7454  if(!MatchManager::PvPActive(instance))
7455  {
7456  return;
7457  }
7458 
7459  bool sourceIsDemon = false;
7460  int32_t sourceID = pSkill->EffectiveSource->GetEntityID();
7461  if(pSkill->EffectiveSource->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON)
7462  {
7463  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(sourceID);
7464  if(state)
7465  {
7466  sourceID = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntityID();
7467  sourceIsDemon = true;
7468  }
7469  }
7470 
7471  auto definitionManager = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager();
7472 
7473  bool firstDamageSet = pvpStats->FirstDamageCount() != 0;
7474 
7475  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int32_t> damageDealt;
7476  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int32_t> damageDealtMax;
7477  std::set<int32_t> killed;
7478  std::set<int32_t> demonsKilled;
7479  std::set<int32_t> othersKilled;
7480  int32_t gStatus = 0;
7481  std::unordered_map<int32_t, int32_t> bStatus;
7482  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
7483  {
7484  if(target.IndirectTarget) continue;
7485 
7486  bool targetIsDemon = false;
7487  int32_t entityID = target.EntityState->GetEntityID();
7488  if(target.EntityState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON)
7489  {
7490  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(entityID);
7491  if(state)
7492  {
7493  entityID = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntityID();
7494  targetIsDemon = true;
7495  }
7496  }
7497 
7498  if(target.Flags1 & FLAG1_LETHAL)
7499  {
7500  if(targetIsDemon)
7501  {
7502  demonsKilled.insert(entityID);
7503  }
7504  else
7505  {
7506  killed.insert(entityID);
7507  }
7508 
7509  // Killing your own entities count as deaths, not kills
7510  if(entityID != sourceID)
7511  {
7512  othersKilled.insert(entityID);
7513  }
7514  }
7515 
7516  for(auto& sPair : target.AddedStatuses)
7517  {
7518  auto& change = sPair.second;
7519  if(change.Stack)
7520  {
7521  auto effect = definitionManager->GetStatusData(change.Type);
7522  switch(effect->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory())
7523  {
7524  case STATUS_CATEGORY_BAD:
7525  if(bStatus.find(entityID) != bStatus.end())
7526  {
7527  bStatus[entityID]++;
7528  }
7529  else
7530  {
7531  bStatus[entityID] = 1;
7532  }
7533  break;
7534  case STATUS_CATEGORY_GOOD:
7535  gStatus++;
7536  break;
7537  default:
7538  break;
7539  }
7540  }
7541  }
7542 
7543  if(target.EntityState != pSkill->EffectiveSource &&
7544  (target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC ||
7545  target.Damage2Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC))
7546  {
7547  int32_t damage = target.Damage1 + target.Damage2;
7548  if(!firstDamageSet)
7549  {
7550  pvpStats->InsertFirstDamage(sourceID);
7551  pvpStats->InsertFirstDamageTaken(entityID);
7552  }
7553 
7554  auto it = damageDealtMax.find(entityID);
7555  if(it == damageDealtMax.end())
7556  {
7557  damageDealtMax[entityID] = 0;
7558  it = damageDealtMax.find(entityID);
7559  }
7560 
7561  if(it->second < damage)
7562  {
7563  it->second = damage;
7564  }
7565 
7566  if(damageDealt.find(entityID) != damageDealt.end())
7567  {
7568  damageDealt[entityID] += damage;
7569  }
7570  else
7571  {
7572  damageDealt[entityID] = damage;
7573  }
7574  }
7575  }
7576 
7577  // Update source stats
7578  auto stats = pvpStats->GetPlayerStats(sourceID);
7579  if(stats)
7580  {
7581  if(sourceIsDemon)
7582  {
7583  stats->SetDemonKills((uint16_t)(stats->GetDemonKills() +
7584  othersKilled.size()));
7585  }
7586  else
7587  {
7588  stats->SetKills((uint16_t)(stats->GetKills() +
7589  othersKilled.size()));
7590  }
7591 
7592  stats->SetGoodStatus((uint16_t)(stats->GetGoodStatus() + gStatus));
7593 
7594  int32_t maxDamage = stats->GetDamageMax();
7595  for(auto& dPair : damageDealtMax)
7596  {
7597  if(maxDamage < dPair.second)
7598  {
7599  maxDamage = dPair.second;
7600  }
7601  }
7602  stats->SetDamageMax(maxDamage);
7603 
7604  int32_t damageSum = stats->GetDamageSum();
7605  for(auto& dPair : damageDealt)
7606  {
7607  damageSum += dPair.second;
7608  }
7609  stats->SetDamageSum(damageSum);
7610 
7611  for(auto& sPair : bStatus)
7612  {
7613  stats->SetBadStatus((uint16_t)(stats->GetBadStatus() +
7614  sPair.second));
7615  }
7616  }
7617 
7618  // Update target deaths
7619  for(int32_t kill : killed)
7620  {
7621  stats = pvpStats->GetPlayerStats(kill);
7622  if(stats)
7623  {
7624  stats->SetDeaths((uint16_t)(stats->GetDeaths() + 1));
7625  }
7626  }
7627 
7628  // Update target demon deaths
7629  for(int32_t kill : demonsKilled)
7630  {
7631  stats = pvpStats->GetPlayerStats(kill);
7632  if(stats)
7633  {
7634  stats->SetDemonDeaths((uint16_t)(stats->GetDemonDeaths() + 1));
7635  }
7636  }
7637 
7638  // Update target damage max
7639  for(auto& pair : damageDealtMax)
7640  {
7641  stats = pvpStats->GetPlayerStats(pair.first);
7642  if(stats)
7643  {
7644  if(stats->GetDamageMaxTaken() < pair.second)
7645  {
7646  stats->SetDamageMaxTaken(pair.second);
7647  }
7648  }
7649  }
7650 
7651  // Update target damage sum
7652  for(auto& pair : damageDealt)
7653  {
7654  stats = pvpStats->GetPlayerStats(pair.first);
7655  if(stats)
7656  {
7657  stats->SetDamageSumTaken(stats->GetDamageSum() + pair.second);
7658  }
7659  }
7660 
7661  // Update target bad status taken
7662  for(auto& sPair : bStatus)
7663  {
7664  stats = pvpStats->GetPlayerStats(sPair.first);
7665  if(stats)
7666  {
7667  stats->SetBadStatusTaken((uint16_t)(stats->GetBadStatusTaken() +
7668  sPair.second));
7669  }
7670  }
7671 }
7672 
7673 bool SkillManager::ApplyNegotiationDamage(const std::shared_ptr<
7674  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
7675  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
7676 {
7677  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(
7678  target.EntityState);
7679  auto enemy = eState ? eState->GetEntity() : nullptr;
7680  if(!enemy)
7681  {
7682  return false;
7683  }
7684 
7685  auto talkDamage = pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()
7686  ->GetNegotiationDamage();
7687  int8_t talkAffSuccess = talkDamage->GetSuccessAffability();
7688  int8_t talkAffFailure = talkDamage->GetFailureAffability();
