7689  int8_t talkFearSuccess = talkDamage->GetSuccessFear();
7690  int8_t talkFearFailure = talkDamage->GetFailureFear();
7691 
7692  auto spawn = enemy->GetSpawnSource();
7693  if(enemy->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel() > source->GetLevel())
7694  {
7695  // Enemies that are a higher level cannot be negotiated with
7696  return false;
7697  }
7698 
7699  auto talkPoints = eState->GetTalkPoints(source->GetEntityID());
7700  auto demonData = eState->GetDevilData();
7701  auto negData = demonData->GetNegotiation();
7702  uint8_t affThreshold = (uint8_t)(100 - negData->GetAffabilityThreshold());
7703  uint8_t fearThreshold = (uint8_t)(100 - negData->GetFearThreshold());
7704 
7705  if(talkPoints.first >= affThreshold ||
7706  talkPoints.second >= fearThreshold)
7707  {
7708  // Nothing left to do
7709  return false;
7710  }
7711 
7712  // No points in anything but still primary talk skill means
7713  // the skill will always result in a join
7714  bool isTalkAction = IsTalkSkill(pSkill->Definition, true);
7715  bool avoided = (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_GUARDED) != 0 ||
7716  (target.Flags1 & FLAG1_DODGED);
7717  bool autoJoin = isTalkAction && !talkAffSuccess && !avoided &&
7718  !talkAffFailure && !talkFearSuccess && !talkFearFailure;
7719 
7720  int32_t talkType = 0;
7721  int8_t expID = 0;
7722  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
7723  {
7724  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
7725  talkType = 1;
7726  expID = EXPERTISE_TALK;
7727  break;
7728  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
7729  talkType = 2;
7730  expID = EXPERTISE_INTIMIDATE;
7731  break;
7732  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
7733  talkType = 3;
7734  expID = EXPERTISE_TAUNT;
7735  break;
7736  default:
7737  return false;
7738  }
7739 
7740  bool success = false;
7741  if(autoJoin)
7742  {
7743  success = true;
7744  talkPoints.first = affThreshold;
7745  talkPoints.second = fearThreshold;
7746  }
7747  else
7748  {
7749  double talkSuccess = spawn && !avoided
7750  ? (double)(100 - spawn->GetTalkResist()) : 0.0;
7751 
7752  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, eState);
7753  if(talkSuccess != 0.0)
7754  {
7755  auto adjust = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager()
7756  ->GetAspectMap(source, TokuseiAspectType::TALK_RATE,
7757  std::set<int32_t>{ 0, talkType }, calcState);
7758 
7759  for(auto pair : adjust)
7760  {
7761  talkSuccess += pair.second;
7762  }
7763 
7764  auto cSource = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(source);
7765  if(cSource && talkSuccess < 100.0)
7766  {
7767  // Boost success based on expertise
7768  talkSuccess += (double)(cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
7769  EXPERTISE_DEMONOLOGY) / 10) * 2.0;
7770  talkSuccess += (double)(cSource->GetExpertiseRank(
7771  (uint8_t)expID) / 10) * 3.0;
7772  }
7773  }
7774 
7775  success = talkSuccess > 0.0 &&
7776  RNG(uint16_t, 1, 100) <= (uint16_t)talkSuccess;
7777  int16_t aff = (int16_t)(talkPoints.first +
7778  (success ? talkAffSuccess : talkAffFailure));
7779  int16_t fear = (int16_t)(talkPoints.second +
7780  (success ? talkFearSuccess : talkFearFailure));
7781 
7782  talkPoints.first = aff < 0 ? 0 : (uint8_t)aff;
7783  talkPoints.second = fear < 0 ? 0 : (uint8_t)fear;
7784 
7785  if(!isTalkAction)
7786  {
7787  // Non-talk skills can never hit the threshold
7788  if(talkPoints.first >= affThreshold)
7789  {
7790  talkPoints.first = (uint8_t)(affThreshold - 1);
7791  }
7792 
7793  if(talkPoints.second >= fearThreshold)
7794  {
7795  talkPoints.second = (uint8_t)(fearThreshold - 1);
7796  }
7797  }
7798  }
7799 
7800  eState->SetTalkPoints(source->GetEntityID(), talkPoints);
7801 
7802  if(talkPoints.first >= affThreshold ||
7803  talkPoints.second >= fearThreshold)
7804  {
7805  // Determine which outcomes are valid and randomly
7806  // select one
7807  int32_t minVal = 1;
7808  int32_t maxVal = 6;
7809 
7810  bool canJoin = true;
7811  bool canGift = true;
7812  if(autoJoin)
7813  {
7814  minVal = 1;
7815  maxVal = 2;
7816  }
7817  else
7818  {
7819  uint8_t talkResults = spawn ? spawn->GetTalkResults() : 3;
7820  if((talkResults & SPAWN_TALK_RESULT_JOIN) == 0)
7821  {
7822  canJoin = false;
7823  maxVal -= 2;
7824  }
7825 
7826  if((talkResults & SPAWN_TALK_RESULT_GIFT) == 0)
7827  {
7828  canGift = false;
7829  maxVal -= 2;
7830  }
7831  }
7832 
7833  int32_t outcome = RNG(int32_t, minVal, maxVal);
7834 
7835  if(!autoJoin)
7836  {
7837  // Shift the outcome to the proper position if some
7838  // results are not available
7839  if(!canJoin)
7840  {
7841  outcome += 2;
7842  }
7843 
7844  if(!canGift && outcome >= 3 && outcome <= 4)
7845  {
7846  outcome += 2;
7847  }
7848  }
7849 
7850  switch(outcome)
7851  {
7852  case 1:
7853  target.TalkFlags = TALK_JOIN;
7854  break;
7855  case 2:
7856  target.TalkFlags = TALK_JOIN_2;
7857  break;
7858  case 3:
7859  target.TalkFlags = TALK_GIVE_ITEM;
7860  break;
7861  case 4:
7862  target.TalkFlags = TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2;
7863  break;
7864  case 5:
7865  target.TalkFlags = TALK_REJECT;
7866  break;
7867  case 6:
7868  default:
7869  target.TalkFlags = TALK_LEAVE;
7870  break;
7871  }
7872 
7873  if((target.TalkFlags == TALK_GIVE_ITEM ||
7874  target.TalkFlags == TALK_GIVE_ITEM) &&
7875  (!spawn || spawn->GiftsCount() == 0))
7876  {
7877  // No gifts mapped, leave instead
7878  target.TalkFlags = TALK_LEAVE;
7879  }
7880 
7881  target.TalkDone = true;
7882  }
7883  else
7884  {
7885  target.TalkFlags = (success ? TALK_RESPONSE_1 : TALK_RESPONSE_4);
7886  }
7887 
7888  // If the target is AI controlled, update aggro
7889  auto aiState = target.EntityState->GetAIState();
7890  if(aiState)
7891  {
7892  bool isTaunt = pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_TAUNT;
7893  if((success && isTaunt) ||
7894  (!success && !isTaunt && !aiState->GetTargetEntityID()))
7895  {
7896  // Taunt skills aggro on success
7897  // Non-taunt skills aggro on failure (if no target set)
7898  mServer.lock()->GetAIManager()->UpdateAggro(target.EntityState,
7899  source->GetEntityID());
7900  }
7901  }
7902 
7903  return target.TalkDone;
7904 }
7905 
7906 void SkillManager::HandleNegotiations(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> source,
7907  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
7908  const std::list<std::pair<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>, uint8_t>> talkDone)
7909 {
7910  auto server = mServer.lock();
7911  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
7912  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
7913  auto zConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
7914 
7915  // Gather all enemy IDs that will be removed
7916  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> encounterGroups;
7917  std::unordered_map<int32_t, std::list<int32_t>> removedEnemies;
7918  for(auto pair : talkDone)
7919  {
7920  if(pair.second != TALK_REJECT)
7921  {
7922  int32_t removeMode = 0;
7923  switch(pair.second)
7924  {
7925  case TALK_JOIN:
7926  case TALK_JOIN_2:
7927  removeMode = 5;
7928  break;
7929  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM:
7930  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2:
7931  removeMode = 6;
7932  break;
7933  case TALK_LEAVE:
7934  removeMode = 8;
7935  break;
7936  default:
7937  break;
7938  }
7939 
7940  // Get encounter information
7941  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(pair.first);
7942  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
7943  if(enemy && enemy->GetEncounterID())
7944  {
7945  encounterGroups[enemy->GetEncounterID()] = enemy->GetSpawnGroupID();
7946  }
7947 
7948  // Remove all opponents
7949  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(false, pair.first, nullptr);
7950  zone->RemoveEntity(pair.first->GetEntityID(), 1);
7951  removedEnemies[removeMode].push_back(pair.first->GetEntityID());
7952  }
7953  }
7954 
7955  for(auto pair : removedEnemies)
7956  {
7957  zoneManager->RemoveEntitiesFromZone(zone, pair.second, pair.first, true);
7958  }
7959 
7960  auto sourceClient = server->GetManagerConnection()->
7961  GetEntityClient(source->GetEntityID());
7962  auto sourceState = sourceClient ? sourceClient->GetClientState() : nullptr;
7963  if(!sourceState)
7964  {
7965  // Not a player, flush connections and stop
7966  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(zConnections);
7967  return;
7968  }
7969 
7970  // Partner demon can gain familiarity from successful negotiations
7971  int32_t fGain = 0;
7972  auto partnerDef = sourceState->GetDemonState()->GetDevilData();
7973  auto fType = partnerDef ? server->GetServerDataManager()
7974  ->GetDemonFamiliarityTypeData(partnerDef->GetFamiliarity()
7975  ->GetFamiliarityType()) : nullptr;
7976 
7977  // Keep track of demons that have "joined" for demon quests
7978  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, int32_t> joined;
7979 
7980  // Handle the results of negotiations that result in an enemy being removed
7981  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<LootBoxState>,
7982  std::shared_ptr<EnemyState>> lStates;
7983  for(auto pair : talkDone)
7984  {
7985  auto eState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<EnemyState>(pair.first);
7986  if(pair.second != TALK_LEAVE && pair.second != TALK_REJECT)
7987  {
7988  auto enemy = eState->GetEntity();
7989 
7990  std::shared_ptr<objects::LootBox> lBox;
7991  switch(pair.second)
7992  {
7993  case TALK_JOIN:
7994  case TALK_JOIN_2:
7995  {
7996  lBox = std::make_shared<objects::LootBox>();
7997  lBox->SetType(objects::LootBox::Type_t::EGG);
7998  lBox->SetEnemy(enemy);
7999 
8000  auto demonLoot = std::make_shared<objects::Loot>();
8001  demonLoot->SetType(enemy->GetType());
8002  demonLoot->SetCount(1);
8003  lBox->SetLoot(0, demonLoot);
8004 
8005  if(joined.find(enemy->GetType()) == joined.end())
8006  {
8007  joined[enemy->GetType()] = 1;
8008  }
8009  else
8010  {
8011  joined[enemy->GetType()]++;
8012  }
8013  }
8014  break;
8015  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM:
8016  case TALK_GIVE_ITEM_2:
8017  {
8018  lBox = std::make_shared<objects::LootBox>();
8019  lBox->SetType(objects::LootBox::Type_t::GIFT_BOX);
8020  lBox->SetEnemy(enemy);
8021 
8022  auto drops = GetItemDrops(source, eState, sourceClient,
8023  zone, true);
8024  auto gifts = drops[(uint8_t)objects::DropSet::Type_t::NORMAL];
8025  characterManager->CreateLootFromDrops(lBox, gifts,
8026  source->GetLUCK(), true);
8027  }
8028  break;
8029  default:
8030  break;
8031  }
8032 
8033  if(lBox)
8034  {
8035  auto lState = std::make_shared<LootBoxState>(lBox);
8036  lState->SetCurrentX(eState->GetDestinationX());
8037  lState->SetCurrentY(eState->GetDestinationY());
8038  lState->SetCurrentRotation(eState->GetDestinationRotation());
8039  lState->SetEntityID(server->GetNextEntityID());
8040  lStates[lState] = eState;
8041 
8042  zone->AddLootBox(lState);
8043  }
8044  }
8045 
8046  if(fType && pair.second != TALK_REJECT)
8047  {
8048  fGain = fGain + (int32_t)fType->GetTalkSuccess();
8049  }
8050  }
8051 
8052  // Show each look box and schedule them for cleanup after their
8053  // loot time passes
8054  if(lStates.size() > 0)
8055  {
8056  // Spawned boxes remain lootable for 120 seconds
8057  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
8058 
8059  auto firstClient = zConnections.size() > 0 ? zConnections.front() : nullptr;
8060  auto sourceParty = sourceState->GetParty();
8061  std::set<int32_t> sourcePartyMembers = sourceParty
8062  ? sourceParty->GetMemberIDs() : std::set<int32_t>();
8063 
8064  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> lootTimeEntityIDs;
8065  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, std::list<int32_t>> delayedLootEntityIDs;
8066  for(auto lPair : lStates)
8067  {
8068  auto lState = lPair.first;
8069  auto eState = lPair.second;
8070 
8071  auto lootBox = lState->GetEntity();
8072  lootBox->InsertValidLooterIDs(sourceState->GetWorldCID());
8073 
8074  uint64_t lootTime = 0;
8075  uint64_t delayedLootTime = 0;
8076  if(lootBox->GetType() == objects::LootBox::Type_t::EGG)
8077  {
8078  // Demon eggs remain lootable for 300 seconds
8079  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 300000000);
8080 
8081  // Free loot starts 120 seconds in
8082  delayedLootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 120000000);
8083  }
8084  else
8085  {
8086  // Gift boxes remain lootable for 120 seconds
8087  lootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 120000000);
8088 
8089  if(sourceParty)
8090  {
8091  if(sourceParty->GetDropRule() ==
8092  objects::Party::DropRule_t::FREE_LOOT)
8093  {
8094  lootBox->SetValidLooterIDs(sourcePartyMembers);
8095  }
8096  else
8097  {
8098  // Free loot starts 60 seconds in
8099  delayedLootTime = (uint64_t)(now + 60000000);
8100  }
8101  }
8102  }
8103  lootBox->SetLootTime(lootTime);
8104 
8105  if(firstClient)
8106  {
8107  zoneManager->SendLootBoxData(firstClient, lState, eState,
8108  true, true);
8109  }
8110 
8111  int32_t lootEntityID = lState->GetEntityID();
8112  lootTimeEntityIDs[lootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
8113 
8114  if(sourceParty && delayedLootTime)
8115  {
8116  delayedLootEntityIDs[delayedLootTime].push_back(lootEntityID);
8117  }
8118  }
8119 
8120  for(auto pair : lootTimeEntityIDs)
8121  {
8122  zoneManager->ScheduleEntityRemoval(pair.first, zone, pair.second, 13);
8123  }
8124 
8125  for(auto pair : delayedLootEntityIDs)
8126  {
8127  ScheduleFreeLoot(pair.first, zone, pair.second, sourcePartyMembers);
8128  }
8129  }
8130 
8131  if(zone->DiasporaMiniBossUpdated())
8132  {
8133  server->GetTokuseiManager()->UpdateDiasporaMinibossCount(zone);
8134  }
8135 
8136  if(encounterGroups.size() > 0)
8137  {
8138  HandleEncounterDefeat(source, zone, encounterGroups);
8139  }
8140 
8141  if(joined.size() > 0 && sourceClient)
8142  {
8143  // Update demon quest if active
8144  auto eventManager = server->GetEventManager();
8145  for(auto& pair : joined)
8146  {
8147  eventManager->UpdateDemonQuestCount(sourceClient,
8148  objects::DemonQuest::Type_t::CONTRACT,
8149  pair.first, pair.second);
8150  }
8151  }
8152 
8153  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(zConnections);
8154 
8155  // Lastly update familiarity
8156  if(fGain)
8157  {
8158  characterManager->UpdateFamiliarity(sourceClient, fGain, true, true);
8159  }
8160 }
8161 
8162 void SkillManager::HandleSkillLearning(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> entity,
8163  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
8164 {
8165  double iMod1 = (double)pSkill->Definition->GetAcquisition()->GetInheritanceModifier();
8166 
8167  auto dState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<DemonState>(entity);
8168  if(!dState || !dState->Ready() || iMod1 <= 0)
8169  {
8170  return;
8171  }
8172 
8173  bool isSource = pSkill->Activated->GetSourceEntity() == entity;
8174  auto learningSkills = dState->GetLearningSkills(pSkill->EffectiveAffinity);
8175  if(learningSkills.size() == 0)
8176  {
8177  return;
8178  }
8179 
8180  auto server = mServer.lock();
8181  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
8182  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
8183 
8184  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create();
8185 
8186  std::list<std::pair<uint32_t, int16_t>> updateMap;
8187  for(auto iSkill : learningSkills)
8188  {
8189  auto iSkillData = definitionManager->GetSkillData(iSkill->GetSkill());
8190  auto iMod2 = iSkillData
8191  ? (double)iSkillData->GetAcquisition()->GetInheritanceModifier() : 0.0;
8192  if(iMod2 > 0.0)
8193  {
8194  uint16_t updateProgress = 0;
8195  if(isSource)
8196  {
8197  updateProgress = (uint16_t)floor(pow((iMod1 * 40.0)/iMod2, 2) * 0.25);
8198  }
8199  else
8200  {
8201  updateProgress = (uint16_t)floor(pow((iMod1 * 40.0)/iMod2, 2));
8202  }
8203 
8204  // Apply rate from demon
8205  int16_t learnRate = dState->GetCorrectValue(
8206  CorrectTbl::RATE_EXPERTISE);
8207  if(learnRate <= 0)
8208  {
8209  updateProgress = 0;
8210  }
8211  else if(updateProgress > 0 && learnRate != 100)
8212  {
8213  float calc = (float)updateProgress * (float)learnRate * 0.01f;
8214  if(calc > (float)std::numeric_limits<uint16_t>::max())
8215  {
8216  updateProgress = std::numeric_limits<uint16_t>::max();
8217  }
8218  else
8219  {
8220  updateProgress = (uint16_t)calc;
8221  }
8222  }
8223 
8224  if(updateProgress > 0)
8225  {
8226  int16_t progress = dState->UpdateLearningSkill(iSkill, updateProgress);
8227  updateMap.push_back(std::pair<uint32_t, int16_t>(iSkill->GetSkill(), progress));
8228 
8229  dbChanges->Update(iSkill);
8230  }
8231  }
8232  }
8233 
8234  if(updateMap.size() > 0)
8235  {
8236  auto dClient = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(dState->GetEntityID(), false);
8237  if(dClient)
8238  {
8239  libcomp::Packet p;
8240  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_INHERIT_SKILL_UPDATED);
8241  p.WriteS32Little(dState->GetEntityID());
8242  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)updateMap.size());
8243  for(auto pair : updateMap)
8244  {
8245  p.WriteU32Little(pair.first);
8246  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)pair.second);
8247  }
8248 
8249  dClient->SendPacket(p);
8250  }
8251 
8252  dState->RefreshLearningSkills(pSkill->EffectiveAffinity, definitionManager);
8253 
8254  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
8255  }
8256 }
8257 
8258 void SkillManager::HandleDurabilityDamage(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> entity,
8259  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
8260 {
8261  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(entity);
8262  auto character = cState ? cState->GetEntity() : nullptr;
8263  if(!cState || !character || !cState->Ready())
8264  {
8265  return;
8266  }
8267 
8268  const size_t WEAPON_IDX = (size_t)objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_WEAPON;
8269 
8270  auto server = mServer.lock();
8271  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
8272 
8273  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(cState->GetEntityID());
8274  if(!client)
8275  {
8276  return;
8277  }
8278 
8279  bool isSource = pSkill->Activated->GetSourceEntity() == entity;
8280  if(isSource)
8281  {
8282  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DURABILITY_DOWN)
8283  {
8284  // Explicit set to visible durability
8285  auto params = pSkill->Definition->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
8286  auto equip = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)params[0]).Get();
8287  if(equip)
8288  {
8289  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, equip,
8290  params[1] * -1000);
8291  }
8292  }
8293 
8294  // Decrease weapon durability by value * 2
8295  // (do not scale for target count hit)
8296  auto weapon = character->GetEquippedItems(WEAPON_IDX).Get();
8297  if(!weapon)
8298  {
8299  return;
8300  }
8301 
8302  uint16_t weaponDamage = pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()->GetBreakData()
8303  ->GetWeapon();
8304  if(!weaponDamage)
8305  {
8306  return;
8307  }
8308 
8309  double knowledgeRank = (double)pSkill->KnowledgeRank;
8310 
8311  int32_t durabilityLoss = weaponDamage * 2;
8312  if(knowledgeRank)
8313  {
8314  // Decrease damage by a maximum of approximately 30%
8316  durabilityLoss = (int32_t)floor(pow(knowledgeRank, 2) / 450.0 -
8317  (0.4275 * knowledgeRank) + (double)durabilityLoss);
8318  }
8319 
8320  if(durabilityLoss <= 0)
8321  {
8322  // Floor at 1 point
8323  durabilityLoss = 1;
8324  }
8325 
8326  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, weapon, -durabilityLoss);
8327  }
8328  else
8329  {
8330  // Decrease armor durability on everything equipped but the weapon by value
8331  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>> otherEquipment;
8332  for(size_t i = 0; i < 15; i++)
8333  {
8334  if(i != WEAPON_IDX)
8335  {
8336  auto equip = character->GetEquippedItems(i).Get();
8337  if(equip)
8338  {
8339  otherEquipment.push_back(equip);
8340  }
8341  }
8342  }
8343 
8344  if(otherEquipment.size() == 0)
8345  {
8346  return;
8347  }
8348 
8349  uint16_t armorDamage = pSkill->Definition->GetDamage()->GetBreakData()
8350  ->GetArmor();
8351  if(!armorDamage)
8352  {
8353  return;
8354  }
8355 
8356  double defRank = (double)cState->GetExpertiseRank(EXPERTISE_SURVIVAL) +
8357  cState->GetExpertiseRank(EXPERTISE_CHAIN_R_PRESENCE, server
8358  ->GetDefinitionManager());
8359 
8360  int32_t durabilityLoss = (int32_t)armorDamage;
8361  if(defRank)
8362  {
8363  // Decrease damage to a maximum of approximately 60%
8365  durabilityLoss = (int32_t)ceil(((double)durabilityLoss - 1.0) *
8366  (1.0 + ((0.002 * pow(defRank, 2)) - (0.215 * defRank)) / 10.0));
8367  }
8368 
8369  if(durabilityLoss <= 0)
8370  {
8371  // Floor at 1 point
8372  durabilityLoss = 1;
8373  }
8374 
8375  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>, int32_t> equipMap;
8376  for(auto equip : otherEquipment)
8377  {
8378  equipMap[equip] = -durabilityLoss;
8379  }
8380 
8381  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, equipMap);
8382  }
8383 }
8384 
8385 void SkillManager::HandleFusionGauge(
8386  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
8387 {
8388  auto def = pSkill->Definition;
8389  bool isFusionSkill = pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DEMON_FUSION;
8390  auto actionType = def->GetBasic()->GetActionType();
8391  if(isFusionSkill || actionType >
8392  objects::MiSkillBasicData::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::DODGE)
8393  {
8394  return;
8395  }
8396 
8397  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
8398  pSkill->Activated->GetSourceEntity());
8399 
8400  auto server = mServer.lock();
8401  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
8402  source->GetEntityID(), false);
8403  if(client)
8404  {
8405  // Raise the fusion gauge
8406  bool isDemon = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<DemonState>(
8407  source) != nullptr;
8408  bool higherLevel = false;
8409  bool skillHit = false;
8410 
8411  int8_t lvl = source->GetLevel();
8412  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
8413  {
8414  if(target.EntityState != source && !target.GuardModifier &&
8415  !target.HitAvoided && !target.HitAbsorb)
8416  {
8417  skillHit = true;
8418  if(target.EntityState->GetLevel() > lvl)
8419  {
8420  higherLevel = true;
8421  break;
8422  }
8423  }
8424  }
8425 
8426  if(skillHit)
8427  {
8428  int32_t points = (int32_t)libcomp::FUSION_GAUGE_GROWTH[(size_t)actionType]
8429  [(size_t)((isDemon ? 2 : 0) + (higherLevel ? 1 : 0))];
8430 
8431  float fgBonus = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()->GetFusionGaugeBonus();
8432  if(fgBonus > 0.f)
8433  {
8434  points = (int32_t)ceil((double)points * (double)(1.f + fgBonus));
8435  }
8436 
8437  server->GetCharacterManager()->UpdateFusionGauge(client, points, true);
8438  }
8439  }
8440 }
8441 
8442 void SkillManager::InterruptEvents(const std::set<int32_t>& worldCIDs)
8443 {
8444  auto server = mServer.lock();
8445  auto eventManager = server->GetEventManager();
8446  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
8447  for(int32_t worldCID : worldCIDs)
8448  {
8449  int32_t sourceEntityID = 0;
8450 
8451  auto client = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(worldCID, true);
8452  auto zone = client ? client->GetClientState()->GetZone() : nullptr;
8453  if(client)
8454  {
8455  sourceEntityID = eventManager->InterruptEvent(client);
8456  }
8457 
8458  auto eState = (sourceEntityID && zone)
8459  ? zone->GetEntity(sourceEntityID) : nullptr;
8460  if(eState)
8461  {
8462  switch(eState->GetEntityType())
8463  {
8464  case EntityType_t::PLASMA:
8465  // Fail the plasma event
8466  server->GetZoneManager()->FailPlasma(client, sourceEntityID);
8467  break;
8468  case EntityType_t::PVP_BASE:
8469  // End occupy attempt
8470  server->GetMatchManager()->LeaveBase(client, sourceEntityID);
8471  break;
8472  default:
8473  // Nothing more needs to be done
8474  break;
8475  }
8476  }
8477  }
8478 }
8479 
8480 bool SkillManager::ToggleSwitchSkill(
8481  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
8482  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated,
8483  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx)
8484 {
8485  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
8486  ->GetSourceEntity());
8487 
8488  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
8489  uint32_t skillID = skillData->GetCommon()->GetID();
8490 
8491  bool toggleOn = false;
8492  if(source->ActiveSwitchSkillsContains(skillID))
8493  {
8494  source->RemoveActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
8495  }
8496  else
8497  {
8498  source->InsertActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
8499  toggleOn = true;
8500  }
8501 
8502  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, ctx, activated);
8503  FinalizeSkill(ctx, activated);
8504 
8505  if(client)
8506  {
8507  libcomp::Packet p;
8508  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_SWITCH);
8509  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
8510  p.WriteU32Little(skillID);
8511  p.WriteS8(toggleOn ? 1 : 0);
8512 
8513  client->QueuePacket(p);
8514 
8515  mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(
8516  source, client);
8517 
8518  client->FlushOutgoing();
8519  }
8520  else
8521  {
8522  auto server = mServer.lock();
8523  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
8524 
8525  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(source, false);
8526  source->RecalculateStats(definitionManager);
8527  }
8528 
8529  return true;
8530 }
8531 
8532 bool SkillManager::CalculateDamage(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
8533  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
8534 {
8535  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
8536 
8537  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
8538 
8539  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage();
8540  auto formula = damageData->GetFormula();
8541 
8542  bool isHeal = formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_NORMAL
8543  || formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_STATIC
8544  || formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_MAX_PERCENT;
8545  bool isSimpleDamage = formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE;
8546 
8547  uint16_t baseMod1 = damageData->GetModifier1();
8548  uint16_t baseMod2 = damageData->GetModifier2();
8549 
8550  float mod1Multiplier = 1.f;
8551  float mod2Multiplier = 1.f;
8552  if(formula == objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_SOURCE_PERCENT)
8553  {
8554  // Modifiers adjust based upon current remaining HP
8555  std::vector<std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>> hpMpCurrent;
8556 
8557  auto cs = source->GetCoreStats();
8558  if(cs)
8559  {
8560  // Use pre-cost values
8561  hpMpCurrent.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(
8562  cs->GetHP() + skill.Activated->GetHPCost(),
8563  source->GetMaxHP()));
8564  hpMpCurrent.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(
8565  cs->GetMP() + skill.Activated->GetMPCost(),
8566  source->GetMaxMP()));
8567  }
8568  else
8569  {
8570  hpMpCurrent.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(0, 1));
8571  hpMpCurrent.push_back(std::pair<int32_t, int32_t>(0, 1));
8572  }
8573 
8574  for(size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
8575  {
8576  auto& pair = hpMpCurrent[i];
8577  float mod = (float)pair.first / (float)pair.second;
8578 
8579  if(i == 0)
8580  {
8581  mod1Multiplier = mod;
8582  }
8583  else
8584  {
8585  mod2Multiplier = mod;
8586  }
8587  }
8588  }
8589 
8590  if(skill.FunctionID)
8591  {
8592  // Apply source specific FID modifiers
8593  auto calcState = source->GetCalculatedState();
8594  if(skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STAT_SUM_DAMAGE)
8595  {
8596  // Sum core stats together for modifiers
8597  auto ct = calcState->GetCorrectTbl();
8598  int32_t statSum = (int32_t)ct[(size_t)CorrectTbl::STR] +
8599  (int32_t)ct[(size_t)CorrectTbl::MAGIC] +
8600  (int32_t)ct[(size_t)CorrectTbl::VIT] +
8601  (int32_t)ct[(size_t)CorrectTbl::INT] +
8602  (int32_t)ct[(size_t)CorrectTbl::SPEED] +
8603  (int32_t)ct[(size_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK];
8604 
8605  double levelMod = (double)source->GetLevel() / 100.0;
8606 
8607  int32_t mod = (int32_t)(levelMod * (double)statSum *
8608  ((double)baseMod1 / 20.0));
8609  baseMod1 = (uint16_t)(mod > 1000 ? 1000 : mod);
8610 
8611  mod = (int32_t)(levelMod * (double)statSum *
8612  ((double)baseMod2 / 20.0));
8613  baseMod2 = (uint16_t)(mod > 1000 ? 1000 : mod);
8614  }
8615  else if(skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_HP_DEPENDENT)
8616  {
8617  // Multiplier changes at higher/lower HP
8618  auto params = skill.Definition->GetSpecial()
8619  ->GetSpecialParams();
8620 
8621  bool lt = params[0] == 1;
8622  float split = (float)(lt ? (100 + params[2]) : (params[2])) *
8623  0.01f;
8624 
8625  auto cs = source->GetCoreStats();
8626  float percentLeft = 0.f;
8627  if(cs)
8628  {
8629  percentLeft = (float)cs->GetHP() / (float)source->GetMaxHP();
8630  }
8631 
8632  if((lt && percentLeft <= split) ||
8633  (!lt && percentLeft >= split))
8634  {
8635  float adjust = (float)params[1] * 0.01f;
8636  mod1Multiplier = mod1Multiplier * adjust;
8637  mod2Multiplier = mod2Multiplier * adjust;
8638  }
8639  }
8640  else if(skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUICIDE)
8641  {
8642  // Apply a flat x4 multiplier
8643  mod1Multiplier = mod1Multiplier * 4.f;
8644  mod2Multiplier = mod2Multiplier * 4.f;
8645  }
8646  }
8647 
8648  bool fidTargetAdjusted = skill.FunctionID &&
8649  (skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_HP_MP_MIN ||
8650  skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_LNC_DAMAGE);
8651  for(SkillTargetResult& target : skill.Targets)
8652  {
8653  if(target.HitAvoided) continue;
8654 
8655  uint16_t mod1 = baseMod1;
8656  uint16_t mod2 = baseMod2;
8657 
8658  auto targetState = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true,
8659  source);
8660  if(skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() && (mod1 || mod2) &&
8661  GetEntityRate(source, targetState, true) == 0)
8662  {
8663  // Combat skills that deal damage display "impossible" if a 0%
8664  // entity rate taken exists
8665  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_IMPOSSIBLE;
8666  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
8667  continue;
8668  }
8669 
8670  float targetModMultiplier = 1.f;
8671  if(fidTargetAdjusted)
8672  {
8673  // Apply target specific FID modifiers
8674  if(skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_HP_MP_MIN)
8675  {
8676  // Immutable reduction to 1 HP/MP
8677  target.Damage1Type = DAMAGE_EXPLICIT_SET;
8678  target.Damage2Type = DAMAGE_EXPLICIT_SET;
8679 
8680  auto params = skill.Definition->GetSpecial()
8681  ->GetSpecialParams();
8682  if(params[0])
8683  {
8684  // HP to 1
8685  target.Damage1 = 1;
8686  }
8687  else
8688  {
8689  // Do not change
8690  target.Damage1 = -1;
8691  }
8692 
8693  if(params[1])
8694  {
8695  // MP to 1
8696  target.Damage2 = 1;
8697  }
8698  else
8699  {
8700  // Do not change
8701  target.Damage2 = -1;
8702  }
8703 
8704  // Nothing left to do
8705  continue;
8706  }
8707  else if(skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_LNC_DAMAGE)
8708  {
8709  // Modifier dependent on LNC difference
8710  size_t diff = (size_t)abs(((int8_t)source->GetLNCType() -
8711  (int8_t)target.EntityState->GetLNCType()) / 2);
8712  int32_t mod = skill.Definition->GetSpecial()
8713  ->GetSpecialParams(diff);
8714  if(mod)
8715  {
8716  targetModMultiplier = 1.f + ((float)mod / 100.f);
8717  }
8718  }
8719  }
8720 
8721  // Apply multipliers
8722  if(mod1Multiplier != 1.f || targetModMultiplier != 1.f)
8723  {
8724  mod1 = (uint16_t)floor((float)mod1 * mod1Multiplier *
8725  targetModMultiplier);
8726  }
8727 
8728  if(mod2Multiplier != 1.f || targetModMultiplier != 1.f)
8729  {
8730  mod2 = (uint16_t)floor((float)mod2 * mod2Multiplier *
8731  targetModMultiplier);
8732  }
8733 
8734  // Floor modifiers at 1
8735  if(!mod1 && damageData->GetModifier1())
8736  {
8737  mod1 = 1;
8738  }
8739 
8740  if(!mod2 && damageData->GetModifier2())
8741  {
8742  mod2 = 1;
8743  }
8744 
8745  bool effectiveHeal = isHeal || target.HitAbsorb;
8746 
8747  int8_t minDamageLevel = -1;
8748  if(!effectiveHeal)
8749  {
8750  // If not healing, determine if the calculated critical level will
8751  // result in minimum damage
8752  for(double damageMin : tokuseiManager->GetAspectValueList(
8753  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_MIN, targetState))
8754  {
8755  if(minDamageLevel < (int8_t)damageMin)
8756  {
8757  minDamageLevel = (int8_t)damageMin;
8758  }
8759  }
8760  }
8761 
8762  uint8_t critLevel = 0;
8763  bool calcTechPursuit = false;
8764  bool minAdjust = minDamageLevel > -1;
8765  switch(formula)
8766  {
8767  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::NONE:
8768  return true;
8769  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL:
8770  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_NORMAL_SIMPLE:
8771  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_COUNTER:
8772  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_NORMAL:
8773  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_SOURCE_PERCENT:
8774  {
8775  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
8776 
8777  critLevel = !effectiveHeal ? GetCritLevel(source, target, pSkill) : 0;
8778 
8779  CorrectTbl resistCorrectType = (CorrectTbl)(skill.EffectiveAffinity + RES_OFFSET);
8780 
8781  float resist = (float)
8782  (targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)resistCorrectType) * 0.01);
8783  if(target.AutoProtect)
8784  {
8785  // Always resist with min damage
8786  minDamageLevel = 3;
8787  resist = 99.9f;
8788  }
8789  else if(target.HitAbsorb)
8790  {
8791  // Resistance is not applied during absorption
8792  resist = 0;
8793  }
8794 
8795  // Calculate both damage types
8796  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Normal(source, target, pSkill,
8797  mod1, target.Damage1Type, resist, critLevel, isHeal);
8798  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Normal(source, target, pSkill,
8799  mod2, target.Damage2Type, resist, critLevel, isHeal);
8800 
8801  // Always disable min adjust as it will be done here
8802  minAdjust = false;
8803 
8804  if(minDamageLevel >= (int8_t)critLevel)
8805  {
8806  // If the min damage level is equal to or greater than the
8807  // critical level, adjust to minimum damage
8808  target.Damage1 = target.Damage1 ? 1 : 0;
8809  target.Damage2 = target.Damage2 ? 1 : 0;
8810  }
8811 
8812  // Set resistence flags, if not healing
8813  if(!effectiveHeal)
8814  {
8815  if(resist >= 0.5f)
8816  {
8817  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_PROTECT;
8818  }
8819  else if(resist <= -0.5f)
8820  {
8821  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_WEAKPOINT;
8822  }
8823  }
8824 
8825  calcTechPursuit = !effectiveHeal && !isSimpleDamage &&
8826  target.Damage1 > 0;
8827  }
8828  break;
8829  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_STATIC:
8830  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_STATIC:
8831  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Static(
8832  mod1, target.Damage1Type);
8833  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Static(
8834  mod2, target.Damage2Type);
8835  break;
8836  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_PERCENT:
8837  {
8838  auto cs = target.EntityState->GetCoreStats();
8839  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_Percent(
8840  mod1, target.Damage1Type, cs ? cs->GetHP() : 0);
8841  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_Percent(
8842  mod2, target.Damage2Type, cs ? cs->GetMP() : 0);
8843  }
8844  break;
8845  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::DMG_MAX_PERCENT:
8846  case objects::MiBattleDamageData::Formula_t::HEAL_MAX_PERCENT:
8847  {
8848  target.Damage1 = CalculateDamage_MaxPercent(mod1,
8849  target.Damage1Type, target.EntityState->GetMaxHP());
8850  target.Damage2 = CalculateDamage_MaxPercent(mod2,
8851  target.Damage2Type, target.EntityState->GetMaxMP());
8852  }
8853  break;
8854  default:
8855  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
8856  {
8857  return libcomp::String("Unknown damage formula type "
8858  "encountered: %1\n").Arg((uint8_t)formula);
8859  });
8860 
8861  return false;
8862  }
8863 
8864  if(pSkill->AbsoluteDamage)
8865  {
8866  // Hits calculated so adjust any damage parameters to match
8867  // absolute damage
8868  if(target.Damage1)
8869  {
8870  target.Damage1 = pSkill->AbsoluteDamage;
8871  }
8872 
8873  if(target.Damage2)
8874  {
8875  target.Damage2 = pSkill->AbsoluteDamage;
8876  }
8877  }
8878  else
8879  {
8880  // Apply minimum adjustment for anything that hasn't already
8881  if(minAdjust)
8882  {
8883  target.Damage1 = target.Damage1 ? 1 : 0;
8884  target.Damage2 = target.Damage2 ? 1 : 0;
8885  }
8886 
8887  // Reduce for AOE and make sure at least 1 damage was dealt to each
8888  // specified type (uses raw, uncapped damage as base)
8889  float aoeReduction = (float)damageData->GetAoeReduction();
8890  if(mod1)
8891  {
8892  if(!target.PrimaryTarget && aoeReduction > 0)
8893  {
8894  target.Damage1 = (int32_t)((float)target.Damage1 *
8895  (float)(1.f - (0.01f * aoeReduction)));
8896  }
8897 
8898  if(target.Damage1 == 0)
8899  {
8900  target.Damage1 = 1;
8901  }
8902  }
8903 
8904  if(mod2)
8905  {
8906  if(!target.PrimaryTarget && aoeReduction > 0)
8907  {
8908  target.Damage2 = (int32_t)((float)target.Damage2 *
8909  (float)(1.f - (0.01f * aoeReduction)));
8910  }
8911 
8912  if(target.Damage2 == 0)
8913  {
8914  target.Damage2 = 1;
8915  }
8916  }
8917 
8918  // Apply limits and set crit flags
8919  if(critLevel == 2)
8920  {
8921  // Apply LB upper limit
8922  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false,
8923  target.EntityState);
8924 
8925  int32_t maxLB = (int32_t)(30000 + floor(tokuseiManager
8926  ->GetAspectSum(source, TokuseiAspectType::LIMIT_BREAK_MAX,
8927  calcState)));
8928 
8929  if(target.Damage1 > maxLB)
8930  {
8931  target.Damage1 = maxLB;
8932  }
8933 
8934  if(target.Damage2 > maxLB)
8935  {
8936  target.Damage2 = maxLB;
8937  }
8938 
8939  if(target.Damage1 > 30000 ||
8940  target.Damage2 > 30000)
8941  {
8942  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_INTENSIVE_BREAK;
8943  }
8944  else
8945  {
8946  target.Flags2 |= FLAG2_LIMIT_BREAK;
8947  }
8948  }
8949  else
8950  {
8951  if(target.Damage1 > 9999)
8952  {
8953  target.Damage1 = 9999;
8954  }
8955 
8956  if(target.Damage2 > 9999)
8957  {
8958  target.Damage2 = 9999;
8959  }
8960 
8961  if(critLevel == 1)
8962  {
8963  target.Flags1 |= FLAG1_CRITICAL;
8964  }
8965  }
8966 
8967  // Determine pursuit/tech damage
8968  if(calcTechPursuit)
8969  {
8970  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false,
8971  target.EntityState);
8972 
8973  int32_t pursuitRate = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
8974  source, TokuseiAspectType::PURSUIT_RATE, calcState));
8975  int32_t pursuitPow = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
8976  source, TokuseiAspectType::PURSUIT_POWER, calcState));
8977  if(pursuitRate > 0 &&
8978  (pursuitRate >= 100 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 100) <= pursuitRate))
8979  {
8980  // Take the lowest value applied tokusei affinity override if one exists
8981  auto affinityOverrides = tokuseiManager->GetAspectValueList(source,
8982  TokuseiAspectType::PURSUIT_AFFINITY_OVERRIDE);
8983  if(affinityOverrides.size() > 0)
8984  {
8985  affinityOverrides.sort();
8986  target.PursuitAffinity = (uint8_t)affinityOverrides.front();
8987 
8988  // If the result is weapon affinity, match it
8989  if(target.PursuitAffinity == 1)
8990  {
8991  target.PursuitAffinity = skill.WeaponAffinity;
8992  }
8993  }
8994 
8995  if(target.PursuitAffinity)
8996  {
8997  // Even if it matches the skill, check NRA for
8998  // pursuit affinity and stop if it is prevented
8999  if(!GetNRAResult(target, skill, target.PursuitAffinity))
9000  {
9001  // Calculate the new enemy resistence and determine damage
9002  float pResist = (float)(targetState->GetCorrectTbl(
9003  (size_t)target.PursuitAffinity + RES_OFFSET) * 0.01);
9004 
9005  // Damage is always dealt at this point even with full
9006  // resistance, floor at 1
9007  float calc = (float)target.Damage1 * (1.f + pResist * -1.f);
9008  target.PursuitDamage = (int32_t)floor(calc < 1.f
9009  ? 1.f : calc);
9010  }
9011  }
9012  else
9013  {
9014  // Pursuit damage is a straight adjustment from normal damage
9015  // when there is no affinity (this is the default state)
9016  target.PursuitDamage = target.Damage1;
9017  }
9018 
9019  if(target.PursuitDamage > 0)
9020  {
9021  // Pursuit power floors at 1% if it hits
9022  if(pursuitPow < 1)
9023  {
9024  pursuitPow = 1;
9025  }
9026 
9027  // Apply the rate adjustment
9028  target.PursuitDamage = (int32_t)floor(
9029  (double)target.PursuitDamage * pursuitPow * 0.01);
9030 
9031  // Adjust for 100% limit
9032  if(target.PursuitDamage > target.Damage1)
9033  {
9034  target.PursuitDamage = target.Damage1;
9035  }
9036  else if(!target.PursuitDamage)
9037  {
9038  target.PursuitDamage = 1;
9039  }
9040  }
9041  }
9042 
9043  int32_t techRate = (int32_t)floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
9044  source, TokuseiAspectType::TECH_ATTACK_RATE, calcState));
9045  double techPow = floor(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
9046  source, TokuseiAspectType::TECH_ATTACK_POWER, calcState));
9047  if(techPow > 0.0 && techRate > 0 &&
9048  (techRate >= 100 || RNG(int32_t, 1, 100) <= techRate))
9049  {
9050  // Calculate relative damage
9051  target.TechnicalDamage = (int32_t)floor(
9052  (double)target.Damage1 * techPow * 0.01);
9053 
9054  // Damage is supposed to hit, floor at 1
9055  if(!target.TechnicalDamage)
9056  {
9057  target.TechnicalDamage = 1;
9058  }
9059 
9060  // Apply limits
9061  if(critLevel == 2)
9062  {
9063  // Cap at LB limit
9064  int32_t maxLB = (int32_t)(30000 + floor(
9065  tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
9066  TokuseiAspectType::LIMIT_BREAK_MAX, calcState)));
9067 
9068  if(target.TechnicalDamage > maxLB)
9069  {
9070  target.TechnicalDamage = maxLB;
9071  }
9072  }
9073  else if(target.TechnicalDamage > 9999)
9074  {
9075  target.TechnicalDamage = 9999;
9076  }
9077  }
9078  }
9079  }
9080 
9081  // If the damage was actually a heal, invert the amount and change the type
9082  if(effectiveHeal)
9083  {
9084  target.Damage1 = target.Damage1 * -1;
9085  target.Damage2 = target.Damage2 * -1;
9086  target.Damage1Type = (target.Damage1Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC) ?
9087  (isHeal ? DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING : DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN) : target.Damage1Type;
9088  target.Damage2Type = (target.Damage2Type == DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC) ?
9089  (isHeal ? DAMAGE_TYPE_HEALING : DAMAGE_TYPE_DRAIN) : target.Damage2Type;
9090  }
9091  }
9092 
9093  if(skill.FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_SUICIDE)
9094  {
9095  auto selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source, skill.Targets, true);
9096 
9097  selfTarget->Damage1 = source->GetCoreStats()->GetHP();
9098  selfTarget->Damage1Type = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
9099  }
9100 
9101  return true;
9102 }
9103 
9104 uint8_t SkillManager::GetCritLevel(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
9105  SkillTargetResult& target, const std::shared_ptr<
9106  channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
9107 {
9108  uint8_t critLevel = 0;
9109  if(target.GuardModifier > 0)
9110  {
9111  // Cannot receive crit or LB while guarding
9112  return critLevel;
9113  }
9114 
9115  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false,
9116  target.EntityState);
9117  auto targetState = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true,
9118  source);
9119 
9120  int16_t sourceLuck = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::LUCK, calcState);
9121  int16_t knowledgeCritBoost = (int16_t)(pSkill->KnowledgeRank * 0.5f);
9122  int16_t critValue = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::CRITICAL, calcState);
9123  critValue = (int16_t)(critValue + sourceLuck + knowledgeCritBoost);
9124 
9125  int16_t critFinal = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::FINAL_CRIT_CHANCE,
9126  calcState);
9127  int16_t lbChance = source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::LB_CHANCE,
9128  calcState);
9129 
9130  float critRate = 0.f;
9131  if(critValue > 0)
9132  {
9133  int16_t critDef1 = targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)
9134  CorrectTbl::CRIT_DEF);
9135  if(sourceLuck < 50)
9136  {
9137  critDef1 = (int16_t)(critDef1 + targetState->GetCorrectTbl(
9138  (size_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK));
9139  }
9140  else if(sourceLuck < 67)
9141  {
9142  critDef1 = (int16_t)(critDef1 + 50);
9143  }
9144  else
9145  {
9146  critDef1 = (int16_t)((float)critDef1 + floor(
9147  (float)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK) *
9148  0.75f));
9149  }
9150 
9151  int16_t critDef2 = (int16_t)(10 + floor(
9152  (float)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::CRIT_DEF) *
9153  0.1f));
9154 
9155  critRate = (float)((floor((float)critValue * 0.2f) *
9156  (1.f + ((float)critValue * 0.01f)) / (float)(critDef1 * critDef2)) *
9157  100.f + (float)critFinal);
9158  }
9159  else
9160  {
9161  critRate = (float)critFinal;
9162  }
9163 
9164  if(critRate > 0.f &&
9165  (critRate >= 100.f || RNG(int16_t, 1, 10000) <= (int16_t)(critRate * 100.f)))
9166  {
9167  critLevel = 1;
9168 
9169  if(lbChance > 0 && RNG(int16_t, 1, 100) <= lbChance)
9170  {
9171  critLevel = 2;
9172  }
9173  }
9174 
9175  return critLevel;
9176 }
9177 
9178 int16_t SkillManager::GetEntityRate(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> eState,
9179  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> calcState, bool taken)
9180 {
9181  if(eState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
9182  {
9183  return calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)(taken
9184  ? CorrectTbl::RATE_PC_TAKEN : CorrectTbl::RATE_PC));
9185  }
9186  else
9187  {
9188  return calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)(taken
9189  ? CorrectTbl::RATE_DEMON_TAKEN : CorrectTbl::RATE_DEMON));
9190  }
9191 }
9192 
9193 float SkillManager::GetAffinityBoost(
9194  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> eState,
9195  std::shared_ptr<objects::CalculatedEntityState> calcState,
9196  CorrectTbl boostType)
9197 {
9198  float aBoost = (float)eState->GetCorrectValue(boostType, calcState);
9199  if(aBoost != 0.f)
9200  {
9201  // Limit boost based on tokusei or 100% by default
9202  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
9203  double affinityMax = tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(eState,
9204  TokuseiAspectType::AFFINITY_CAP_MAX, calcState);
9205  if((double)(aBoost - 100.f) > affinityMax)
9206  {
9207  aBoost = (float)(100.0 + affinityMax);
9208  }
9209  }
9210 
9211  return aBoost;
9212 }
9213 
9214 int32_t SkillManager::CalculateDamage_Normal(const std::shared_ptr<
9215  ActiveEntityState>& source, SkillTargetResult& target,
9216  const std::shared_ptr<ProcessingSkill>& pSkill, uint16_t mod,
9217  uint8_t& damageType, float resist, uint8_t critLevel, bool isHeal)
9218 {
9219  int32_t amount = 0;
9220 
9221  if(mod != 0)
9222  {
9223  ProcessingSkill& skill = *pSkill.get();
9224  auto damageData = skill.Definition->GetDamage()->GetBattleDamage();
9225 
9226  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, target.EntityState);
9227  auto targetState = GetCalculatedState(target.EntityState, pSkill, true, source);
9228 
9229  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
9230 
9231  uint16_t off = CalculateOffenseValue(source, target.EntityState, pSkill);
9232 
9233  // Determine boost(s)
9234  std::set<CorrectTbl> boostTypes;
9235  boostTypes.insert((CorrectTbl)(skill.EffectiveAffinity + BOOST_OFFSET));
9236  if(skill.BaseAffinity == 1)
9237  {
9238  // Include weapon boost too
9239  boostTypes.insert(CorrectTbl::BOOST_WEAPON);
9240  }
9241 
9242  float boost = 0.f;
9243  for(auto boostType : boostTypes)
9244  {
9245  boost += GetAffinityBoost(source, calcState, boostType) * 0.01f;
9246  }
9247 
9248  // -100% boost is the minimum amount allowed
9249  if(boost < -1.f)
9250  {
9251  boost = -1.f;
9252  }
9253 
9254  uint16_t def = 0;
9255  uint8_t rateBoostIdx = 0;
9256  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
9257  {
9258  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
9259  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
9260  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
9261  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::PDEF);
9262  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_CLSR;
9263  break;
9264  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
9265  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
9266  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
9267  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::PDEF);
9268  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_LNGR;
9269  break;
9270  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL:
9271  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR:
9272  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR_LNGR:
9273  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_LNGR:
9274  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::MDEF);
9275  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_SPELL;
9276  break;
9277  case SkillDependencyType_t::SUPPORT:
9278  def = (uint16_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)CorrectTbl::MDEF);
9279  rateBoostIdx = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_SUPPORT;
9280  break;
9281  case SkillDependencyType_t::NONE:
9282  default:
9283  break;
9284  }
9285 
9286  // Do not defend against non-combat skills
9287  if(!skill.Definition->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill())
9288  {
9289  def = 0;
9290  }
9291 
9292  def = (uint16_t)(def + target.GuardModifier);
9293 
9294  float scale = 0.f;
9295  switch(critLevel)
9296  {
9297  case 1: // Critical hit
9298  scale = 1.2f;
9299  break;
9300  case 2: // Limit Break
9301  scale = 1.5f * (float)source->GetCorrectValue(
9302  CorrectTbl::LB_DAMAGE, calcState) * 0.01f;
9303  break;
9304  default: // Normal hit, 80%-99% damage
9305  scale = RNG_DEC(float, 0.8f, 0.99f, 2);
9306  break;
9307  }
9308 
9309  // Damage starts with offense stat * modifier/100
9310  float calc = (float)off * ((float)mod * 0.01f);
9311 
9312  // Add the expertise modifier
9313  calc = calc + (float)skill.ExpertiseRankBoost * 0.5f;
9314 
9315  // Subtract the enemy defense, unless its a critical or limit break
9316  if(critLevel > 0)
9317  {
9318  const static float reduction = mServer.lock()
9319  ->GetWorldSharedConfig()->GetCritDefenseReduction();
9320  if(reduction != 1.f)
9321  {
9322  // Non-full reduction on crit
9323  calc = calc - (float)def * (1.f - reduction);
9324  }
9325  }
9326  else
9327  {
9328  calc = calc - (float)def;
9329  }
9330 
9331  if(calc > 0.f)
9332  {
9333  // Get source rate boost and target rate defense boost
9334  int32_t dependencyDealt = 100;
9335  int32_t dependencyTaken = 100;
9336  if(rateBoostIdx != 0)
9337  {
9338  dependencyDealt = (int32_t)calcState->GetCorrectTbl(
9339  (size_t)rateBoostIdx);
9340 
9341  // Apply offset to get defensive value
9342  dependencyTaken = (int32_t)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)(
9343  rateBoostIdx + ((uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_CLSR_TAKEN -
9344  (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_CLSR)));
9345  }
9346 
9347  // Include heal if effective heal applies
9348  if(isHeal)
9349  {
9350  dependencyDealt = (int32_t)((double)dependencyDealt *
9351  ((double)calcState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)
9352  CorrectTbl::RATE_HEAL) * 0.01));
9353 
9354  dependencyTaken = (int32_t)((double)dependencyTaken *
9355  ((double)targetState->GetCorrectTbl((size_t)
9356  CorrectTbl::RATE_HEAL_TAKEN) * 0.01));
9357  }
9358 
9359  // Adjust dependency limits
9360  if(dependencyDealt < 0)
9361  {
9362  dependencyDealt = 0;
9363  }
9364 
9365  if(dependencyTaken < 0)
9366  {
9367  dependencyTaken = 0;
9368  }
9369 
9370  // Get tokusei adjustments
9371  double tokuseiBoost = tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
9372  TokuseiAspectType::EFFECT_POWER, calcState) * 0.01;
9373  double tokuseiReduction = 0.0;
9374  if(!isHeal)
9375  {
9376  // Only apply damage adjustments if not healing
9377  tokuseiBoost += tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(source,
9378  TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_DEALT, calcState) * 0.01;
9379  tokuseiReduction -= tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
9380  target.EntityState, TokuseiAspectType::DAMAGE_TAKEN,
9381  targetState) * 0.01;
9382 
9383  if(tokuseiBoost < 0.0)
9384  {
9385  tokuseiBoost = 0.0;
9386  }
9387 
9388  if(tokuseiReduction < 0.0)
9389  {
9390  tokuseiReduction = 0.0;
9391  }
9392  }
9393 
9394  // Scale the current value by the critical, limit break or min to
9395  // max damage factor
9396  calc = calc * scale;
9397 
9398  // Multiply by 100% + -resistance
9399  calc = calc * (1.f + resist * -1.f);
9400 
9401  // Multiply by 100% + boost
9402  calc = calc * (1.f + boost);
9403 
9404  // Multiply by entity damage dealt %
9405  calc = calc * (float)(GetEntityRate(target.EntityState,
9406  calcState, false) * 0.01);
9407 
9408  // Multiply by dependency damage dealt %
9409  calc = calc * (float)(dependencyDealt * 0.01);
9410 
9411  // Multiply by 1 + remaining power boosts/100
9412  calc = calc * (float)(1.0 + tokuseiBoost);
9413 
9414  // Gather damage taken rates
9415  std::list<float> damageTaken;
9416 
9417  // Multiply by entity damage taken %
9418  damageTaken.push_back((float)(GetEntityRate(source,
9419  targetState, true) * 0.01));
9420 
9421  // Multiply by dependency damage taken %
9422  damageTaken.push_back((float)(dependencyTaken * 0.01));
9423 
9424  // Multiply by 100% + -general damage taken
9425  damageTaken.push_back((float)(1.0 + tokuseiReduction));
9426 
9427  for(float taken : damageTaken)
9428  {
9429  // Apply damage taken rates if not piercing or rate
9430  // is not a reduction
9431  if(!skill.FunctionID ||
9432  skill.FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_PIERCE ||
9433  taken > 1.f)
9434  {
9435  calc = calc * taken;
9436  }
9437  }
9438 
9439  amount = (int32_t)floor(calc);
9440  }
9441 
9442  if(amount < 1)
9443  {
9444  // Apply minimum value of 1
9445  amount = 1;
9446  }
9447 
9448  damageType = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
9449  }
9450 
9451  return amount;
9452 }
9453 
9454 int32_t SkillManager::CalculateDamage_Static(uint16_t mod, uint8_t& damageType)
9455 {
9456  int32_t amount = 0;
9457 
9458  if(mod != 0)
9459  {
9460  amount = (int32_t)mod;
9461  damageType = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
9462  }
9463 
9464  return amount;
9465 }
9466 
9467 int32_t SkillManager::CalculateDamage_Percent(uint16_t mod, uint8_t& damageType,
9468  int32_t current)
9469 {
9470  int32_t amount = 0;
9471 
9472  if(mod != 0)
9473  {
9474  amount = (int32_t)ceil((float)current * ((float)mod * 0.01f));
9475  damageType = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
9476  }
9477 
9478  return amount;
9479 }
9480 
9481 int32_t SkillManager::CalculateDamage_MaxPercent(uint16_t mod, uint8_t& damageType,
9482  int32_t max)
9483 {
9484  int32_t amount = 0;
9485 
9486  if(mod != 0)
9487  {
9488  amount = (int32_t)ceil((float)max * ((float)mod * 0.01f));
9489  damageType = DAMAGE_TYPE_GENERIC;
9490  }
9491 
9492  return amount;
9493 }
9494 
9495 SkillTargetResult* SkillManager::GetSelfTarget(const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
9496  std::list<SkillTargetResult>& targets, bool indirectDefault, bool autoCreate)
9497 {
9498  for(SkillTargetResult& target : targets)
9499  {
9500  if(target.EntityState == source)
9501  {
9502  return &target;
9503  }
9504  }
9505 
9506  if(autoCreate)
9507  {
9508  SkillTargetResult target;
9509  target.EntityState = source;
9510  target.IndirectTarget = indirectDefault;
9511  targets.push_back(target);
9512  return &targets.back();
9513  }
9514  else
9515  {
9516  return nullptr;
9517  }
9518 }
9519 
9520 bool SkillManager::SetNRA(SkillTargetResult& target, ProcessingSkill& skill,
9521  bool reduceShields)
9522 {
9523  uint8_t resultIdx = GetNRAResult(target, skill, skill.EffectiveAffinity,
9524  target.NRAAffinity, false, reduceShields);
9525  if(resultIdx && skill.InPvP)
9526  {
9527  target.AutoProtect = true;
9528  return false;
9529  }
9530 
9531  switch(resultIdx)
9532  {
9533  case NRA_NULL:
9534  {
9535  if(target.CalcState->ExistingTokuseiAspectsContains(
9536  (int8_t)TokuseiAspectType::BARRIER))
9537  {
9538  target.HitNull = 3; // Barrier
9539  }
9540  else
9541  {
9542  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
9543  {
9544  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
9545  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
9546  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
9547  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
9548  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
9549  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
9550  target.HitNull = 1; // Physical null
9551  break;
9552  default:
9553  target.HitNull = 2; // Magic null
9554  break;
9555  }
9556  }
9557 
9558  target.HitAvoided = true;
9559 
9560  LogSkillManagerDebug([target, skill]()
9561  {
9562  return libcomp::String("%1 nullifies skill %2[%3].\n")
9563  .Arg(target.EntityState->GetEntityLabel())
9564  .Arg(skill.SkillID)
9565  .Arg(skill.Activated->GetActivationID());
9566  });
9567  }
9568  return false;
9569  case NRA_REFLECT:
9570  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
9571  {
9572  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
9573  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
9574  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
9575  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
9576  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
9577  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
9578  target.HitReflect = 1; // Physical reflect
9579  break;
9580  default:
9581  target.HitReflect = 2; // Magic reflect
9582  break;
9583  }
9584  target.HitAvoided = true;
9585 
9586  LogSkillManagerDebug([target, skill]()
9587  {
9588  return libcomp::String("%1 reflects skill %2[%3].\n")
9589  .Arg(target.EntityState->GetEntityLabel())
9590  .Arg(skill.SkillID)
9591  .Arg(skill.Activated->GetActivationID());
9592  });
9593  return true;
9594  case NRA_ABSORB:
9595  target.HitAbsorb = true;
9596 
9597  LogSkillManagerDebug([target, skill]()
9598  {
9599  return libcomp::String("%1 absorbs skill %2[%3].\n")
9600  .Arg(target.EntityState->GetEntityLabel())
9601  .Arg(skill.SkillID)
9602  .Arg(skill.Activated->GetActivationID());
9603  });
9604  return false;
9605  default:
9606  return false;
9607  }
9608 }
9609 
9610 uint8_t SkillManager::GetNRAResult(SkillTargetResult& target,
9611  ProcessingSkill& skill, uint8_t effectiveAffinity)
9612 {
9613  return GetNRAResult(target, skill, effectiveAffinity, target.NRAAffinity,
9614  true, true);
9615 }
9616 
9617 uint8_t SkillManager::GetNRAResult(SkillTargetResult& target,
9618  ProcessingSkill& skill, uint8_t effectiveAffinity,
9619  uint8_t& resultAffinity, bool effectiveOnly, bool reduceShields)
9620 {
9621  resultAffinity = 0;
9622  if(!skill.CanNRA)
9623  {
9624  return 0;
9625  }
9626 
9627  std::list<CorrectTbl> affinities;
9628  if(!effectiveOnly)
9629  {
9630  // Calculate affinity checks for physical vs magic and both base and
9631  // effective values if they differ
9632  if(effectiveAffinity != 11)
9633  {
9634  // Gather based on dependency type and base affinity if not almighty
9635  switch(skill.EffectiveDependencyType)
9636  {
9637  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR:
9638  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_LNGR_SPELL:
9639  case SkillDependencyType_t::CLSR_SPELL:
9640  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR:
9641  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_CLSR_SPELL:
9642  case SkillDependencyType_t::LNGR_SPELL:
9643  affinities.push_back(CorrectTbl::NRA_PHYS);
9644  break;
9645  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL:
9646  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR:
9647  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_CLSR_LNGR:
9648  case SkillDependencyType_t::SPELL_LNGR:
9649  case SkillDependencyType_t::SUPPORT:
9650  affinities.push_back(CorrectTbl::NRA_MAGIC);
9651  break;
9652  case SkillDependencyType_t::NONE:
9653  default:
9654  break;
9655  }
9656 
9657  if(skill.BaseAffinity != effectiveAffinity)
9658  {
9659  affinities.push_back((CorrectTbl)(skill.BaseAffinity + NRA_OFFSET));
9660  }
9661  }
9662  }
9663 
9664  affinities.push_back((CorrectTbl)(effectiveAffinity + NRA_OFFSET));
9665 
9666  // Check NRA chances (absorb in affinity order, reflect in affinity
9667  // order, then null in affinity order)
9668  for(auto nraIdx : { NRA_ABSORB, NRA_REFLECT, NRA_NULL })
9669  {
9670  for(CorrectTbl affinity : affinities)
9671  {
9672  // Consume shields first
9673  if(target.EntityState->GetNRAShield((uint8_t)nraIdx, affinity,
9674  reduceShields))
9675  {
9676  resultAffinity = (uint8_t)((uint8_t)affinity - NRA_OFFSET);
9677  return (uint8_t)nraIdx;
9678  }
9679 
9680  // If no shield exists, check natural chances
9681  int16_t chance = target.EntityState->GetNRAChance((uint8_t)nraIdx,
9682  affinity, target.CalcState);
9683  if(chance >= 100 || (chance > 0 && RNG(int16_t, 1, 100) <= chance))
9684  {
9685  resultAffinity = (uint8_t)((uint8_t)affinity - NRA_OFFSET);
9686  return (uint8_t)nraIdx;
9687  }
9688  }
9689  }
9690 
9691  return 0;
9692 }
9693 
9694 int8_t SkillManager::CalculateStatusEffectStack(int8_t minStack, int8_t maxStack) const
9695 {
9696  // Sanity check
9697  if(minStack > maxStack)
9698  {
9699  return 0;
9700  }
9701 
9702  return minStack == maxStack ? maxStack
9703  : (int8_t)RNG(int16_t, (int16_t)minStack, (int16_t)maxStack);
9704 }
9705 
9706 std::unordered_map<uint8_t, std::list<
9707  std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>>> SkillManager::GetItemDrops(
9708  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& source,
9709  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
9710  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client,
9711  const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone, bool giftMode)
9712 {
9713  std::unordered_map<uint8_t,
9714  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>>> drops;
9715 
9716  auto eBase = eState ? eState->GetEnemyBase() : nullptr;
9717  auto spawn = eBase ? eBase->GetSpawnSource() : nullptr;
9718  if(!spawn)
9719  {
9720  return drops;
9721  }
9722 
9723  auto server = mServer.lock();
9724  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
9725  auto serverDataManager = server->GetServerDataManager();
9726 
9727  // Add specific spawn drops, then drop sets
9728  std::list<uint32_t> dropSetIDs;
9729  std::unordered_map<uint8_t,
9730  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>>> dropsTemp;
9731  if(giftMode)
9732  {
9733  for(auto gift : spawn->GetGifts())
9734  {
9735  dropsTemp[(uint8_t)objects::DropSet::Type_t::NORMAL].push_back(gift);
9736  }
9737 
9738  for(uint32_t giftSetID : spawn->GetGiftSetIDs())
9739  {
9740  dropSetIDs.push_back(giftSetID);
9741  }
9742 
9743  if(spawn->GetInheritDrops())
9744  {
9745  // Add global gifts
9746  auto globalDef = serverDataManager->GetZonePartialData(0);
9747  if(globalDef)
9748  {
9749  for(uint32_t giftSetID : globalDef->GetGiftSetIDs())
9750  {
9751  dropSetIDs.push_back(giftSetID);
9752  }
9753  }
9754 
9755  // Add zone gifts
9756  for(uint32_t giftSetID : zone->GetDefinition()->GetGiftSetIDs())
9757  {
9758  dropSetIDs.push_back(giftSetID);
9759  }
9760  }
9761  }
9762  else
9763  {
9764  for(auto drop : spawn->GetDrops())
9765  {
9766  dropsTemp[(uint8_t)objects::DropSet::Type_t::NORMAL].push_back(drop);
9767  }
9768 
9769  for(uint32_t dropSetID : spawn->GetDropSetIDs())
9770  {
9771  dropSetIDs.push_back(dropSetID);
9772  }
9773 
9774  if(spawn->GetInheritDrops())
9775  {
9776  // Add global drops
9777  auto globalDef = serverDataManager->GetZonePartialData(0);
9778  if(globalDef)
9779  {
9780  for(uint32_t dropSetID : globalDef->GetDropSetIDs())
9781  {
9782  dropSetIDs.push_back(dropSetID);
9783  }
9784  }
9785 
9786  // Add zone drops
9787  for(uint32_t dropSetID : zone->GetDefinition()->GetDropSetIDs())
9788  {
9789  dropSetIDs.push_back(dropSetID);
9790  }
9791  }
9792  }
9793 
9794  // Get drops from drop sets
9795  for(auto dropSet : characterManager->DetermineDropSets(dropSetIDs, zone,
9796  client))
9797  {
9798  uint8_t type = (uint8_t)dropSet->GetType();
9799  for(auto drop : dropSet->GetDrops())
9800  {
9801  dropsTemp[type].push_back(drop);
9802  }
9803  }
9804 
9805  // Now apply special drop definitions
9806  for(auto& pair : dropsTemp)
9807  {
9808  auto type = pair.first;
9809  for(auto drop : pair.second)
9810  {
9811  switch(drop->GetType())
9812  {
9813  case objects::ItemDrop::Type_t::LEVEL_MULTIPLY:
9814  {
9815  // Copy the drop and scale stacks
9816  auto copy = std::make_shared<objects::ItemDrop>(*drop);
9817 
9818  uint16_t min = copy->GetMinStack();
9819  uint16_t max = copy->GetMaxStack();
9820  float multiplier = (float)eState->GetLevel() *
9821  copy->GetModifier();
9822 
9823  copy->SetMinStack((uint16_t)((float)min * multiplier));
9824  copy->SetMaxStack((uint16_t)((float)max * multiplier));
9825 
9826  drops[type].push_back(copy);
9827  }
9828  break;
9829  case objects::ItemDrop::Type_t::RELATIVE_LEVEL_MIN:
9830  // Only add if the (non-source) relative entity's level is
9831  // at least the same as the source's level + the modifier
9832  if(eState != source && (int32_t)eState->GetLevel() >=
9833  (int32_t)(source->GetLevel() + drop->GetModifier()))
9834  {
9835  drops[type].push_back(drop);
9836  }
9837  break;
9838  case objects::ItemDrop::Type_t::NORMAL:
9839  drops[type].push_back(drop);
9840  break;
9841  }
9842  }
9843  }
9844 
9845  return drops;
9846 }
9847 
9848 void SkillManager::ScheduleFreeLoot(uint64_t time, const std::shared_ptr<Zone>& zone,
9849  const std::list<int32_t>& lootEntityIDs, const std::set<int32_t>& worldCIDs)
9850 {
9851  auto server = mServer.lock();
9852  server->ScheduleWork(time, [](CharacterManager* characterManager,
9853  const std::shared_ptr<Zone> pZone, const std::list<int32_t> pLootEntityIDs,
9854  const std::set<int32_t> pWorldCIDs)
9855  {
9856  auto clients = pZone->GetConnectionList();
9857  for(int32_t lootEntityID : pLootEntityIDs)
9858  {
9859  auto lState = pZone->GetLootBox(lootEntityID);
9860  if(lState)
9861  {
9862  lState->GetEntity()->SetValidLooterIDs(pWorldCIDs);
9863  characterManager->SendLootItemData(clients, lState, true);
9864  }
9865  }
9866 
9867  ChannelClientConnection::FlushAllOutgoing(clients);
9868  }, server->GetCharacterManager(), zone, lootEntityIDs, worldCIDs);
9869 }
9870 
9871 void SkillManager::FinalizeSkillExecution(
9872  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client,
9873  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
9874  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated)
9875 {
9876  if(ctx)
9877  {
9878  if(ctx->Executed)
9879  {
9880  // Already executed
9881  return;
9882  }
9883 
9884  ctx->Executed = true;
9885  }
9886 
9887  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
9888  activated->GetSourceEntity());
9889  auto zone = source->GetZone();
9890  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
9891  auto skillData = pSkill->Definition;
9892 
9893  auto server = mServer.lock();
9894  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
9895  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
9896 
9897  // Now pay the costs
9898  int32_t hpCost = activated->GetHPCost();
9899  int32_t mpCost = activated->GetMPCost();
9900  bool hpMpCost = hpCost > 0 || mpCost > 0;
9901  if(hpMpCost)
9902  {
9903  source->SetHPMP((int32_t)-hpCost, (int32_t)-mpCost, true);
9904  }
9905 
9906  if(client)
9907  {
9908  auto state = client->GetClientState();
9909  if(hpMpCost)
9910  {
9911  std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> displayStateModified;
9912  displayStateModified.insert(source);
9913  characterManager->UpdateWorldDisplayState(displayStateModified);
9914 
9915  tokuseiManager->Recalculate(source,
9916  std::set<TokuseiConditionType>
9917  { TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_HP, TokuseiConditionType::CURRENT_MP });
9918  }
9919 
9920  auto itemCosts = activated->GetItemCosts();
9921  uint16_t bulletCost = activated->GetBulletCost();
9922 
9923  int64_t targetItem = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
9924  if(bulletCost > 0)
9925  {
9926  auto character = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity();
9927  auto bullets = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
9928  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_BULLETS);
9929  if(bullets)
9930  {
9931  itemCosts[bullets->GetType()] = (uint32_t)bulletCost;
9932  targetItem = state->GetObjectID(bullets.GetUUID());
9933  }
9934  }
9935 
9936  if(itemCosts.size() > 0)
9937  {
9938  characterManager->AddRemoveItems(client, itemCosts, false, targetItem);
9939  }
9940 
9941  if(pSkill->FunctionID &&
9942  pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_DEMON_FUSION)
9943  {
9944  // Lower the fusion gauge
9945  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
9946  auto fusionData = definitionManager->GetDevilFusionData(
9947  pSkill->SkillID);
9948  if(fusionData)
9949  {
9950  int8_t stockCount = fusionData->GetStockCost();
9951  characterManager->UpdateFusionGauge(client,
9952  (int32_t)(stockCount * -10000), true);
9953  }
9954 
9955  // Unhide the demon
9956  client->GetClientState()->GetDemonState()->SetAIIgnored(false);
9957  }
9958  }
9959 
9960  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
9961  if(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType() ==
9962  objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH)
9963  {
9964  // Move the source to the rush point and bump the execution and hit
9965  // times forward
9966  uint64_t rushExecTime = now;
9967  uint64_t hitTime = activated->GetHitTime();
9968 
9969  Point sourcePoint(source->GetCurrentX(), source->GetCurrentY());
9970  pSkill->RushStartTime = now;
9971  pSkill->RushStartPoint = std::make_shared<Point>(sourcePoint);
9972 
9973  if(pSkill->PrimaryTarget && pSkill->PrimaryTarget != source)
9974  {
9975  // Rush forward to the melee attack distance for 500ms. Use
9976  // destination coordinates instead of current in case they
9977  // are also rushing right now.
9978  Point targetPoint(pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetDestinationX(),
9979  pSkill->PrimaryTarget->GetDestinationY());
9980  float dist = sourcePoint.GetDistance(targetPoint);
9981  if(dist > 200.f)
9982  {
9983  Point rushStart = server->GetZoneManager()->GetLinearPoint(
9984  targetPoint.x, targetPoint.y, sourcePoint.x, sourcePoint.y,
9985  200.f, false, zone);
9986  pSkill->RushStartPoint->x = rushStart.x;
9987  pSkill->RushStartPoint->y = rushStart.y;
9988  }
9989 
9990  uint64_t offset = 500000ULL;
9991  hitTime = (uint64_t)(hitTime + offset);
9992  rushExecTime = (uint64_t)(rushExecTime + offset);
9993  }
9994 
9995  activated->SetHitTime(hitTime);
9996  activated->SetExecutionTime(rushExecTime);
9997 
9998  // Lock out so we can't act before the rush starts
9999  auto dischargeData = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge();
10000  uint32_t stiffness = dischargeData->GetStiffness();
10001 
10002  uint64_t lockOutTime = hitTime + (uint64_t)(stiffness * 1000);
10003  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_LOCKOUT, lockOutTime);
10004  }
10005  else
10006  {
10007  activated->SetExecutionTime(now);
10008  }
10009 
10010  if(skillData->GetBasic()->GetCombatSkill() &&
10011  activated->GetEntityTargeted() && zone)
10012  {
10013  // Start combat if the target exists
10014  auto targetEntityID = (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID();
10015  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity(targetEntityID);
10016  if(target)
10017  {
10018  auto kbData = skillData->GetDamage()->GetKnockBack();
10019  uint8_t kbType = kbData->GetKnockBackType();
10020  if(activated->GetHitTime() && kbType != 2)
10021  {
10022  // Estimate if the attack will cause knockback to indicate
10023  // a "hard strike" animation. Does not guarantee knockback.
10024  float kbRecoverBoost = (float)(tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(
10025  target, TokuseiAspectType::KNOCKBACK_RECOVERY,
10026  target->GetCalculatedState()) * 0.01);
10027  if(target->RefreshKnockback(activated->GetHitTime(),
10028  kbRecoverBoost, false) - kbData->GetModifier() <= 0.f)
10029  {
10030  pSkill->HardStrike = true;
10031  }
10032  }
10033  }
10034  }
10035 
10036  SetSkillCompleteState(pSkill, true);
10037 
10038  // Do not ACTUALLY execute when using Rest
10039  if(pSkill->FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_REST)
10040  {
10041  SendExecuteSkill(pSkill);
10042  }
10043 
10044  if(client && source->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
10045  {
10046  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false, nullptr);
10047  float multiplier = (float)(source->GetCorrectValue(
10048  CorrectTbl::RATE_EXPERTISE, calcState) * 0.01);
10049 
10050  float globalExpertiseBonus = mServer.lock()->GetWorldSharedConfig()
10051  ->GetExpertiseBonus();
10052 
10053  multiplier = multiplier * (float)(1.f + globalExpertiseBonus);
10054 
10055  characterManager->UpdateExpertise(client, pSkill->SkillID,
10056  activated->GetExpertiseBoost(), multiplier);
10057  }
10058 
10059  // Cancel any status effects (not just added) that expire on
10060  // skill execution
10061  auto selfTarget = GetSelfTarget(source, pSkill->Targets, true, false);
10062  std::set<uint32_t> ignore;
10063  if(selfTarget)
10064  {
10065  for(auto& added : selfTarget->AddedStatuses)
10066  {
10067  ignore.insert(added.first);
10068  }
10069  }
10070 
10071  source->CancelStatusEffects(EFFECT_CANCEL_SKILL, ignore);
10072 }
10073 
10074 std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> SkillManager::FinalizeSkill(
10075  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10076  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated)
10077 {
10078  if(ctx)
10079  {
10080  if(ctx->Finalized)
10081  {
10082  // Already finalized
10083  return activated;
10084  }
10085 
10086  ctx->Finalized = true;
10087  }
10088 
10089  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
10090  activated->GetSourceEntity());
10091  auto zone = source->GetZone();
10092  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
10093  auto skillData = pSkill->Definition;
10094 
10095  if(activated->GetExecuteCount() < activated->GetMaxUseCount())
10096  {
10097  // More uses, make a copy and reset values on original
10098  auto copy = std::make_shared<objects::ActivatedAbility>(*activated);
10099 
10100  activated->SetHPCost(0);
10101  activated->SetMPCost(0);
10102  activated->SetBulletCost(0);
10103  activated->ClearItemCosts();
10104 
10105  // Reset times
10106  activated->SetExecutionTime(0);
10107  activated->SetExecutionRequestTime(0);
10108  activated->SetHitTime(0);
10109 
10110  // Proceed with the copy
10111  activated = copy;
10112 
10113  // Reset the upkeep counter
10114  source->ResetUpkeep();
10115  }
10116  else if(pSkill->FunctionID != SVR_CONST.SKILL_REST)
10117  {
10118  // Update the execution count and remove and complete it from the
10119  // entity
10120  if(source->GetActivatedAbility() == activated)
10121  {
10122  source->SetActivatedAbility(nullptr);
10123  source->ResetUpkeep();
10124  }
10125 
10126  SendCompleteSkill(activated, 0);
10127  }
10128 
10129  return activated;
10130 }
10131 
10132 bool SkillManager::SetSkillCompleteState(const std::shared_ptr<
10133  channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill, bool executed)
10134 {
10135  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
10136  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
10137  activated->GetSourceEntity());
10138 
10139  uint64_t currentTime = activated->GetExecutionRequestTime();
10140  if(!currentTime)
10141  {
10142  currentTime = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
10143  }
10144 
10145  uint8_t execCount = activated->GetExecuteCount();
10146  if(executed)
10147  {
10148  execCount = (uint8_t)(execCount + 1);
10149  activated->SetExecuteCount(execCount);
10150  }
10151  else
10152  {
10153  // Skill was cancelled
10154  activated->SetCancelled(true);
10155  }
10156 
10157  bool moreUses = SkillHasMoreUses(activated);
10158 
10159  // If the skill was executed, set lockout time and increase
10160  // the execution count
10161  if(executed)
10162  {
10163  auto dischargeData = pSkill->Definition->GetDischarge();
10164  uint32_t stiffness = dischargeData->GetStiffness();
10165 
10166  uint64_t lockOutTime = currentTime + (uint64_t)(stiffness * 1000);
10167  if(stiffness)
10168  {
10169  if(source->IsMoving())
10170  {
10171  mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager()->FixCurrentPosition(source,
10172  lockOutTime, currentTime);
10173  }
10174 
10175  // Use the longer lockout if one exists (only fix position for
10176  // normal amount)
10177  uint64_t lastLockout = source->GetStatusTimes(STATUS_LOCKOUT);
10178  if(lastLockout > lockOutTime)
10179  {
10180  lockOutTime = lastLockout;
10181  }
10182 
10183  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_LOCKOUT, lockOutTime);
10184  }
10185 
10186  activated->SetLockOutTime(lockOutTime);
10187  }
10188 
10189  // Set the cooldown if no remaining uses are available
10190  uint32_t cdTime = pSkill->Definition->GetCondition()->GetCooldownTime();
10191 
10192  uint64_t cooldownTime = 0;
10193  if(!moreUses || (execCount > 0 && !executed))
10194  {
10195  if(cdTime)
10196  {
10197  // Adjust cooldown time if supported by the skill
10198  if((pSkill->Definition->GetCast()->GetBasic()
10199  ->GetAdjustRestrictions() & SKILL_FIXED_COOLDOWN) == 0)
10200  {
10201  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(source, pSkill, false,
10202  nullptr);
10203 
10204  cdTime = (uint32_t)ceil((double)cdTime *
10205  (source->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::COOLDOWN_TIME,
10206  calcState) * 0.01));
10207  }
10208 
10209  cooldownTime = currentTime + (uint64_t)((double)cdTime * 1000);
10210  }
10211  else
10212  {
10213  cooldownTime = currentTime;
10214  }
10215  }
10216 
10217  activated->SetCooldownTime(cooldownTime);
10218 
10219  if(cooldownTime)
10220  {
10221  source->SetSkillCooldowns(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()
10222  ->GetCooldownID(), cooldownTime);
10223  }
10224  else
10225  {
10226  source->RemoveSkillCooldowns(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()
10227  ->GetCooldownID());
10228  }
10229 
10230  // Auto-cancel skills reset each execution
10231  if(moreUses && execCount > 0 &&
10232  pSkill->Definition->GetCast()->GetCancel()->GetAutoCancelTime())
10233  {
10234  ScheduleAutoCancel(source, activated);
10235  }
10236 
10237  return !executed || !moreUses;
10238 }
10239 
10240 bool SkillManager::SpecialSkill(
10241  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10242  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10243  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10244 {
10245  (void)ctx;
10246  (void)client;
10247 
10248  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10249  ->GetSourceEntity());
10250  if(source->GetSpecialActivations(activated
10251  ->GetActivationID()) == activated)
10252  {
10253  // Clean up the special activation
10254  source->RemoveSpecialActivations(activated->GetActivationID());
10255  }
10256 
10257  activated->SetExecutionTime(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
10258 
10259  return true;
10260 }
10261 
10262 bool SkillManager::Cameo(
10263  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10264  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10265  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10266 {
10267  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10268  ->GetSourceEntity());
10269  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10270 
10271  if(!client)
10272  {
10273  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
10274  return false;
10275  }
10276 
10277  auto state = client->GetClientState();
10278  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
10279  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
10280 
10281  if(!cState->Ready() || !cState->IsAlive())
10282  {
10283  SendFailure(activated, client,
10284  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
10285  return false;
10286  }
10287 
10288  // Drop the durability of the equipped ring by 1000 points,
10289  // fail if we can't
10290  auto item = character->GetEquippedItems(
10291  (size_t)objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_RING).Get();
10292 
10293  auto transformIter = item ? SVR_CONST.CAMEO_MAP.find(item->GetType())
10294  : SVR_CONST.CAMEO_MAP.end();
10295  if(!item || transformIter == SVR_CONST.CAMEO_MAP.end() ||
10296  transformIter->second.size() == 0 || item->GetDurability() < 1000)
10297  {
10298  SendFailure(activated, client,
10299  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ITEM_USE);
10300  return false;
10301  }
10302 
10303  auto server = mServer.lock();
10304  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
10305 
10306  uint32_t effectID = 0;
10307  if(transformIter->second.size() > 1)
10308  {
10309  effectID = libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(transformIter->second);
10310  }
10311  else
10312  {
10313  effectID = transformIter->second.front();
10314  }
10315 
10316  StatusEffectChanges effects;
10317  effects[effectID] = StatusEffectChange(effectID, 1, true);
10318 
10319  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
10320  {
10321  cState->AddStatusEffects(effects, server->GetDefinitionManager());
10322  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
10323  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> {
10324  TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE });
10325 
10326  characterManager->UpdateDurability(client, item, -1000);
10327  }
10328  else
10329  {
10330  SendFailure(activated, client,
10331  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10332  return false;
10333  }
10334 
10335  return true;
10336 }
10337 
10338 bool SkillManager::Cloak(
10339  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
