10340  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10341  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10342 {
10343  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
10344  activated->GetSourceEntity());
10345  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10346 
10347  if(!source->Ready() || !source->IsAlive())
10348  {
10349  SendFailure(activated, client,
10350  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10351  return false;
10352  }
10353 
10354  // Check game time
10355  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
10356  auto worldClock = mServer.lock()->GetWorldClockTime();
10357  int32_t gameTime = (int32_t)((worldClock.Hour * 100) + worldClock.Min);
10358 
10359  auto special = skillData->GetSpecial();
10360  int32_t after = special->GetSpecialParams(0);
10361  int32_t before = special->GetSpecialParams(1);
10362 
10363  bool rollover = before < after;
10364  if((!rollover && (gameTime < after || gameTime > before)) ||
10365  (rollover && (gameTime < after && gameTime > before)))
10366  {
10367  SendFailure(activated, client,
10368  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TIME_RESTRICT);
10369  return false;
10370  }
10371 
10372  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
10373  {
10374  return true;
10375  }
10376  else
10377  {
10378  SendFailure(activated, client,
10379  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10380  return false;
10381  }
10382 }
10383 
10384 bool SkillManager::DCM(
10385  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10386  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10387  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10388 {
10389  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10390  ->GetSourceEntity());
10391  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10392 
10393  if(!client)
10394  {
10395  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
10396  return false;
10397  }
10398 
10399  auto state = client->GetClientState();
10400  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
10401  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
10402  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
10403  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
10404  auto demonData = dState->GetDevilData();
10405 
10406  if(!demon || !demonData)
10407  {
10408  SendFailure(activated, client,
10409  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
10410  return false;
10411  }
10412 
10413  if(!dState->IsAlive())
10414  {
10415  SendFailure(activated, client,
10416  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
10417  return false;
10418  }
10419 
10420  auto server = mServer.lock();
10421  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
10422  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
10423 
10424  auto bookData = definitionManager->GetDevilBookData(demon->GetType());
10425  if(!bookData ||(!CharacterManager::HasValuable(character,
10426  SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_DEVIL_BOOK_V1) &&
10427  !CharacterManager::HasValuable(character,
10428  SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_DEVIL_BOOK_V2)))
10429  {
10430  SendFailure(activated, client,
10431  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10432  return false;
10433  }
10434 
10435  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
10436  {
10437  auto worldData = state->GetAccountWorldData().Get();
10438 
10439  size_t index;
10440  uint8_t shiftVal;
10441  CharacterManager::ConvertIDToMaskValues(
10442  (uint16_t)bookData->GetShiftValue(), index, shiftVal);
10443 
10444  uint8_t currentVal = worldData->GetDevilBook(index);
10445  uint8_t newVal = (uint8_t)(currentVal | shiftVal);
10446 
10447  if(newVal != currentVal)
10448  {
10449  worldData->SetDevilBook(index, newVal);
10450 
10451  libcomp::Packet reply;
10452  reply.WritePacketCode(
10453  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DEMON_COMPENDIUM_ADD);
10454  reply.WriteS32Little(0); // Success
10455  reply.WriteU32Little(bookData->GetShiftValue());
10456 
10457  client->QueuePacket(reply);
10458 
10459  if(dState->UpdateSharedState(character, definitionManager))
10460  {
10461  // If this resulted in an update, recalculate tokusei
10462  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true,
10463  std::set<int32_t>{ dState->GetEntityID() });
10464  }
10465 
10466  // Always recalculate stats
10467  characterManager->RecalculateStats(dState, client);
10468 
10469  client->FlushOutgoing();
10470 
10471  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(worldData,
10472  state->GetAccountUID());
10473  }
10474 
10475  return true;
10476  }
10477  else
10478  {
10479  SendFailure(activated, client,
10480  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10481  return false;
10482  }
10483 }
10484 
10485 bool SkillManager::Despawn(
10486  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10487  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10488  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10489 {
10490  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10491  ->GetSourceEntity());
10492  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10493 
10494  auto zone = source->GetZone();
10495  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx) && zone)
10496  {
10497  switch(source->GetEntityType())
10498  {
10499  case EntityType_t::ALLY:
10500  case EntityType_t::ENEMY:
10501  zone->MarkDespawn(source->GetEntityID());
10502  break;
10503  default:
10504  break;
10505  }
10506  }
10507 
10508  return true;
10509 }
10510 
10511 bool SkillManager::Desummon(
10512  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10513  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10514  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10515 {
10516  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10517  ->GetSourceEntity());
10518  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10519 
10520  auto zone = source->GetZone();
10521  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx) && zone)
10522  {
10523  auto target = zone->GetActiveEntity((int32_t)activated
10524  ->GetTargetObjectID());
10525  if(target)
10526  {
10527  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> encounterGroups;
10528 
10529  auto eBase = target->GetEnemyBase();
10530  if(eBase && eBase->GetEncounterID())
10531  {
10532  encounterGroups[eBase->GetEncounterID()] = eBase
10533  ->GetSpawnGroupID();
10534  }
10535 
10536  LogSkillManagerDebug([source, target]()
10537  {
10538  return libcomp::String("%1 desummons %2.\n")
10539  .Arg(source->GetEntityLabel())
10540  .Arg(target->GetEntityLabel());
10541  });
10542 
10543  auto state = client ? client->GetClientState() : nullptr;
10544  switch(target->GetEntityType())
10545  {
10546  case EntityType_t::ALLY:
10547  case EntityType_t::ENEMY:
10548  // Non-players and GMs can despawn any enemy/ally
10549  if(!state || state->GetUserLevel() > 0)
10550  {
10551  zone->MarkDespawn(target->GetEntityID());
10552  }
10553  break;
10554  case EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON:
10555  // Desummon's partner demons for valid players
10556  {
10557  auto server = mServer.lock();
10558  auto targetClient = server->GetManagerConnection()
10559  ->GetEntityClient(target->GetEntityID());
10560  if(targetClient)
10561  {
10562  server->GetCharacterManager()->StoreDemon(
10563  targetClient);
10564  }
10565  }
10566  break;
10567  default:
10568  break;
10569  }
10570  }
10571  }
10572 
10573  return true;
10574 }
10575 
10576 bool SkillManager::Digitalize(
10577  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10578  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10579  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10580 {
10581  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10582  ->GetSourceEntity());
10583  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10584 
10585  if(!client)
10586  {
10587  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
10588  return false;
10589  }
10590 
10591  auto state = client->GetClientState();
10592  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
10593  auto demonID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
10594  auto demon = demonID > 0 ? std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
10595  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state
10596  ->GetObjectUUID(demonID))) : nullptr;
10597  if(!demon)
10598  {
10599  SendFailure(activated, client,
10600  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
10601  return false;
10602  }
10603 
10604  uint8_t dgAbility = cState->GetDigitalizeAbilityLevel();
10605  if(dgAbility == 0)
10606  {
10607  // Digitalize not enabled
10608  SendFailure(activated, client,
10609  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10610  return false;
10611  }
10612 
10613  auto server = mServer.lock();
10614  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
10615 
10616  auto demonData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demon->GetType());
10617  if(CharacterManager::IsMitamaDemon(demonData) && dgAbility < 2)
10618  {
10619  // Mitama demon not valid
10620  SendFailure(activated, client,
10621  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10622  return false;
10623  }
10624 
10625  // If the demon ID or base ID are enabled, the
10626  std::set<uint32_t> demonIDs;
10627  demonIDs.insert(demonData->GetBasic()->GetID());
10628  demonIDs.insert(demonData->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID());
10629 
10630  uint8_t raceID = (uint8_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace();
10631 
10632  bool valid = false;
10633  auto levelData = definitionManager->GetGuardianLevelData(raceID);
10634  auto progress = cState->GetEntity()->GetProgress().Get();
10635  if(levelData)
10636  {
10637  uint8_t lvl = (uint8_t)(progress
10638  ? progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(raceID) : 0);
10639  for(uint8_t i = 1; i <= lvl; i++)
10640  {
10641  for(uint32_t dID : levelData->GetLevels(i)->GetDemonIDs())
10642  {
10643  if(demonIDs.find(dID) != demonIDs.end())
10644  {
10645  valid = true;
10646  break;
10647  }
10648  }
10649  }
10650  }
10651 
10652  if(!valid)
10653  {
10654  // Not found yet, check special unlocks
10655  for(uint32_t dID : demonIDs)
10656  {
10657  auto specialData = definitionManager->GetGuardianSpecialData(
10658  dID);
10659  if(specialData)
10660  {
10661  auto reqs = specialData->GetRequirements();
10662  for(size_t i = 0; i < reqs.size(); )
10663  {
10664  uint8_t rID = reqs[i];
10665  if(rID > 0)
10666  {
10667  uint8_t val = reqs[(size_t)(i + 1)];
10668  uint8_t lvl = (uint8_t)(progress
10669  ? progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(rID) : 0);
10670  if(val <= lvl)
10671  {
10672  valid = true;
10673  break;
10674  }
10675 
10676  i += 2;
10677  }
10678  }
10679  }
10680  }
10681  }
10682 
10683  if(!valid)
10684  {
10685  SendFailure(activated, client,
10686  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
10687  return false;
10688  }
10689 
10690  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx) ||
10691  !server->GetCharacterManager()->DigitalizeStart(client, demon))
10692  {
10693  SendFailure(activated, client,
10694  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10695  return false;
10696  }
10697 
10698  return true;
10699 }
10700 
10701 bool SkillManager::DigitalizeBreak(
10702  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10703  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10704  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10705 {
10706  (void)client;
10707 
10708  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10709  ->GetSourceEntity());
10710  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
10711 
10712  auto server = mServer.lock();
10713  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
10714  auto managerConnection = server->GetManagerConnection();
10715  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
10716  {
10717  if(target.EntityState != source && !target.HitAbsorb &&
10718  !target.HitAvoided &&
10719  target.EntityState->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::CHARACTER)
10720  {
10721  auto targetClient = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(
10722  target.EntityState->GetEntityID());
10723  characterManager->DigitalizeEnd(targetClient);
10724  }
10725  }
10726 
10727  return true;
10728 }
10729 
10730 bool SkillManager::DigitalizeCancel(
10731  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10732  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10733  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10734 {
10735  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10736  ->GetSourceEntity());
10737  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10738 
10739  if(!client)
10740  {
10741  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
10742  return false;
10743  }
10744 
10745  auto state = client->GetClientState();
10746  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
10747  if(cState->GetDigitalizeState() && ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
10748  {
10749  if(!mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->DigitalizeEnd(client))
10750  {
10751  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
10752  {
10753  return libcomp::String("Digitalize cancellation failed: %1\n")
10754  .Arg(state->GetAccountUID().ToString());
10755  });
10756  }
10757  }
10758  else
10759  {
10760  SendFailure(activated, client,
10761  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10762  return false;
10763  }
10764 
10765  return true;
10766 }
10767 
10768 bool SkillManager::DirectStatus(
10769  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10770  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10771  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10772 {
10773  (void)client;
10774 
10775  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10776  ->GetSourceEntity());
10777  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
10778 
10779  auto server = mServer.lock();
10780  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
10781 
10782  auto skillData = pSkill->Definition;
10783  uint16_t functionID = pSkill->FunctionID;
10784 
10785  bool limited = functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_STATUS_LIMITED;
10786  StatusEffectChanges effects;
10787 
10788  for(int32_t param : skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams())
10789  {
10790  if(param > 0)
10791  {
10792  uint32_t effectID = (uint32_t)param;
10793 
10794  int8_t stackSize = 1;
10795  if(!limited)
10796  {
10797  // Add 30% of max stack
10798  auto statusData = definitionManager->GetStatusData(effectID);
10799  uint8_t maxStack = statusData->GetBasic()->GetMaxStack();
10800  stackSize = (int8_t)ceil((float)maxStack / 30.f);
10801  }
10802 
10803  effects[effectID] = StatusEffectChange(effectID, stackSize, false);
10804  }
10805  }
10806 
10807  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> entities;
10808  if(limited)
10809  {
10810  // Source gains status effects
10811  entities.push_back(source);
10812  }
10813  else
10814  {
10815  // All living targets gain the status effects
10816  for(auto& target : pSkill->Targets)
10817  {
10818  if(target.EntityState != source &&
10819  target.EntityState->IsAlive())
10820  {
10821  entities.push_back(target.EntityState);
10822  }
10823  }
10824  }
10825 
10826  for(auto entity : entities)
10827  {
10828  entity->AddStatusEffects(effects, definitionManager);
10829  }
10830 
10831  return true;
10832 }
10833 
10834 bool SkillManager::EquipItem(
10835  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10836  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10837  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10838 {
10839  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10840  ->GetSourceEntity());
10841  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10842 
10843  if(!client)
10844  {
10845  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
10846  return false;
10847  }
10848 
10849  auto itemID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
10850  if(itemID <= 0)
10851  {
10852  SendFailure(activated, client, (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
10853  return false;
10854  }
10855 
10856  // Skip finalization for now so post equip effects are communicated
10857  // in packets
10858  ctx->Finalized = true;
10859 
10860  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
10861  {
10862  SendFailure(activated, client,
10863  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
10864  return false;
10865  }
10866 
10867  mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->EquipItem(client, itemID);
10868 
10869  // Finalize now that it all succeeded
10870  ctx->Finalized = false;
10871  FinalizeSkill(ctx, activated);
10872 
10873  return true;
10874 }
10875 
10876 bool SkillManager::Estoma(
10877  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10878  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10879  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10880 {
10881  (void)client;
10882 
10883  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10884  ->GetSourceEntity());
10885  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
10886 
10887  auto server = mServer.lock();
10888  auto aiManager = server->GetAIManager();
10889  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
10890 
10891  const static bool chargeIgnore = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
10892  ->GetAIEstomaChargeIgnore();
10893  const static auto duration = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
10894  ->GetAIEstomaDuration();
10895 
10896  uint64_t waitTime = (uint64_t)(server->GetServerTime() +
10897  ((uint64_t)duration * 1000000ULL));
10898 
10899  for(SkillTargetResult& target : pSkill->Targets)
10900  {
10901  auto eState = target.EntityState;
10902  auto aiState = eState->GetAIState();
10903  auto targetSkill = eState->GetActivatedAbility();
10904  if(aiState && !aiState->GetIgnoreEstoma() &&
10905  (!chargeIgnore || !targetSkill ||
10906  targetSkill->GetActivationObjectID() != source->GetEntityID()))
10907  {
10908  eState->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_RESTING, waitTime);
10909 
10910  for(int32_t opponentID : eState->GetOpponentIDs())
10911  {
10912  auto other = pSkill->CurrentZone->GetActiveEntity(opponentID);
10913  if(other)
10914  {
10915  characterManager->AddRemoveOpponent(false,
10916  eState, other);
10917  }
10918  }
10919 
10920  aiManager->UpdateAggro(target.EntityState, -1);
10921 
10922  // Cancel skill if one is active and not currently executing
10923  if(targetSkill && !targetSkill->GetExecutionRequestTime())
10924  {
10925  CancelSkill(eState, targetSkill->GetActivationID());
10926  }
10927  }
10928  }
10929 
10930  ctx->ApplyAggro = false;
10931 
10932  return true;
10933 }
10934 
10935 bool SkillManager::FamiliarityUp(
10936  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
10937  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
10938  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
10939 {
10940  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
10941  ->GetSourceEntity());
10942  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
10943 
10944  if(!client)
10945  {
10946  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
10947  return false;
10948  }
10949 
10950  auto state = client->GetClientState();
10951  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
10952  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
10953  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
10954  auto demonData = dState->GetDevilData();
10955 
10956  if(!demon || !demonData)
10957  {
10958  SendFailure(activated, client,
10959  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
10960  return false;
10961  }
10962 
10963  if(!dState->IsAlive())
10964  {
10965  SendFailure(activated, client,
10966  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
10967  return false;
10968  }
10969 
10970  auto server = mServer.lock();
10971  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
10972  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
10973  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
10974 
10975  // Present is retrieved after updating the familiarity for an update but
10976  // the skill errors if any present will be given based on the starting
10977  // familiarity level and there is no inventory space open
10978  int8_t rarity;
10979  uint16_t currentVal = demon->GetFamiliarity();
10980  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(currentVal) >= 3 &&
10981  characterManager->GetDemonPresent(demon->GetType(),
10982  demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel(), MAX_FAMILIARITY, rarity) != 0 &&
10983  characterManager->GetFreeSlots(client).size() == 0)
10984  {
10985  SendFailure(activated, client,
10986  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::INVENTORY_SPACE);
10987  return false;
10988  }
10989 
10990  // Skills of this type add a "cooldown status effect". If the player
10991  // character already has it, do not allow the skill's usage
10992  auto statusEffects = cState->GetStatusEffects();
10993  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
10994  {
10995  if(statusEffects.find(addStatus->GetStatusID()) != statusEffects.end())
10996  {
10997  SendFailure(activated, client,
10998  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
10999  return false;
11000  }
11001  }
11002 
11003  auto fType = server->GetServerDataManager()->GetDemonFamiliarityTypeData(
11004  demonData->GetFamiliarity()->GetFamiliarityType());
11005  if(!fType)
11006  {
11007  SendFailure(activated, client, (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
11008  return false;
11009  }
11010 
11011  // Process the skill without status effects
11012  ctx->ApplyStatusEffects = false;
11013  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11014  {
11015  SendFailure(activated, client,
11016  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11017  return false;
11018  }
11019 
11020  // Familiarity is adjusted based on the demon's familiarity type
11021  // and if it shares the same alignment with the character
11022  bool sameLNC = cState->GetLNCType() == dState->GetLNCType();
11023 
11024  int32_t fPoints = (int32_t)(sameLNC
11025  ? fType->GetBoostSkillLNCMatch() : fType->GetBoostSkill());
11026  characterManager->UpdateFamiliarity(client, fPoints, true);
11027 
11028  // Apply the status effects
11029  StatusEffectChanges effects;
11030  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
11031  {
11032  int8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(addStatus->GetMinStack(),
11033  addStatus->GetMaxStack());
11034  if(stack == 0 && !addStatus->GetIsReplace()) continue;
11035 
11036  effects[addStatus->GetStatusID()] = StatusEffectChange(
11037  addStatus->GetStatusID(), stack, addStatus->GetIsReplace());
11038  }
11039 
11040  if(effects.size() > 0)
11041  {
11042  cState->AddStatusEffects(effects, definitionManager);
11043  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
11044  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> { TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE });
11045  }
11046 
11047  // Re-pull the present type and give it to the character
11048  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(demon->GetFamiliarity()) >= 3)
11049  {
11050  uint32_t presentType = characterManager->GetDemonPresent(demon->GetType(),
11051  demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel(), demon->GetFamiliarity(), rarity);
11052  GiveDemonPresent(client, demon->GetType(), presentType, rarity,
11053  skillData->GetCommon()->GetID());
11054  }
11055 
11056  return true;
11057 }
11058 
11059 bool SkillManager::FamiliarityUpItem(
11060  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11061  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11062  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11063 {
11064  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11065  ->GetSourceEntity());
11066  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11067 
11068  if(!client)
11069  {
11070  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
11071  return false;
11072  }
11073 
11074  auto state = client->GetClientState();
11075  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
11076  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
11077  auto demonData = dState->GetDevilData();
11078 
11079  if(!demon || !demonData)
11080  {
11081  SendFailure(activated, client,
11082  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
11083  return false;
11084  }
11085 
11086  if(!dState->IsAlive())
11087  {
11088  SendFailure(activated, client,
11089  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
11090  return false;
11091  }
11092 
11093  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11094  auto special = skillData->GetSpecial();
11095 
11096  int32_t maxFamiliarity = special->GetSpecialParams(0);
11097  float deltaPercent = (float)special->GetSpecialParams(1);
11098  int32_t minIncrease = special->GetSpecialParams(2);
11099  int32_t raceRestrict = special->GetSpecialParams(3);
11100 
11101  if(raceRestrict &&
11102  (int32_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace() != raceRestrict)
11103  {
11104  SendFailure(activated, client,
11105  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_INCOMPATIBLE);
11106  return false;
11107  }
11108 
11109  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11110  {
11111  SendFailure(activated, client,
11112  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11113  return false;
11114  }
11115 
11116  uint16_t currentVal = demon->GetFamiliarity();
11117  if(maxFamiliarity > (int32_t)currentVal)
11118  {
11119  int32_t fPoints = 0;
11120  if(maxFamiliarity && deltaPercent)
11121  {
11122  fPoints = (int32_t)ceill(
11123  floorl((float)(maxFamiliarity - currentVal) *
11124  deltaPercent * 0.01f) - 1);
11125  }
11126 
11127  if(minIncrease && fPoints < minIncrease)
11128  {
11129  fPoints = minIncrease;
11130  }
11131 
11132  mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->UpdateFamiliarity(client,
11133  fPoints, true);
11134  }
11135 
11136  return true;
11137 }
11138 
11139 bool SkillManager::ForgetAllExpertiseSkills(
11140  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11141  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11142  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11143 {
11144  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11145  ->GetSourceEntity());
11146  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11147 
11148  if(!client)
11149  {
11150  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
11151  return false;
11152  }
11153 
11154  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11155  {
11156  SendFailure(activated, client,
11157  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11158  return false;
11159  }
11160 
11161  auto state = client->GetClientState();
11162  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
11163  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
11164 
11165  auto server = mServer.lock();
11166  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
11167 
11168  std::set<uint32_t> learnedSkills = character->GetLearnedSkills();
11169 
11170  auto defaultObjs = server->GetDefaultCharacterObjectMap();
11171 
11172  std::set<uint32_t> keepSkills;
11173  for(auto defaultCharObj : defaultObjs["Character"])
11174  {
11175  auto defaultChar = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<
11176  objects::Character>(defaultCharObj);
11177  for(uint32_t keepSkill : defaultChar->GetLearnedSkills())
11178  {
11179  keepSkills.insert(keepSkill);
11180  }
11181  }
11182 
11183  uint32_t maxExpertise = (uint32_t)(EXPERTISE_COUNT + CHAIN_EXPERTISE_COUNT);
11184  for(uint32_t i = 0; i < maxExpertise; i++)
11185  {
11186  auto expertData = definitionManager->GetExpertClassData(i);
11187  if(expertData)
11188  {
11189  for(auto classData : expertData->GetClassData())
11190  {
11191  for(auto rankData : classData->GetRankData())
11192  {
11193  for(uint32_t skillID : rankData->GetSkill())
11194  {
11195  if(skillID && keepSkills.find(skillID) == keepSkills.end())
11196  {
11197  learnedSkills.erase(skillID);
11198  }
11199  }
11200  }
11201  }
11202  }
11203  }
11204 
11205  character->SetLearnedSkills(learnedSkills);
11206 
11207  cState->RecalcDisabledSkills(definitionManager);
11208  state->GetDemonState()->UpdateDemonState(definitionManager);
11209  server->GetCharacterManager()->RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
11210 
11211  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(character, state->GetAccountUID());
11212 
11213  return true;
11214 }
11215 
11216 bool SkillManager::Liberama(
11217  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11218  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11219  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11220 {
11221  (void)client;
11222 
11223  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11224  ->GetSourceEntity());
11225  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
11226 
11227  auto aiManager = mServer.lock()->GetAIManager();
11228  for(SkillTargetResult& target : pSkill->Targets)
11229  {
11230  auto aiState = target.EntityState->GetAIState();
11231  if(aiState)
11232  {
11233  aiManager->UpdateAggro(target.EntityState, source
11234  ->GetEntityID());
11235  }
11236  }
11237 
11238  ctx->ApplyAggro = false;
11239 
11240  return true;
11241 }
11242 
11243 bool SkillManager::MinionDespawn(
11244  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11245  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11246  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11247 {
11248  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11249  ->GetSourceEntity());
11250  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11251 
11252  auto zone = source->GetZone();
11253  if(!zone)
11254  {
11255  SendFailure(activated, client,
11256  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
11257  return false;
11258  }
11259 
11260  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11261  auto params = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
11262 
11263  auto zoneDef = zone->GetDefinition();
11264  if(zoneDef->GetID() != (uint32_t)params[0])
11265  {
11266  // Restricted to specific zone
11267  SendFailure(activated, client,
11268  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::NOTHING_HAPPENED_HERE);
11269  return false;
11270  }
11271 
11272  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11273  {
11274  for(auto eState : zone->GetEnemiesAndAllies(true))
11275  {
11276  auto eBase = eState->GetEnemyBase();
11277  if(eBase->GetSummonerID() == source->GetEntityID() &&
11278  eBase->GetSpawnLocationGroupID() == (uint32_t)params[1])
11279  {
11280  zone->MarkDespawn(eState->GetEntityID());
11281  }
11282  }
11283  }
11284 
11285  return true;
11286 }
11287 
11288 bool SkillManager::MinionSpawn(
11289  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11290  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11291  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11292 {
11293  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11294  ->GetSourceEntity());
11295  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11296 
11297  auto zone = source->GetZone();
11298  if(!zone)
11299  {
11300  SendFailure(activated, client,
11301  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
11302  return false;
11303  }
11304 
11305  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11306  auto params = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
11307 
11308  // Pull the spawn location group information from the current zone
11309  auto zoneDef = zone->GetDefinition();
11310  if(zoneDef->GetID() != (uint32_t)params[0])
11311  {
11312  // Restricted to specific zone
11313  SendFailure(activated, client,
11314  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::NOTHING_HAPPENED_HERE);
11315  return false;
11316  }
11317 
11318  auto slg = zoneDef->GetSpawnLocationGroups((uint32_t)params[1]);
11319  if(!slg)
11320  {
11321  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
11322  {
11323  return libcomp::String("Failed to use MinionSpawn skill from"
11324  " invalid SpawnLocationGroup: %1\n").Arg(params[1]);
11325  });
11326 
11327  SendFailure(activated, client,
11328  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
11329  return false;
11330  }
11331 
11332  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11333  {
11334  auto server = mServer.lock();
11335  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
11336 
11337  uint32_t sgID = libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(slg->GetGroupIDs());
11338 
11339  auto spawnGroup = zoneDef->GetSpawnGroups(sgID);
11340  if(!spawnGroup)
11341  {
11342  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
11343  {
11344  return libcomp::String("Invalid spawn group ID for MinionSpawn"
11345  " skill: %1\n").Arg(sgID);
11346  });
11347 
11348  return false;
11349  }
11350 
11351  // Pick one spot ID (default to source spot if its one of them)
11352  uint32_t sourceSpotID = source && source->GetEnemyBase()
11353  ? source->GetEnemyBase()->GetSpawnSpotID() : 0;
11354  uint32_t spotID = sourceSpotID && slg->SpotIDsContains(sourceSpotID)
11355  ? sourceSpotID : libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(slg->GetSpotIDs());
11356 
11357  // If no spot currently selected, default to the summoner's spot
11358  // regardless
11359  if(!spotID)
11360  {
11361  spotID = sourceSpotID;
11362  }
11363 
11364  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> enemies;
11365  for(auto& spawnPair : spawnGroup->GetSpawns())
11366  {
11367  auto spawn = zoneDef->GetSpawns(spawnPair.first);
11368  if(!spawn)
11369  {
11370  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
11371  {
11372  return libcomp::String("Invalid spawn ID for MinionSpawn"
11373  " skill: %1\n").Arg(spawnPair.first);
11374  });
11375 
11376  continue;
11377  }
11378 
11379  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < spawnPair.second; i++)
11380  {
11381  auto enemy = zoneManager->CreateEnemy(zone, spawn
11382  ->GetEnemyType(), spawn->GetID(), spotID, 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
11383  if(enemy)
11384  {
11385  auto eBase = enemy->GetEnemyBase();
11386  eBase->SetSpawnGroupID(sgID);
11387  eBase->SetSpawnLocationGroupID(slg->GetID());
11388  eBase->SetSummonerID(source->GetEntityID());
11389  enemies.push_back(enemy);
11390 
11391  auto sourceBase = source->GetEnemyBase();
11392  if(sourceBase)
11393  {
11394  sourceBase->InsertMinionIDs(enemy->GetEntityID());
11395  }
11396  }
11397  else
11398  {
11399  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
11400  {
11401  return libcomp::String("Failed to create enemy for"
11402  " MinionSpawn skill: %1\n").Arg(spawnPair.first);
11403  });
11404  }
11405  }
11406  }
11407 
11408  auto defeatActions = spawnGroup->GetDefeatActions();
11409  zoneManager->AddEnemiesToZone(enemies, zone, true, true,
11410  defeatActions);
11411 
11412  if(spawnGroup->SpawnActionsCount() > 0)
11413  {
11414  ActionOptions options;
11415  options.GroupID = spawnGroup->GetID();
11416 
11417  server->GetActionManager()->PerformActions(nullptr,
11418  spawnGroup->GetSpawnActions(), 0, zone, options);
11419  }
11420  }
11421 
11422  return true;
11423 }
11424 
11425 bool SkillManager::Mooch(
11426  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11427  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11428  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11429 {
11430  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11431  ->GetSourceEntity());
11432  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11433 
11434  if(!client)
11435  {
11436  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
11437  return false;
11438  }
11439 
11440  auto state = client->GetClientState();
11441  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
11442  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
11443  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
11444 
11445  if(!demon)
11446  {
11447  SendFailure(activated, client,
11448  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
11449  return false;
11450  }
11451 
11452  if(!dState->IsAlive())
11453  {
11454  SendFailure(activated, client,
11455  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
11456  return false;
11457  }
11458 
11459  auto server = mServer.lock();
11460  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
11461  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
11462  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11463 
11464  if(characterManager->GetFamiliarityRank(demon->GetFamiliarity()) < 3)
11465  {
11466  SendFailure(activated, client,
11467  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOOCH_PARTNER_FAMILIARITY);
11468  return false;
11469  }
11470 
11471  // Present is retrieved prior to updating the familiarity for a drop
11472  int8_t rarity;
11473  uint16_t familiarity = demon->GetFamiliarity();
11474  uint32_t presentType = characterManager->GetDemonPresent(demon->GetType(),
11475  demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel(), familiarity, rarity);
11476 
11477  // If a present will be given and there are no free slots, error the skill
11478  if(presentType == 0)
11479  {
11480  SendFailure(activated, client,
11481  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11482  return false;
11483  }
11484  else if(characterManager->GetFreeSlots(client).size() == 0)
11485  {
11486  SendFailure(activated, client,
11487  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::INVENTORY_SPACE);
11488  return false;
11489  }
11490 
11491  // Skills of this type add a "cooldown status effect". If the player character
11492  // already has it, do not allow the skill's usage
11493  auto statusEffects = cState->GetStatusEffects();
11494  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
11495  {
11496  if(statusEffects.find(addStatus->GetStatusID()) != statusEffects.end())
11497  {
11498  SendFailure(activated, client,
11499  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11500  return false;
11501  }
11502  }
11503 
11504  // Process the skill without status effects
11505  ctx->ApplyStatusEffects = false;
11506  if(!ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11507  {
11508  SendFailure(activated, client,
11509  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11510  return false;
11511  }
11512 
11513  server->GetCharacterManager()->UpdateFamiliarity(client, -2000, true);
11514 
11515  // Apply the status effects
11516  StatusEffectChanges effects;
11517  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
11518  {
11519  int8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(addStatus->GetMinStack(),
11520  addStatus->GetMaxStack());
11521  if(stack == 0 && !addStatus->GetIsReplace()) continue;
11522 
11523  effects[addStatus->GetStatusID()] = StatusEffectChange(
11524  addStatus->GetStatusID(), stack, addStatus->GetIsReplace());
11525  }
11526 
11527  if(effects.size() > 0)
11528  {
11529  cState->AddStatusEffects(effects, definitionManager);
11530  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
11531  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> { TokuseiConditionType::STATUS_ACTIVE });
11532  }
11533 
11534  GiveDemonPresent(client, demon->GetType(), presentType, rarity,
11535  skillData->GetCommon()->GetID());
11536 
11537  return true;
11538 }
11539 
11540 bool SkillManager::Mount(
11541  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11542  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11543  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11544 {
11545  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
11546  activated->GetSourceEntity());
11547  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11548 
11549  if(!client)
11550  {
11551  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
11552  return false;
11553  }
11554 
11555  auto state = client->GetClientState();
11556  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
11557  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
11558  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
11559 
11560  if(cState != source || !cState->Ready() || !cState->IsAlive())
11561  {
11562  SendFailure(activated, client,
11563  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11564  return false;
11565  }
11566 
11567  // The mount status effects are bound to tokusei with no expiration.
11568  // If either status effect exists on the character, this is actually
11569  // a request to end the mount state.
11570 
11571  auto server = mServer.lock();
11572  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
11573 
11574  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11575  uint32_t skillID = skillData->GetCommon()->GetID();
11576 
11577  bool end = false;
11578  if(cState->StatusEffectActive(SVR_CONST.STATUS_MOUNT) ||
11579  cState->StatusEffectActive(SVR_CONST.STATUS_MOUNT_SUPER))
11580  {
11581  // Ending mount
11582  // Very lax validations here so the player can't get stuck in
11583  // the mounted state
11584  end = true;
11585  }
11586  else
11587  {
11588  // Starting mount
11589  // Check the demon's basic state
11590  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
11591  if(!demon)
11592  {
11593  SendFailure(activated, client,
11594  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
11595  return false;
11596  }
11597  else if(!dState->IsAlive())
11598  {
11599  SendFailure(activated, client,
11600  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_DEAD);
11601  return false;
11602  }
11603 
11604  // Make sure mounts are allowed in the zone
11605  auto zone = cState->GetZone();
11606  if(!zone || zone->GetDefinition()->GetMountDisabled())
11607  {
11608  SendFailure(activated, client,
11609  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::LOCATION_RESTRICT);
11610  return false;
11611  }
11612 
11613  // Check action restrictions
11614  uint64_t now = ChannelServer::GetServerTime();
11615  cState->ExpireStatusTimes(now);
11616  dState->ExpireStatusTimes(now);
11617 
11618  cState->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
11619  dState->RefreshCurrentPosition(now);
11620 
11621  if(!cState->CanMove(true))
11622  {
11623  SendFailure(activated, client,
11624  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_MOVE_RESTRICT);
11625  return false;
11626  }
11627  else if(!dState->CanMove())
11628  {
11629  SendFailure(activated, client,
11630  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_DEMON_CONDITION);
11631  return false;
11632  }
11633  else if(cState->GetDistance(dState->GetCurrentX(),
11634  dState->GetCurrentY(), true) > 250000.f)
11635  {
11636  // Distance is greater than 500 units (squared)
11637  SendFailure(activated, client,
11638  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_TOO_FAR);
11639  return false;
11640  }
11641 
11642  // Match the demon to the mount skill and item
11643  std::set<uint32_t> validDemons;
11644  for(int32_t demonType : skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams())
11645  {
11646  validDemons.insert((uint32_t)demonType);
11647  }
11648 
11649  auto ring = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)
11650  objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_RING).Get();
11651  bool ringValid = false;
11652  if(ring)
11653  {
11654  // Make sure the tokusei adds the skill. These items should not
11655  // have SI available but check properly just in case
11656  uint32_t specialEffect = ring->GetSpecialEffect();
11657  for(int32_t tokuseiID : definitionManager->GetSItemTokusei(
11658  specialEffect ? specialEffect : ring->GetType()))
11659  {
11660  auto tokusei = definitionManager->GetTokuseiData(tokuseiID);
11661  for(auto aspect : tokusei->GetAspects())
11662  {
11663  if(aspect->GetType() == TokuseiAspectType::SKILL_ADD &&
11664  (uint32_t)aspect->GetValue() == skillID)
11665  {
11666  ringValid = true;
11667  break;
11668  }
11669  }
11670  }
11671  }
11672 
11673  if(!ringValid)
11674  {
11675  SendFailure(activated, client,
11676  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_ITEM_MISSING);
11677  return false;
11678  }
11679  else if(ring->GetDurability() == 0)
11680  {
11681  SendFailure(activated, client,
11682  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_ITEM_DURABILITY);
11683  return false;
11684  }
11685  else if(validDemons.find(demon->GetType()) == validDemons.end())
11686  {
11687  SendFailure(activated, client,
11688  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_DEMON_INVALID);
11689  return false;
11690  }
11691  }
11692 
11693  // Mount/unmount is valid
11694 
11695  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11696  {
11697  if(end)
11698  {
11699  server->GetCharacterManager()->CancelMount(state);
11700  }
11701  else
11702  {
11703  // Toggle the skill on character and demon
11704  cState->InsertActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
11705  dState->InsertActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
11706 
11707  // Update the demon's display state and warp it
11708  dState->SetDisplayState(ActiveDisplayState_t::MOUNT);
11709  server->GetZoneManager()->Warp(client, dState, cState->GetCurrentX(),
11710  cState->GetCurrentY(), cState->GetCurrentRotation());
11711 
11712  // Recalc tokusei to apply the effects
11713  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true);
11714  }
11715 
11716  return true;
11717  }
11718  else
11719  {
11720  SendFailure(activated, client,
11721  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11722  return false;
11723  }
11724 }
11725 
11726 bool SkillManager::RandomItem(
11727  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11728  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11729  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11730 {
11731  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
11732  activated->GetSourceEntity());
11733  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11734 
11735  if(!client)
11736  {
11737  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
11738  return false;
11739  }
11740 
11741  auto state = client->GetClientState();
11742  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
11743  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
11744 
11745  if(!cState->Ready() || !cState->IsAlive())
11746  {
11747  SendFailure(activated, client,
11748  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11749  return false;
11750  }
11751 
11752  auto server = mServer.lock();
11753  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
11754  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
11755 
11756  if(characterManager->GetFreeSlots(client).size() == 0)
11757  {
11758  SendFailure(activated, client,
11759  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::INVENTORY_SPACE);
11760  return false;
11761  }
11762 
11763  // Get drop set from gift box ID
11764  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
11765  int32_t giftBoxID = pSkill->Definition->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams(0);
11766  auto dropSet = server->GetServerDataManager()->GetGiftDropSetData(
11767  (uint32_t)giftBoxID);
11768  if(!dropSet)
11769  {
11770  SendFailure(activated, client,
11771  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ITEM_USE);
11772  return false;
11773  }
11774 
11775  // Get one drop from the set
11776  auto drops = characterManager->DetermineDrops(dropSet->GetDrops(),
11777  0, true);
11778  auto drop = libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(drops);
11779  if(!drop)
11780  {
11781  SendFailure(activated, client,
11782  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ITEM_USE);
11783  return false;
11784  }
11785 
11786  // Item valid
11787 
11788  uint16_t count = RNG(uint16_t, drop->GetMinStack(),
11789  drop->GetMaxStack());
11790 
11791  // Should only be one
11792  for(auto& pair : activated->GetItemCosts())
11793  {
11794  libcomp::Packet notify;
11795  notify.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_RANDOM_BOX);
11796  notify.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
11797  notify.WriteU32Little(pair.first);
11798  notify.WriteU32Little(drop->GetItemType());
11799  notify.WriteU16Little(count);
11800  notify.WriteS8(0);
11801 
11802  zoneManager->BroadcastPacket(client, notify);
11803  }
11804 
11805  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> items;
11806  items[drop->GetItemType()] = count;
11807 
11808  characterManager->AddRemoveItems(client, items, true);
11809 
11810  ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx);
11811 
11812  return true;
11813 }
11814 
11815 bool SkillManager::Randomize(
11816  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11817  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11818  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11819 {
11820  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(
11821  activated->GetSourceEntity());
11822  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11823 
11824  // No validation needed for this one
11825 
11826  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11827 
11828  ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx);
11829 
11830  auto params = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
11831 
11832  libcomp::Packet notify;
11833  notify.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_RANDOM_NUMBERS);
11834  notify.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
11835 
11836  // Distinction between the two versions seems to be hardcoded
11837  if(params[0] == 0 && params[1] == 1)
11838  {
11839  // Coin flip
11840  notify.WriteS8(1);
11841  notify.WriteU32Little(RNG(uint32_t, 0, 1));
11842  }
11843  else
11844  {
11845  // Dice roll
11846  notify.WriteS8(0);
11847  notify.WriteU32Little(RNG(uint32_t, (uint32_t)params[0],
11848  (uint32_t)params[1]));
11849  }
11850 
11851  mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, notify);
11852 
11853  return true;
11854 }
11855 
11856 bool SkillManager::Respec(
11857  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11858  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11859  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11860 {
11861  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11862  ->GetSourceEntity());
11863  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
11864 
11865  if(!client)
11866  {
11867  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
11868  return false;
11869  }
11870 
11871  auto state = client->GetClientState();
11872  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
11873  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
11874  auto cs = character->GetCoreStats().Get();
11875 
11876  std::list<int16_t> statVals;
11877  statVals.push_back(cs->GetSTR());
11878  statVals.push_back(cs->GetMAGIC());
11879  statVals.push_back(cs->GetVIT());
11880  statVals.push_back(cs->GetINTEL());
11881  statVals.push_back(cs->GetSPEED());
11882  statVals.push_back(cs->GetLUCK());
11883 
11884  // Loop through each stat and "de-allocate" them
11885  int32_t respecPoints = 0;
11886  for(int16_t stat : statVals)
11887  {
11888  if(stat > 1)
11889  {
11890  int32_t delta = (stat % 10) + 1;
11891  if(stat < 10)
11892  {
11893  delta -= 2;
11894  }
11895 
11896  int32_t sum = (int32_t)(floor(stat / 10) + 1) * delta;
11897  for(int32_t i = (int32_t)floor(stat / 10) - 1; i >= 0; i--)
11898  {
11899  if(i == 0)
11900  {
11901  // Skip the first point
11902  sum += 8;
11903  }
11904  else
11905  {
11906  sum += (i + 1) * 10;
11907  }
11908  }
11909 
11910  respecPoints += sum;
11911  }
11912  }
11913 
11914  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
11915  {
11916  // Reset all stats back to 1 and set the new point value
11917  cs->SetSTR(1);
11918  cs->SetMAGIC(1);
11919  cs->SetVIT(1);
11920  cs->SetINTEL(1);
11921  cs->SetSPEED(1);
11922  cs->SetLUCK(1);
11923 
11924  character->SetPoints(respecPoints + character->GetPoints());
11925 
11926  auto server = mServer.lock();
11927  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
11928 
11929  // Recalculate stored dependent stats
11930  characterManager->CalculateCharacterBaseStats(cs);
11931 
11932  libcomp::Packet p;
11933  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_RESET_SKILL_POINTS);
11934  p.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
11935  characterManager->GetEntityStatsPacketData(p, cs, cState, 1);
11936  p.WriteS32Little(respecPoints);
11937 
11938  client->QueuePacket(p);
11939 
11940  characterManager->RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
11941 
11942  client->FlushOutgoing();
11943 
11944  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(state->GetAccountUID());
11945  dbChanges->Update(character);
11946  dbChanges->Update(cs);
11947 
11948  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
11949 
11950  return true;
11951  }
11952  else
11953  {
11954  SendFailure(activated, client,
11955  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
11956  return false;
11957  }
11958 }
11959 
11960 bool SkillManager::Rest(
11961  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
11962  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
11963  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
11964 {
11965  (void)ctx;
11966 
11967  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
11968  ->GetSourceEntity());
11969  // Do not call SpecialSkill as this needs to persist as a special activation
11970 
11971  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
11972 
11973  source->ExpireStatusTimes(ChannelServer::GetServerTime());
11974  if(source->StatusTimesKeyExists(STATUS_RESTING))
11975  {
11976  // Expire the status
11977  std::set<uint32_t> expire;
11978  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
11979  {
11980  expire.insert(addStatus->GetStatusID());
11981  }
11982 
11983  source->ExpireStatusEffects(expire);
11984  source->RemoveStatusTimes(STATUS_RESTING);
11985  }
11986  else
11987  {
11988  // Add the status
11989  StatusEffectChanges effects;
11990  for(auto addStatus : skillData->GetDamage()->GetAddStatuses())
11991  {
11992  int8_t stack = CalculateStatusEffectStack(addStatus->GetMinStack(),
11993  addStatus->GetMaxStack());
11994  if(stack == 0 && !addStatus->GetIsReplace()) continue;
11995 
11996  effects[addStatus->GetStatusID()] = StatusEffectChange(
11997  addStatus->GetStatusID(), stack, addStatus->GetIsReplace());
11998  }
11999 
12000  auto definitionManager = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager();
12001  source->AddStatusEffects(effects, definitionManager);
12002 
12003  source->SetStatusTimes(STATUS_RESTING, 0);
12004  }
12005 
12006  mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(source,
12007  client);
12008 
12009  // Active toggle skill "Rest" only activates and cancels, it never executes
12010  return true;
12011 }
12012 
12013 bool SkillManager::Spawn(
12014  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
12015  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
12016  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12017 {
12018  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12019  ->GetSourceEntity());
12020  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
12021 
12022  auto zone = source->GetZone();
12023  if(!zone)
12024  {
12025  SendFailure(activated, client,
12026  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
12027  return false;
12028  }
12029 
12030  auto server = mServer.lock();
12031  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
12032  auto serverDataManager = server->GetServerDataManager();
12033 
12034  // Zone independent spawns are restricted to fields and dungeons
12035  auto zoneData = definitionManager->GetZoneData(zone->GetDefinitionID());
12036  if(!zoneData || (zoneData->GetBasic()->GetType() !=
12037  objects::MiZoneBasicData::Type_t::FIELD &&
12038  zoneData->GetBasic()->GetType() !=
12039  objects::MiZoneBasicData::Type_t::DUNGEON))
12040  {
12041  SendFailure(activated, client,
12042  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::NOTHING_HAPPENED_HERE);
12043  return false;
12044  }
12045 
12046  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
12047  auto params = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
12048 
12049  // Pull the spawn group information from the global partial
12050  auto globalDef = serverDataManager->GetZonePartialData(0);
12051 
12052  // If it matches a spawn location group, pull a random group from
12053  // that instead
12054  uint32_t sgID = (uint32_t)params[0];
12055  auto slg = globalDef ? globalDef->GetSpawnLocationGroups(sgID) : nullptr;
12056  if(slg)
12057  {
12058  sgID = libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(slg->GetGroupIDs());
12059  }
12060 
12061  auto spawnGroup = globalDef ? globalDef->GetSpawnGroups(sgID) : nullptr;
12062  if(!spawnGroup)
12063  {
12064  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12065  {
12066  return libcomp::String("Failed to use Spawn skill from invalid"
12067  " global SpawnGroup: %1\n").Arg(sgID);
12068  });
12069 
12070  SendFailure(activated, client,
12071  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
12072  return false;
12073  }
12074 
12075  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
12076  {
12077  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
12078 
12079  Point center(source->GetCurrentX(), source->GetCurrentY());
12080 
12081  auto spawnLoc = std::make_shared<objects::SpawnLocation>();
12082  spawnLoc->SetX(center.x - 1000.f);
12083  spawnLoc->SetY(center.y + 1000.f);
12084  spawnLoc->SetWidth(2000.f);
12085  spawnLoc->SetHeight(2000.f);
12086 
12087  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> enemies;
12088  for(auto& spawnPair : spawnGroup->GetSpawns())
12089  {
12090  auto spawn = globalDef->GetSpawns(spawnPair.first);
12091  if(!spawn)
12092  {
12093  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12094  {
12095  return libcomp::String("Invalid spawn ID for Spawn"
12096  " skill: %1\n").Arg(spawnPair.first);
12097  });
12098 
12099  continue;
12100  }
12101 
12102  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < spawnPair.second; i++)
12103  {
12104  auto sp = zoneManager->GetRandomPoint(2000.f, 2000.f);
12105 
12106  sp.x += spawnLoc->GetX();
12107  sp.y = spawnLoc->GetY() - sp.y;
12108 
12109  // Make sure we don't spawn out of bounds
12110  sp = zoneManager->GetLinearPoint(center.x, center.y,
12111  sp.x, sp.y, center.GetDistance(sp), false, zone);
12112 
12113  float rot = ZoneManager::GetRandomRotation();
12114  auto enemy = zoneManager->CreateEnemy(zone, spawn
12115  ->GetEnemyType(), 0, 0, sp.x, sp.y, rot);
12116  if(enemy)
12117  {
12118  auto eBase = enemy->GetEnemyBase();
12119  eBase->SetSpawnSource(spawn);
12120  eBase->SetSpawnLocation(spawnLoc);
12121 
12122  // Unlike zone specific spawns, global spawns do not
12123  // have their group ID set on them as they should never
12124  // be considered part of that group for that zone.
12125  //eBase->SetSpawnGroupID(spawnGroup->GetID());
12126 
12127  enemies.push_back(enemy);
12128  }
12129  else
12130  {
12131  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12132  {
12133  return libcomp::String("Failed to create enemy for"
12134  " Spawn skill: %1\n").Arg(spawnPair.first);
12135  });
12136  }
12137  }
12138  }
12139 
12140  if(client)
12141  {
12142  LogSkillManagerDebug([&]()
12143  {
12144  return libcomp::String("Global spawn group %1 created by"
12145  " player in zone %2: %3\n").Arg(spawnGroup->GetID())
12146  .Arg(zone->GetDefinitionID())
12147  .Arg(client->GetClientState()->GetAccountUID().ToString());
12148  });
12149  }
12150 
12151  auto defeatActions = spawnGroup->GetDefeatActions();
12152  zoneManager->AddEnemiesToZone(enemies, zone, true, true,
12153  defeatActions);
12154 
12155  if(spawnGroup->SpawnActionsCount() > 0)
12156  {
12157  ActionOptions options;
12158  options.GroupID = spawnGroup->GetID();
12159 
12160  server->GetActionManager()->PerformActions(nullptr,
12161  spawnGroup->GetSpawnActions(), 0, zone, options);
12162  }
12163  }
12164 
12165  return true;
12166 }
12167 
12168 bool SkillManager::SpawnZone(
12169  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
12170  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
12171  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12172 {
12173  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12174  ->GetSourceEntity());
12175  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
12176 
12177  auto zone = source->GetZone();
12178  if(!zone)
12179  {
12180  SendFailure(activated, client,
12181  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
12182  return false;
12183  }
12184 
12185  auto skillData = activated->GetSkillData();
12186  auto params = skillData->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams();
12187 
12188  // Pull the spawn group information from the current zone
12189  auto zoneDef = zone->GetDefinition();
12190  if(zoneDef->GetID() != (uint32_t)params[0])
12191  {
12192  // Restricted to specific zone
12193  SendFailure(activated, client,
12194  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::NOTHING_HAPPENED_HERE);
12195  return false;
12196  }
12197  else if(zone->GroupHasSpawned((uint32_t)params[1], false, true))
12198  {
12199  // Cannot be alive already
12200  SendFailure(activated, client,
12201  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::NOTHING_HAPPENED_NOW);
12202  return false;
12203  }
12204 
12205  auto spawnGroup = zoneDef->GetSpawnGroups((uint32_t)params[1]);
12206  if(!spawnGroup)
12207  {
12208  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12209  {
12210  return libcomp::String("Failed to use SpawnZone skill from invalid"
12211  " global SpawnGroup: %1\n").Arg(params[1]);
12212  });
12213 
12214  SendFailure(activated, client,
12215  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC);
12216  return false;
12217  }
12218 
12219  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
12220  {
12221  auto server = mServer.lock();
12222  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
12223 
12224  Point center(source->GetCurrentX(), source->GetCurrentY());
12225 
12226  float hw = (float)(params[2] * 2);
12227 
12228  auto spawnLoc = std::make_shared<objects::SpawnLocation>();
12229  spawnLoc->SetX(center.x - (float)params[2]);
12230  spawnLoc->SetY(center.y + (float)params[2]);
12231  spawnLoc->SetWidth(hw);
12232  spawnLoc->SetHeight(hw);
12233 
12234  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> enemies;
12235  for(auto& spawnPair : spawnGroup->GetSpawns())
12236  {
12237  auto spawn = zoneDef->GetSpawns(spawnPair.first);
12238  if(!spawn)
12239  {
12240  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12241  {
12242  return libcomp::String("Invalid spawn ID for SpawnZone"
12243  " skill: %1\n").Arg(spawnPair.first);
12244  });
12245 
12246  continue;
12247  }
12248 
12249  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < spawnPair.second; i++)
12250  {
12251  auto sp = zoneManager->GetRandomPoint(hw, hw);
12252 
12253  sp.x += spawnLoc->GetX();
12254  sp.y = spawnLoc->GetY() - sp.y;
12255 
12256  // Make sure we don't spawn out of bounds
12257  sp = zoneManager->GetLinearPoint(center.x, center.y,
12258  sp.x, sp.y, center.GetDistance(sp), false, zone);
12259 
12260  float rot = ZoneManager::GetRandomRotation();
12261  auto enemy = zoneManager->CreateEnemy(zone, spawn
12262  ->GetEnemyType(), spawn->GetID(), 0, sp.x, sp.y, rot);
12263  if(enemy)
12264  {
12265  auto eBase = enemy->GetEnemyBase();
12266  eBase->SetSpawnSource(spawn);
12267  eBase->SetSpawnGroupID(spawnGroup->GetID());
12268  eBase->SetSpawnLocation(spawnLoc);
12269  enemies.push_back(enemy);
12270  }
12271  else
12272  {
12273  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12274  {
12275  return libcomp::String("Failed to create enemy for"
12276  " SpawnZone skill: %1\n").Arg(spawnPair.first);
12277  });
12278  }
12279  }
12280  }
12281 
12282  if(client)
12283  {
12284  LogSkillManagerDebug([&]()
12285  {
12286  return libcomp::String("Zone spawn group %1 created by"
12287  " player in zone %2: %3\n").Arg(spawnGroup->GetID())
12288  .Arg(zone->GetDefinitionID())
12289  .Arg(client->GetClientState()->GetAccountUID().ToString());
12290  });
12291  }
12292 
12293  auto defeatActions = spawnGroup->GetDefeatActions();
12294  zoneManager->AddEnemiesToZone(enemies, zone, true, true,
12295  defeatActions);
12296 
12297  if(spawnGroup->SpawnActionsCount() > 0)
12298  {
12299  ActionOptions options;
12300  options.GroupID = spawnGroup->GetID();
12301 
12302  server->GetActionManager()->PerformActions(nullptr,
12303  spawnGroup->GetSpawnActions(), 0, zone, options);
12304  }
12305  }
12306 
12307  return true;
12308 }
12309 
12310 bool SkillManager::SummonDemon(
12311  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
12312  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
12313  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12314 {
12315  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12316  ->GetSourceEntity());
12317  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
12318 
12319  if(!client)
12320  {
12321  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
12322  return false;
12323  }
12324 
12325  auto state = client->GetClientState();
12326  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
12327  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
12328  auto dgState = cState->GetDigitalizeState();
12329  auto demonID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
12330  auto demon = demonID > 0 ? std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
12331  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(demonID))) : nullptr;
12332  if(!demon)
12333  {
12334  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12335  {
12336  return libcomp::String("Invalid demon specified to summon on"
12337  " account: %1\n").Arg(state->GetAccountUID().ToString());
12338  });
12339 
12340  SendFailure(activated, client,
12341  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SUMMON_INVALID);
12342  return false;
12343  }
12344  else if(dgState && dgState->GetDemon().Get() == demon)
12345  {
12346  // Cannot summon the digitalized demon
12347  SendFailure(activated, client,
12348  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SUMMON_INVALID);
12349  return false;
12350  }
12351  else if(demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel() > cState->GetLevel())
12352  {
12353  // Allow if special status effects exist
12354  bool allow = false;
12355  for(uint32_t effectID : SVR_CONST.STATUS_COMP_TUNING)
12356  {
12357  if(cState->StatusEffectActive(effectID))
12358  {
12359  allow = true;
12360  break;
12361  }
12362  }
12363 
12364  if(!allow)
12365  {
12366  SendFailure(activated, client,
12367  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::SUMMON_LEVEL);
12368  return false;
12369  }
12370  }
12371 
12372  if(cState->IsMounted())
12373  {
12374  SendFailure(activated, client,
12375  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_SUMMON_RESTRICT);
12376  return false;
12377  }
12378 
12379  ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx);
12380 
12381  mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->SummonDemon(client, demonID);
12382 
12383  LogSkillManagerDebug([cState, dState]()
12384  {
12385  return libcomp::String("%1 summons %2.\n")
12386  .Arg(cState->GetEntityLabel()).Arg(dState->GetEntityLabel());
12387  });
12388 
12389  return true;
12390 }
12391 
12392 bool SkillManager::StoreDemon(
12393  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
12394  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
12395  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12396 {
12397  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12398  ->GetSourceEntity());
12399  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
12400 
12401  if(!client)
12402  {
12403  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
12404  return false;
12405  }
12406 
12407  auto demonID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
12408  if(demonID <= 0)
12409  {
12410  LogSkillManagerError([&]()
12411  {
12412  return libcomp::String("Invalid demon specified to store: %1\n")
12413  .Arg(demonID);
12414  });
12415 
12416  SendFailure(activated, client,
12417  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::PARTNER_MISSING);
12418  return false;
12419  }
12420 
12421  auto state = client->GetClientState();
12422  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
12423  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
12424  if(cState->IsMounted())
12425  {
12426  SendFailure(activated, client,
12427  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::MOUNT_SUMMON_RESTRICT);
12428  return false;
12429  }
12430  else if(state->GetObjectID(dState->GetEntityUUID()) != demonID)
12431  {
12432  SendFailure(activated, client,
12433  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
12434  return false;
12435  }
12436 
12437  ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx);
12438 
12439  LogSkillManagerDebug([cState, dState]()
12440  {
12441  return libcomp::String("%1 stores %2.\n")
12442  .Arg(cState->GetEntityLabel()).Arg(dState->GetEntityLabel());
12443  });
12444 
12445  mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager()->StoreDemon(client);
12446 
12447  return true;
12448 }
12449 
12450 bool SkillManager::Traesto(
12451  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
12452  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
12453  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12454 {
12455  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12456  ->GetSourceEntity());
12457  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
12458 
12459  if(!client)
12460  {
12461  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
12462  return false;
12463  }
12464 
12465  auto server = mServer.lock();
12466  auto zoneManager = server->GetZoneManager();
12467 
12468  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
12469  auto skillData = pSkill->Definition;
12470  uint16_t functionID = pSkill->FunctionID;
12471 
12472  uint32_t zoneID = 0;
12473  uint32_t spotID = 0;
12474  if(functionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO)
12475  {
12476  auto state = client->GetClientState();
12477  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
12478  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
12479 
12480  zoneID = character->GetHomepointZone();
12481  spotID = character->GetHomepointSpotID();
12482  }
12483  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[0])
12484  {
12485  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[1];
12486  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_ARCADIA[2];
12487  }
12488  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_DSHINJUKU[0])
12489  {
12490  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_DSHINJUKU[1];
12491  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_DSHINJUKU[2];
12492  }
12493  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[0])
12494  {
12495  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[1];
12496  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_KAKYOJO[2];
12497  }
12498  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_NAKANO_BDOMAIN[0])
12499  {
12500  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_NAKANO_BDOMAIN[1];
12501  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_NAKANO_BDOMAIN[2];
12502  }
12503  else if(functionID == (uint16_t)SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[0])
12504  {
12505  zoneID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[1];
12506  spotID = SVR_CONST.SKILL_TRAESTO_SOUHONZAN[2];
12507  }
12508 
12509  if(zoneID == 0 || spotID == 0)
12510  {
12511  SendFailure(activated, client,
12512  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ZONE_INVALID);
12513  return false;
12514  }
12515 
12516  float xCoord = 0.f;
12517  float yCoord = 0.f;
12518  float rot = 0.f;
12519 
12520  auto zoneDef = server->GetServerDataManager()->GetZoneData(zoneID, 0);
12521  uint32_t dynamicMapID = zoneDef ? zoneDef->GetDynamicMapID() : 0;
12522 
12523  if(!zoneDef || !zoneManager->GetSpotPosition(dynamicMapID, spotID, xCoord,
12524  yCoord, rot))
12525  {
12526  SendFailure(activated, client,
12527  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::ZONE_INVALID);
12528  return false;
12529  }
12530 
12531  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx) && zoneManager->EnterZone(client,
12532  zoneID, zoneDef->GetDynamicMapID(), xCoord, yCoord, rot, true))
12533  {
12534  return true;
12535  }
12536  else
12537  {
12538  SendFailure(activated, client,
12539  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
12540  return false;
12541  }
12542 }
12543 
12544 bool SkillManager::XPUp(
12545  const std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility>& activated,
12546  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx,
12547  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12548 {
12549  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12550  ->GetSourceEntity());
12551  SpecialSkill(activated, ctx, client);
12552 
12553  if(!client)
12554  {
12555  SendFailure(activated, nullptr);
12556  return false;
12557  }
12558 
12559  auto state = client->GetClientState();
12560 
12561  auto server = mServer.lock();
12562  auto characterManager = server->GetCharacterManager();
12563 
12564  auto pSkill = GetProcessingSkill(activated, ctx);
12565  auto skillData = pSkill->Definition;
12566 
12567  std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState> eState;
12568  if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_XP_SELF)
12569  {
12570  eState = state->GetCharacterState();
12571  }
12572  else if(pSkill->FunctionID == SVR_CONST.SKILL_XP_PARTNER)
12573  {
12574  eState = state->GetDemonState();
12575  }
12576 
12577  if(!eState || !eState->Ready())
12578  {
12579  SendFailure(activated, client,
12580  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::TARGET_INVALID);
12581  return false;
12582  }
12583 
12584  if(ProcessSkillResult(activated, ctx))
12585  {
12586  characterManager->UpdateExperience(client, skillData
12587  ->GetSpecial()->GetSpecialParams(0), eState->GetEntityID());
12588  return true;
12589  }
12590  else
12591  {
12592  SendFailure(activated, client,
12593  (uint8_t)SkillErrorCodes_t::GENERIC_USE);
12594  return false;
12595  }
12596 }
12597 
12598 void SkillManager::GiveDemonPresent(
12599  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client,
12600  uint32_t demonType, uint32_t itemType, int8_t rarity, uint32_t skillID)
12601 {
12602  if(!client || itemType == 0)
12603  {
12604  return;
12605  }
12606 
12607  auto characterManager = mServer.lock()->GetCharacterManager();
12608 
12609  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, uint32_t> items;
12610  items[itemType] = 1;
12611 
12612  if(characterManager->AddRemoveItems(client, items, true))
12613  {
12614  libcomp::Packet p;
12615  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DEMON_PRESENT);
12616  p.WriteU32Little(itemType);
12617  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)rarity);
12618  p.WriteU32Little(skillID);
12619  p.WriteU32Little(demonType);
12620 
12621  client->SendPacket(p);
12622  }
12623 }
12624 
12625 void SkillManager::Fizzle(
12626  const std::shared_ptr<SkillExecutionContext>& ctx)
12627 {
12628  if(ctx)
12629  {
12630  auto managerConnection = mServer.lock()->GetManagerConnection();
12631 
12632  // Make sure all countering skills are completed in full
12633  for(auto counteringSkill : ctx->CounteringSkills)
12634  {
12635  auto copyCtx = std::make_shared<SkillExecutionContext>(
12636  *counteringSkill->ExecutionContext);
12637  auto activated = copyCtx->Skill->Activated;
12638  auto client = managerConnection->GetEntityClient(activated
12639  ->GetSourceEntity()->GetEntityID());
12640 
12641  FinalizeSkillExecution(client, copyCtx, activated);
12642  FinalizeSkill(copyCtx, activated);
12643 
12644  counteringSkill->ExecutionContext = nullptr;
12645  }
12646 
12647  LogSkillManagerDebug([ctx]()
12648  {
12649  return libcomp::String("Skill %1[%2] from %3 fizzles.\n")
12650  .Arg(ctx->Skill->SkillID)
12651  .Arg(ctx->Skill->Activated->GetActivationID())
12652  .Arg(ctx->Skill->EffectiveSource->GetEntityLabel());
12653  });
12654  }
12655 }
12656 
12657 void SkillManager::SendActivateSkill(
12658  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
12659 {
12660  // Instant executions are not technically activated
12661  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
12662  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
12663  {
12664  return;
12665  }
12666 
12667  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12668  ->GetSourceEntity());
12669  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
12670  auto zConnections = zone ? zone->GetConnectionList()
12671  : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
12672  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
12673  {
12674  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
12675 
12676  libcomp::Packet p;
12677  p.WritePacketCode(
12678  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_ACTIVATED);
12679  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
12680  p.WriteU32Little(pSkill->SkillID);
12681  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
12682 
12683  timeMap[11] = activated->GetChargedTime();
12684  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12685 
12686  p.WriteU8(activated->GetMaxUseCount());
12687 
12688  // Set some sort of category flag. Initially I thought this was a
12689  // notification that the attacker needed to get closer or not but
12690  // the client handles this just fine.
12691  switch(pSkill->Definition->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
12692  {
12693  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::ATTACK:
12694  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::RUSH:
12695  p.WriteU8(1);
12696  break;
12697  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::GUARD:
12698  p.WriteU8(0);
12699  break;
12700  default:
12701  p.WriteU8(2);
12702  break;
12703  }
12704 
12705  p.WriteFloat(activated->GetChargeMoveSpeed());
12706  p.WriteFloat(activated->GetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed());
12707 
12708  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p,
12709  timeMap);
12710  }
12711 }
12712 
12713 void SkillManager::SendExecuteSkill(
12714  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill)
12715 {
12716  // Instant executions use a special packet to execute
12717  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
12718  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
12719  {
12720  SendExecuteSkillInstant(pSkill, 0);
12721  return;
12722  }
12723 
12724  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12725  ->GetSourceEntity());
12726  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
12727  auto zConnections = zone ? zone->GetConnectionList()
12728  : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
12729  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
12730  {
12731  int32_t targetedEntityID = activated->GetEntityTargeted()
12732  ? (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID()
12733  : source->GetEntityID();
12734 
12735  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
12736 
12737  libcomp::Packet p;
12738  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_EXECUTED);
12739  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
12740  p.WriteU32Little(pSkill->SkillID);
12741  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
12742  p.WriteS32Little(targetedEntityID);
12743 
12744  timeMap[15] = activated->GetCooldownTime();
12745  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12746  timeMap[19] = activated->GetLockOutTime();
12747  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12748 
12749  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetHPCost());
12750  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetMPCost());
12751 
12752  // Rush skills have additional execution point values as well as
12753  // an offset to their normal hit timing
12754  if(pSkill->RushStartPoint)
12755  {
12756  p.WriteU8(1); // Rush flag
12757 
12758  // Source will "speed up" to this point if not already there
12759  p.WriteFloat(pSkill->RushStartPoint->x);
12760  p.WriteFloat(pSkill->RushStartPoint->y);
12761 
12762  p.WriteFloat(0); // Always 0
12763 
12764  // Usage timing
12765  timeMap[44] = pSkill->RushStartTime;
12766  timeMap[48] = activated->GetExecutionTime();
12767  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12768  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12769  }
12770  else
12771  {
12772  p.WriteBlank(21);
12773  }
12774 
12775  p.WriteU8(pSkill->HardStrike ? 1 : 0);
12776  p.WriteU8(0xFF); // Always the same value
12777 
12778  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p,
12779  timeMap);
12780  }
12781 }
12782 
12783 void SkillManager::SendExecuteSkillInstant(
12784  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill, uint8_t errorCode)
12785 {
12786  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
12787  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12788  ->GetSourceEntity());
12789  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
12790  auto zConnections = zone ? zone->GetConnectionList()
12791  : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
12792  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
12793  {
12794  int32_t targetedEntityID = activated->GetEntityTargeted()
12795  ? (int32_t)activated->GetTargetObjectID()
12796  : source->GetEntityID();
12797 
12798  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
12799 
12800  libcomp::Packet p;
12801  p.WritePacketCode(
12802  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_EXECUTED_INSTANT);
12803  p.WriteU8(errorCode);
12804  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
12805  p.WriteU32Little(pSkill->SkillID);
12806  p.WriteS32Little(targetedEntityID);
12807 
12808  uint64_t cooldown = errorCode == 0 ? activated->GetCooldownTime() : 0;
12809  timeMap[p.Size()] = cooldown;
12810  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12811 
12812  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetHPCost());
12813  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)activated->GetMPCost());
12814 
12815  if(cooldown)
12816  {
12817  // Relative times are only needed if a cooldown is set
12818  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p,
12819  timeMap);
12820  }
12821  else
12822  {
12823  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
12824  }
12825  }
12826 }
12827 
12828 void SkillManager::SendCompleteSkill(
12829  std::shared_ptr<objects::ActivatedAbility> activated, uint8_t mode)
12830 {
12831  // Instant executions are not completed as they are not technically
12832  // activated
12833  if(activated->GetActivationID() == -1)
12834  {
12835  return;
12836  }
12837 
12838  auto source = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ActiveEntityState>(activated
12839  ->GetSourceEntity());
12840  auto zone = source ? source->GetZone() : nullptr;
12841  auto zConnections = zone ? zone->GetConnectionList()
12842  : std::list<std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>>();
12843  if(zConnections.size() > 0)
12844  {
12845  RelativeTimeMap timeMap;
12846 
12847  libcomp::Packet p;
12848  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_COMPLETED);
12849  p.WriteS32Little(source->GetEntityID());
12850  p.WriteU32Little(activated->GetSkillData()->GetCommon()->GetID());
12851  p.WriteS8(activated->GetActivationID());
12852 
12853  // Write the cooldown time if cancelling in case its set
12854  // (mostly for multi-use skills)
12855  uint64_t cooldown = mode == 1 ? activated->GetCooldownTime() : 0;
12856  timeMap[p.Size()] = cooldown;
12857  p.WriteFloat(0.f);
12858 
12859  p.WriteU8(1); // Unknown, always the same
12860  p.WriteFloat(source->GetMovementSpeed());
12861  p.WriteU8(mode);
12862 
12863  if(cooldown)
12864  {
12865  // Relative times are only needed if a cooldown is set
12866  ChannelClientConnection::SendRelativeTimePacket(zConnections, p,
12867  timeMap);
12868  }
12869  else
12870  {
12871  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPacket(zConnections, p);
12872  }
12873  }
12874 }
12875 
12876 uint32_t SkillManager::GetSummonSpeed(
12877  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ProcessingSkill>& pSkill,
12878  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
12879 {
12880  auto state = client ? client->GetClientState() : nullptr;
12881  auto cState = state ? state->GetCharacterState() : nullptr;
12882  if(!state || pSkill->EffectiveSource != cState)
12883  {
12884  return 0;
12885  }
12886 
12887  auto calcState = GetCalculatedState(cState, pSkill, false, nullptr);
12888  auto activated = pSkill->Activated;
12889  auto demonID = activated->GetActivationObjectID();
12890  auto demon = demonID > 0 ? std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
12891  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(demonID)))
12892  : nullptr;
12893  if(!demon)
12894  {
12895  return 0;
12896  }
12897 
12898  auto demonData = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager()->GetDevilData(demon
12899  ->GetType());
12900  if(!demonData)
12901  {
12902  return 0;
12903  }
12904 
12905  uint32_t demonSpeed = demonData->GetSummonData()->GetSummonSpeed();
12906  int16_t correctSpeed = cState->GetCorrectValue(CorrectTbl::SUMMON_SPEED,
12907  calcState);
12908  double speed = (((double)demonSpeed - (double)correctSpeed) /
12909  100.0 * 2000.0);
12910 
12911  // Minimum 1ms
12912  return (uint32_t)(speed > 0.0 ? speed : 1.0);
12913 }
12914 
12915 bool SkillManager::IsTalkSkill(const std::shared_ptr<
12916  objects::MiSkillData>& skillData, bool primaryOnly)
12917 {
12918  switch(skillData->GetBasic()->GetActionType())
12919  {
12920  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TALK:
12921  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::INTIMIDATE:
12922  case objects::MiSkillBasicData::ActionType_t::TAUNT:
12923  return true;
12924  default:
12925  if(!primaryOnly)
12926  {
12927  // If the action type doesn't match but there is talk
12928  // damage it is still a talk skill
12929  auto talkDamage = skillData->GetDamage()->GetNegotiationDamage();
12930  return talkDamage->GetSuccessAffability() != 0 ||
12931  talkDamage->GetFailureAffability() != 0 ||
12932  talkDamage->GetSuccessFear() != 0 ||
12933  talkDamage->GetFailureFear() != 0;
12934  }
12935  break;
12936  }
12937 
12938  return false;
12939 }
12940 
12941 bool SkillManager::IFramesEnabled()
12942 {
12943  const static bool enabled = mServer.lock()->GetWorldSharedConfig()
12944  ->GetIFramesEnabled();
12945  return enabled;
12946 }
